10670.desc: Increases this ship's DMG by 30.0% when there are no other BBs or BCs in your Main Fleet.

10680.name: Iron Blood Wings
10680.desc: Decreases the DMG all Iron Blood ships in your fleet take by 15.0%; For every Iron Blood ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's AVI by 5.0%, up to a maximum of 3 stacks.

10690.name: Iron Blood Hawk
10690.desc: When this ship is equipped with at least one Iron Blood aircraft: increases the efficiency of this ship's aircraft slots by 30.0%.

10710.name: Giant Hunter
10710.desc: At the start of battle: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%, torpedo DMG by 15.0%, and damage dealt to Medium-Armored enemies by 25.0%; After hitting an enemy CA with 4 Main Gun attacks, slows that ship by 30.0% for 5s (this effect cannot be stacked again until the slowing effect has worn off).

10720.name: Guarding Shield
10720.desc: Every 30s: deploys 2 rotating shields that can block up to 10 shells each. Shields last for 15s.

10730.name: The Demon
10730.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's TRP by 60% for 12s.

10740.name: Veteran Techniques
10740.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 4.0% chance to increase its EVA by 50% for 8s.

10750.name: The Nick
10750.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 40.0% and decrease the DMG it takes from enemy aircraft by 40.0% for 8s.

10760.name: Dragon Empery Bond
10760.desc: When sortied with Ning Hai, Ping Hai, or both, Yat Sen and the aforementioned ship(s) receive the following buffs: decreases DMG taken by 20.0% and increases Evasion Rate by 30.0%.

10770.name: Destroyer Division 6: Akatsuki
10770.desc: When sortied with Hibiki, Ikazuchi, or Inazuma: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0%. Effect does not stack.

10780.name: Lucky(?) Ship
10780.desc: Every 20s: this ship receives 1 of 3 effects chosen at random for 10.0s. Effect may be helpful or harmful.

10790.name: Fifth Carrier Division
10790.desc: When sortied with Zuikaku: increases this ship's AVI by 30.0% but increases the DMG it takes by 5.0%.

10800.name: Fifth Carrier Division
10800.desc: When sortied with Shoukaku: increases this ship's AVI by 20.0% and decreases the DMG it takes by 20.0%.

10810.name: Crane's Protection
10810.desc: As this ship launches an Airstrike: increases your entire fleet's DMG by 10.0% and decreases the DMG it takes by 10.0% for 12s.

10820.name: Crane's Endeavor
10820.desc: When there are 3 or more Sakura Empire ships in this ship's fleet: increases the DMG of this ship's Airstrikes by 20.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: increases the DMG of all subsequent Airstrikes by 20.0% for the rest of the battle, stacking up to 3 times.

10830.name: Aviation Preparations
10830.desc: Once per battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike.

10840.name: Death Raid
10840.desc: While this ship is the last one afloat in your Vanguard: increases its DMG by 50.0% but increases the DMG it takes by 20.0%.

10850.name: Dark Side of Fate
10850.desc: Decreases the DMG other J-class DDs in your fleet take by 20.0% but increases the DMG this ship takes by 20.0%. Can only activate if there are other J-class DDs in your fleet.

10860.name: Assault Mode
10860.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance for this ship to enter Assault Mode, firing a powerful barrage and increasing this ship's TRP by 30.0% for 8s.

10870.name: 2nd Torpedo Squadron
10870.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases the TRP and RLD of all CLs and DDs in your fleet by 20.0%.

10880.name: Lucky Lou
10880.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, RLD, and EVA by 30.0% for 8s.

10890.name: The Unyielding Jintsuu
10890.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes by 20.0%. While this ship is afloat: increases all your DDs' and CLs' Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0%. Also increases their Torpedo Crit DMG by 30.0%.

10900.name: Rescue Operations
10900.desc: When one of your ships sink: 60.0% chance to restore 8.0% of this ship's max HP and restore 3.0% of all your other ships' max HP.

10910.name: Reborn Combined Fleet Flagship
10910.desc: When this ship is attacked: 12.0% chance to decrease the DMG of the incoming attack by 50.0%. When sortied as the Flagship: increases the FP and RLD of all Sakura Empire ships in your fleet by 20.0%.

10920.name: T-Cross Formation
10920.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 60.0% chance to increase the DMG of all BCs and BBs in your fleet by 20.0% for 8s.

10930.name: Prestige
10930.desc: 10s after the battle begins and 20.0% chance every 20s after that: for 8s, absorbs 50.0% of the DMG your Main Fleet takes and increases the DMG one random enemy takes by 20.0%.

10940.name: Demon Dance
10940.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance for this ship to begin its Demon Dance, firing a powerful barrage and increasing its EVA by 30.0% for 5s.

10950.name: Warrior Soul
10950.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 8 and FP by 15.0%.

10960.name: Special Lead Ship
10960.desc: Grants the following buffs to Ayanami, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma, Fubuki and Hibiki: increases FP and EVA by 30.0% and TRP by 10.0%.

10970.name: Fighting Mary
10970.desc: When this ship's HP falls below 70.0%: increases its DMG based on how low its HP, is up to 35.0%.

10980.name: AA Protection
10980.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG your Main Fleet takes from enemy aircraft by 15.0%.

10990.name: AA Firepower
10990.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 30.0% of its total AA stat (base stats plus extra stats gained from gear).

11000.name: Courageous Shelling
11000.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11010.name: Night of the Iron Bottom Sound
11010.desc: Activates when your South Dakota's HP falls below 30.0%: increases this ship's DMG by 20.0%, absorbs 30.0% of the DMG South Dakota takes (ignores South Dakota's "The Strongest Shield" skill) and makes South Dakota invulnerable for 5s. Can only activate once per battle

11020.name: Double Sting
11020.desc: If there are any Royal Navy ships in your Main Fleet when this ship launches an Airstrike: 50.0% chance to launch an additional Seafire airstrike.

11030.name: Miracle Wind
11030.desc: While this ship is the last afloat in your Vanguard: increases its EVA by 10.0% and decreases its DMG taken from enemy aircraft by 50.0%.

11040.name: An Shan Name Ship
11040.desc: Increases the Accuracy and FP by 25.0% and EVA by 10.0% of all An Shan-class DDs in your fleet.

11050.name: Rezkiy Assault
11050.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 20.0%.

11060.name: Mutual Assistance
11060.desc: Increases the FP, RLD, and Accuracy of all Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery ships in your Vanguard by 12.0%.

11070.name: United As One
11070.desc: When sortied in a full fleet of 6 ships: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 25.0% and EVA by 10.0%.

11080.name: Silver Phantom
11080.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to DDs, Cargo Ships, Torpedo Ships, and Bombing Ships by 20.0%.

11090.name: The Light of Dawn
11090.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the Evasion Rate of all enemy DDs and CLs by 20.0%.

11100.name: Concerto of Blood
11100.desc: Every 20s: launches a special barrage towards the enemy farthest away from this ship. Decreases the Speed of enemies hit by the barrage by 40.0% for 6s.

11110.name: Trepidation of Destruction
11110.desc: Increases the DMG of this ship's first Salvo by 50.0%. When this ship hits an enemy with a Salvo: increases the DMG the enemy takes by 12.0% for 8s.

11120.name: Victorious Song
11120.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to enemy BBs by 20.0% and decreases the DMG it takes from Salvos by 20.0%; Increases the DMG dealt to enemy BBs by other CVs and CVLs in this fleet by 10.0%.

11130.name: First Destroyer
11130.desc: When this ship is hit by a torpedo: 30.0% chance to decrease the DMG of the incoming attack by 50.0% and increase this ship's TRP by 50.0% for 4s.

11140.name: Shiny Sheff
11140.desc: At the start of battle, if your ships' HP is less than Sheffield's: 30.0% chance for those ships to take 50.0% less DMG when attacked. Ships that have less HP than Sheffield after the battle starts will not gain the buff.

11150.name: Counterattack of the Barents Sea
11150.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 12.0% and increases its Crit DMG by 30.0%.

11160.name: Crete's Black Cloud
11160.desc: Every 20s: increases this ship's AA by 40.0% and decreases the DMG all your ships take by 8.0% for 6s.

11170.name: Allies of Justice
11170.desc: When sortied with Sheffield: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

11180.name: Calibrated Firing
11180.desc: Every 20s: increases this ship's Torpedo DMG by 12.0%. Can be stacked up to 8 times.

11190.name: Accompanying Wind
11190.desc: When sortied with Hamakaze: increases this ship's FP, TRP, RLD, and AA by 10.0%.

11200.name: Legend of the Solomons
11200.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase your Cruisers' FP and Accuracy by 25.0% and decrease the DMG they take by 15.0% for 8s.

11210.name: Annihilation Mode
11210.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance for this ship to enter Annihilation Mode, firing a powerful barrage and increasing this ship's RLD by 200.0% for 10s.

11220.name: Suppression Fire
11220.desc: Every time this ship lands 5 hits with its Torpedoes: increases its FP by 8.0%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

11230.name: Yukikaze of Kure
11230.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG your Main Fleet takes by 8.0%. Once per battle, when the HP of a ship in your Main Fleet falls below 20.0%: heals them for 10.0% of their max HP.

11240.name: The Unsinkable Lucky Ship
11240.desc: When this ship takes DMG: 25.0% chance to reduce that instance of DMG to 1.

11250.name: Leyte Gulf's Blitz
11250.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0%. Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase the FP and TRP of all Cruisers in your fleet by 20.0% for 10s.

11260.name: Eagle's Defiance
11260.desc: When this ship launches its first and second Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike.

11270.name: Blaze of Glory
11270.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to enemy BBs by 15.0%. When this ship fires a Salvo: 60% chance to fire a special barrage (uses Type 3 Ammo.) Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11280.name: The Perfect Mini-Maid
11280.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 8 and EVA by 25.0%.

11290.name: Ladies' Tea Time
11290.desc: At the start of the battle: heals all your ships for 3.5% of this ship's max HP.

11300.name: Artillery Volley
11300.desc: 15s after the battle begins and every 20s after that: 60.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11310.name: 4th Combined Fleet Flagship
11310.desc: When sortied as the Flagship: increases all your Sakura Empire ships' FP by 10.0% and RLD and Accuracy by 20.0%. Also increases the DMG of all your Sakura Empire Carriers by 20.0%.

11320.name: Destruction Mode
11320.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance for this ship to enter Destruction Mode, firing a powerful barrage, deploying 2 rotating shields that can each block up to 5 shells (shields last for 10s,) and increasing this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate to 100% for 10s.

11330.name: Roaring Glory
11330.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases the FP and Accuracy by 15.0% and EVA by 20.0% of all Kongou-class ships in your fleet.

11340.name: Dazzling Dawn
11340.desc: Every time this ship fires its Main Guns: increases this ship's FP and AA by 6.0%. Can be stacked up to 4 times.

11350.name: 8th Destroyer Division
11350.desc: Increases FP and RLD by 15.0% and TRP by 10.0% for 8th Destroyer Division DDs (Asashio, Ooshio, Michishio, and Arashio.)

11360.name: Lunga Point's Strike
11360.desc: Increases the DMG all your Sakura Empire DDs deal to enemy Cruisers by 15.0%.

11370.name: Fatal Perforation
11370.desc: 8s after this boat enters the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage that can pierce through enemies, damaging up to 2 targets per torpedo. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11380.name: Departing Strike
11380.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to CAs by 15.0%. When this boat retreats from battle (when it's done attacking): fires a special torpedo barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

11390.name: Silent Hunter
11390.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to CVs by 20.0%. When this boat hits an enemy with its Torpedoes: 15.0% chance to inflicts Flooding that lasts 24s, inflicting DMG every 3s (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat.) Effect does not stack, but the Flooding duration can be refreshed.

11400.name: Witch's Prank
11400.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70% chance to launch an additional special airstrike. Airstrike inflicts Flooding and Burn DOTs to enemies hit. Flooding and Burn damage are based on this ship's AVI stat.

11410.name: Wolf Pack Formation  U-81
11410.desc: Increases this boat's EVA by 40.0%. For each Iron Blood SS in your fleet: increases this boat's TRP, RLD, and Accuracy by 7.0%.

11420.name: Big Seven: Sakura
11420.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 40.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

11430.name: Big Seven: Sakura
11430.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 40.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

11440.name: The Bull of Scapa Flow
11440.desc: When this boat hits an enemy with its Torpedoes: for 5s, the enemy hit will take 40.0% more DMG from this boat's Torpedoes.

11450.name: Firepower Overload
11450.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 50.0% and RLD by 200.0% for 10s. Once the effect ends: decreases this ship's RLD by 100% for 3s.

11460.name: Lone Wolf
11460.desc: When the Submarine Fleet consists of this boat only: increases this boat's DMG to BBs (does not affect BCs or BBVs) by 20.0%, increases ASR by 1, and increases AMO by 2.

11461.name: Lone Wolf
11461.desc: When the Submarine Fleet consists of this boat only: increases this boat's DMG to BBs (does not affect BCs or BBVs) by 20.0%, increases ASR by 1, and increases AMO by 2.

11470.name: Nasty Asty
11470.desc: When sortied with other New Orleans-class ships: increases your fleet's New Orleans-class ships' FP by 10.0% and their AA and ACC by 20.0%.

11480.name: Battle of Kula Gulf
11480.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 40.0% for 10s. Once per battle, when the HP of a ship in your Vanguard falls below 20.0%: decreases the DMG they take by 15.0% for the rest of the battle. If the recipient is Helena: also restores her HP by 8.0%.

11490.name: Frontal Fire
11490.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 50% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG and shell pattern is based on the skill's level.

11500.name: Radiant Iris
11500.desc: When this ship's Main Guns hit the same enemy consecutively (if one shot hits several enemies then they are both tracked): increases this ship's RLD by 40.0%. This effect can be stacked up to 4 times and can only activate once a second. Hitting a different enemy resets the buff.

11510.name: Sword or Shield
11510.desc: While this ship is in the frontmost position in your Vanguard: increases its Main Gun efficiency by 20.0%, but decreases its Anti-Air Gun efficiency by 30.0%.

11520.name: Heart of Iris
11520.desc: Increases FP, TRP, and Accuracy by 15.0% for all Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion DDs in your fleet.

11530.name: Pirate's Soul
11530.desc: Increases the DMG of the first Volley of every Salvo this ship fires by 60.0%.This ship's manual aiming DMG bonus is increased to 60.0%.

11540.name: Final Shot
11540.desc: While this ship is equipping the Quadruple 380mm Main Gun (Mle 1935): increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 30.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 50.0%.

11550.name: Big Mamie
11550.desc: For each Eagle Union CA and/or BB in your fleet: increases this ship's FP, AA, and EVA by 8.0%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

11560.name: 2,700 Pounds of Justice
11560.desc: When this ship deals DMG to an enemy with its Main Guns: DMG increases based on distance traveled, up to a maximum of 15.0%; When this ship's Secondary Gun slot is equipped with Eagle Union gear, ammunition type is changed to Super-Heavy AP, and the DMG done based upon distance traveled is increased to a maximum of 30.0%.

11570.name: Recon Support
11570.desc: When this boat is called into battle: increases the Accuracy of your Vanguard by 20.0% for 20s.

11580.name: Swordfishes, Attack!
11580.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional special Swordfish airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases Speed by 40.0% for 6s for all enemies hit by it. Increases this ship's DMG to BBs (BCs and BBVs are unaffected) by 10.0%.

11590.name: Airspace Dominance
11590.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: increases your Main Fleet's AVI by 15.0% and FP by 10.0% for 8s.

11600.name: Melee Artillery
11600.desc: Fires a Lv.10 special barrage at enemies that come within close range of this ship. Has a 10s cooldown between activations. Starts the battle on cooldown.

11610.name: Aviation Battleship Fleet
11610.desc: For the first 2 Airstrikes this ship launches: Airstrike reload time is decreased by 25.0%, and launches extra Lv.10 Suiseis with each Airstrike. If there are 1 or more CVs or CVLs in your fleet: the aforementioned effects apply to all of this ship's Airstrikes

11620.name: Predestined Launch
11620.desc: When this ship's airstrike has finished loading: launches 1 additional randomly chosen airstrike consisting of Ryusei, Suisei, or Saiun squadrons, with a 25.0% chance per squadron to launch the remaining squadrons not chosen. (Saiuns do not attack, instead increasing your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s when launched.)

11630.name: Heavily Armored
11630.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes from enemy Airstrikes and HE ammo by 20.0%.

11640.name: Valorous Avengers
11640.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 TBF Avenger airstrike that causes Flooding DoT to enemies hit by their torpedoes (Flooding DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat and the skill's level.) Also increases this ship's DMG to enemy BBs (but not BCs or BBVs) by 10.0%.

11650.name: Covering Formation
11650.desc: For each Eagle Union CV or CVL in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's AVI and AA by 5.0%. Each time this ship's planes shoot down an enemy plane: increases this ship's AVI by 3.0%. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

11660.name: Absolute Evasion
11660.desc: When there are 4 or more Eagle Union ships in the same fleet as this ship: 12.0% chance to reduce DMG taken to 1 when a ship in your fleet is attacked by enemy Torpedo Bombers or Dive Bombers.

11670.name: Surpriiiiiiiise!
11670.desc: When this boat resurfaces and when it retreats: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) with a 70.0% chance to ignite enemies, causing Burn DMG. Burn DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat.

11680.name: Experienced Hunter
11680.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to enemy DDs, CLs, and CVs by 10.0%.

11690.name: Thrill of the Hunt
11690.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and RLD by 30.0% for 12s. This effect can not activate more than once a second and does not stack, but sinking additional enemies will refresh its duration.

11700.name: Bold But Reckless
11700.desc: While this ship is in the firstmost position in the Vanguard: increases this ship's Speed by 3, EVA by 12.0%, and FP by 25.0%, but decreases its AA by 40.0% and Accuracy by 5.0%.

11710.name: Dullahan
11710.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: decreases the DMG it takes by 10.0% for the rest of the battle, and for 16s: decreases its Speed by 2 and recovers 4.0% of its max HP every 3s.

11720.name: Sparkling Battle Star!
11720.desc: Increases this ship's AA by 25.0%. Every 20s: 100% chance to fire a special barrage.

11730.name: Little Star
11730.desc: 15s after the battle begins: increases the FP, RLD, and EVA of your entire fleet by 6.0% for 20s.

11740.name: Wind Rider
11740.desc: When this ship fires its Torpedoes: 40.0% chance for this ship to evade all enemy attacks for 5s.

11750.name: Light Carrier Unit
11750.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70.0% chance to increase this ship's AVI and your CVLs' RLD by 15.0% and decrease the DMG your Carriers take by 15.0% for 8s.

11760.name: Raid Signal
11760.desc: Twice per battle, 5s after this ship has finished loading its Airstrike: launches an additional Dive Bomber airstrike (Lv.10.)

11770.name: Darkness Field
11770.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from Burning and from Bombing Ships by 40.0% and decreases its DMG taken from HE ammo by 15.0%. Also increases this ship's Secondary Gun Crit Rate by 70.0% and makes it ignore enemy armor type (DMG modifier is based on the skill's level.)

11780.name: Ageless Phoenix
11780.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the FP, TRP, and AVI of all enemy ships by 9.0%.

11790.name: Efficacious Planning
11790.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the Burn DMG your Main Fleet takes by 15.0% and increases their Evasion Rate by 10.0%.

11800.name: Crippling Strike
11800.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level. If your fleet contains 4 or more Sakura Empire ships: the loading time of this ship's first Salvo is decreased by 45.0%.

11810.name: Fight to Win!
11810.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 50.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11820.name: Conquer to Loot!
11820.desc: 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: fires a torpedo barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

11830.name: Flowers of Fate
11830.desc: 15s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: launches a randomly selected special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill level and the card combination.)

11840.name: Flowers of Fate
11840.desc: 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: launches a randomly selected special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill level and the card combination.)

11850.name: Flashing Blade of Surabaya
11850.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage and increase this ship's FP and DMG dealt to enemy CLs and CAs by 20.0% for 10s.

11860.name: Mark of Sirius
11860.desc: Increases the AVI of all your CVs and CVLs by 10.0% and increases their Hit Rate against DDs, CLs, and CAs by 10.0%. Additionally, for each CV or CVL in your fleet: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 7.0%.

11870.name: Divine Marksman+
11870.desc: 10s after the battle begins and every 15s after that: fires a special guaranteed Critical Hit barrage (AP ammo; barrage DMG is based on the skill's level) towards the enemy farthest away from this ship. When your Royal Navy ships automatically fire their Main Guns, they have a higher chance of targetting the enemy hit by this barrage. The first time each battle the barrage is fired, its damage is increased by 130%.

11880.name: The Royal Navy Legend
11880.desc: Decreases the Spread Range of this ship's equipped Main Guns by 5. Increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and its Hit Rate against DDs by 15.0%.

11890.name: Miracle Within The Flames
11890.desc: Decreases the Burn DMG this ship takes by 15.0% and decreases its Burn Duration by 3s. Once per battle, if this ship's HP falls below 25.0%: increases its Evasion Rate by 30.0% for 10s.

11900.name: Protector of the North Passage
11900.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: commences a Scan that reveals the location of all enemy Submarines for 10s. Additionally, launches a special airstrike with Anti-Sub Swordfishes; For 10 seconds, all enemy Submarines are slowed for 40% (DMG is based on the skill's level).

11910.name: Patriotic Spirit
11910.desc: When this ship uses Eagle Union aircraft: increases respective gear efficiency by 15.0%.

11920.name: Knights of the Sky
11920.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 TBF Avenger airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship is sortied with 1 or more Cleveland-class CLs: increases your Cleveland-class CLs's FP by 8.0%, increases this ship's AVI and Accuracy by 15.0%, and improves the TBF Avenger airstrike.

11930.name: Fantastical Takeoff
11930.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 80% chance to launch an additional airstrike using B25 bombers.

11940.name: Observer of the Sky and Sea
11940.desc: 10s after the battle starts: launches an F6F recon plane and increases this ship's Accuracy by 3.0% and DMG dealt by 7.0% every 8s (this buff can stack up to 5 times.) If the recon plane is shot down: launches a special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

11950.name: Concerto of the Unfreezing Port
11950.desc: Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 30.0%, DMG dealt against DDs by 15.0%, and the TRP of all your Royal Navy DDs by 12.0%.

11960.name: Star of the Shimmering Fjord
11960.desc: When this ship fires its first wave of Torpedoes in battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

11970.name: Morale Boost
11970.desc: Every 10 times this ship fires its Main Guns: increases this ship's RLD by 5.0% and increases the DMG of its All-Out Assault by 40.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times.)

11980.name: Task Force Leader
11980.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When sortied as the Flagship: increases the FP of your Eagle Union BBs by 15.0%. When sortied in any other position: increases the FP and AA of your Eagle Union DDs by 15.0%.

11990.name: Unwavering Resolution
11990.desc: While there are no other CVs or CVLs in the same fleet as this ship: increases your Main Fleet's AA by 12.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional special Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; which squadrons gets launched is based on the number of CVs and CVLs in your fleet.)

12000.name: Here to Help
12000.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG your CVs and CVLs take by 10.0%. When sortied with Gridley: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and increases Gridley's FP and RLD by 15.0%.

12010.name: From the Seas to the Skies
12010.desc: When this boat enters the battle: launches a Saiun seaplane and increases DMG dealt by your Main Fleet by 10.0% for 10s.

12030.name: The Dark-Dispelling Flame
12030.desc: Every 8 times this ship hits a target with its Main Guns: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% and RLD by 25.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times.) When fully stacked: improves this ship's All Out Assault barrage.

12040.name: Whimsical Inventor
12040.desc: Every 12s: Activates special prototype equipment Lv.10 one time (Effectiveness is based on the skill's level).

12050.name: Torpedoes: Ready!
12050.desc: Every 35s (20s at max level): fires a torpedo barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

12060.name: Priestess of the Sacred Mountain
12060.desc: Every 20s: decreases the Burn DMG your Main Fleet takes by 60.0% for 8s.

12070.name: Take the Initiative!
12070.desc: If there are 3 or more Sakura Empire ships in your fleet: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike 12s after the battle starts.

12080.name: Crimson God's Protection
12080.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: grants 100% Evasion Rate for 5.0s to the ship in your Vanguard which has the lowest percentage of their HP remaining.

12090.name: Taste My Wrath!
12090.desc: Every 8s: increases this ship's FP by 80. When this buff has stacked 3 times: launches a special barrage, removes the FP buffs, and resets the stack to 0. When this ship is equipped with an Secondary Gun: improves the special barrage.

12100.name: Iron Blood Hatchling
12100.desc: Increases the AVI, AA, and RLD of this ship by 5.0% for each Iron Blood ship in your fleet at the start of the battle.

12110.name: Destiny Draw
12110.desc: Every 20s: launches a random Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: increases this ship's LCK by 7.

12120.name: Wahrheit
12120.desc: This ship's first Volley will always Critically Hit. While equipping a CL Gun in the Auxiliary Weapon slot: sets the Range of the CL Gun to 90 and decreases their DMG by 35%.

12130.name: Unwavering Strength
12130.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo while sortied as the Flagship: 70% chance to fire a special barrage. Also increases the DMG of all your Iron Blood Carriers by 20.0%.

12140.name: Will of the Iron Blood
12140.desc: Increases the Main Gun, Torpedo, and Airstrike Crit Rate of all your Iron Blood ships by 20.0%, increases their RLD by 12.0%, and increases Tirpitz's DMG by 40.0%.

12150.name: Armament Optimization
12150.desc: Every 24s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage. While equipping the Quadruple 356 mm Main Gun: decreases this ship's first Salvo load time by 75.0%, increases its Main Gun Crit Rate by 20.0%, decreases its Spread Range by 2, and improves the barrage.

12160.name: The Glory of the Never-Setting Sun
12160.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against Sakura Empire, Iron Blood, Sardegna Empire, and Siren ships by 10.0%. When your fleet contains 3 or more Royal Navy ships (excluding this ship): increases this ship's FP, RLD, EVA, and AA by 20.0%.

12180.name: The Light of an Oath
12180.desc: Once per battle, when this boat is called into battle and until it retreats: if the HP of one of your ships falls below 20%: launches a torpedo barrage. If Bismarck is in your fleet: improves the barrage.

12190.name: Devilish Strike
12190.desc: After the battle begins and every 20s after that: fires a special barrage and increases this ship's FP and TRP by 24.0%. These buffs will weaken over 20s until they completely disappear and the skill reactivates.

12210.name: Kolibri Assault
12210.desc: 10s after the battle begins and every 30s after that while equipping the FI 282: launches 1 FI 282, revealing the location of enemy SS, reducing their EVA by 15.0%, and increasing their damage taken by 15.0% for 10s.

12220.name: Youthful Light
12220.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to decrease the FP, TRP, and AVI of all enemies by 12.0% for 10s.

12230.name: Girls' Support
12230.desc: 30.0% chance when an Anti-Air Gun in your fleet fires: increases this ship's AA by 25.0%. Additionally, once per battle, if Li'l Sandy's or Clevelad's HP falls below 40.0%: increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 25.0% for 15s.

12240.name: Calibur's Heart
12240.desc: When sortied with any Cleveland-class ship: increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and Accuracy by 10.0%.

12250.name: Calibur's Carrier
12250.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0% when sortied in the frontmost position in the Vanguard. When sortied with Li'l Sandy or Lena: decreases the Main Gun DMG they take by 8.0%.

12260.name: Starlit Debut
12260.desc: 1s after the battle begins: for 30s, increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ASW by 10.0% and decreases the DMG your fleet takes from enemy aircraft by 6.0%.

12270.name: Sparkling Star
12270.desc: Every 14s: fire a Lv.10 special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

12280.name: Destruction Mode - Prototype
12280.desc: Every 20s: 80.0% chance for this ship to enter Destruction Mode, firing a powerful barrage, increasing this ship's Crit Damage by 50.0% for 10s, and decreasing your Vanguard's DMG taken from aircraft by 30.0%.

12290.name: Safety First!
12290.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and decreases its Ramming DMG taken by 25.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: this ship evades all enemy attacks for 5.0s and its DMG dealt is increased by 15.0% until the battle ends.

12300.name: Swift Shooting
12300.desc: When this ship fires its Anti-Air Guns: 30.0% chance to increase your Vanguard's AA by 30.0% for 10s. For every 5 enemy aircraft shot down in your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP by 1.0% and decreases the DMG your Main Fleet takes from enemy aircraft by 1.0%. Can be stacked up to 10 times.

12310.name: Swift Analysis
12310.desc: Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 30.0% and its Hit Rate against enemy DDs and CLs by 10.0%. When this ship hits an enemy with its Main Guns: 10.0% chance to decrease that enemy's Evasion Rate by 10.0% for 6s.

12320.name: Poisonous Sting
12320.desc: When this ship hits an enemy with 10 consecutive shots: increases that enemy's DMG taken from DD guns and torpedoes by 12.0% for 5s. When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 2.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 10 times.

12330.name: Vichya's Vindictive Blade
12330.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA and TRP by 20.0% for 30s, after which point this buff will decrease in effectiveness over 20s until it is gone.

12350.name: Unyielding Magician
12350.desc: When this ship is below 80.0% Max HP: increases her FP and TRP by up to 40, based on the percentage of missing HP. Additionally, once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: increases this ship's AA by 12.0% until the end of the battle.

12360.name: Messenger of Love
12360.desc: When sortied with other DDs: increases this ship's AA, FP, and Accuracy by 15.0%. Once per battle, if one of your DDs' HP falls below 50.0%: fires a special barrage.

12370.name: Glen Assault
12370.desc: When this boat enters the battle: launches a special Type 0 Small Recon Seaplane airstrike (DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat.) Increases Accuracy by 10.0% for all SSs and SSVs in your fleet.

12380.name: Destructive Departure
12380.desc: When this boat resurfaces: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this boat hits an enemy with this barrage and its Main Guns: 70.0% chance to decrease the enemy's Accuracy and RLD by 10.0% for 15s.

12390.name: Turning The Tables!
12390.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to Carriers by 20.0%. When this boat resurfaces: fires a special guaranteed Critical Hit torpedo barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

12400.name: Great Shark's Bite
12400.desc: Increases this boat's Accuracy by 15.0%. When called into battle when placed in the first or last position in the Submarine Fleet: continues advancing beyond its starting position then returns to it after 18s.

12410.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-101
12410.desc: Increases Evasion Rate by 7.0% and DMG to DDs and CLs by 7.0% for all your Iron Blood SSs. For each Iron Blood SS in your fleet: increases this boat's TRP and RLD by 6.0%.

12420.name: Sharpshooter of Londinium
12420.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 30.0% chance to deal double DMG with them. When this ship sinks an enemy: increases its Accuracy by 1.5% (can be stacked up to 8 times.)

12430.name: Lucky A
12430.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases this ship's EVA by 12 and decreases DMG taken from enemy torpedoes by 20.0% for your Main Fleet. Every 20s: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

12440.name: Just Gettin' Fired Up
12440.desc: Every time the fleet this ship is in defeats an enemy fleet during a sortie: increases own FP by 2.5%. After 5 enemy fleets have been defeated: reduces DMG taken by the Main Fleet by 8.0%. During combat, for every enemy this ship sinks: increases own FP by 2.5% (stacks up to 7 times).

12460.name: Guardian Piscis
12460.desc: Allied SS and SSV take 15.0% reduced damage and heal for 8.0% of their max HP when retreating from battle.

12470.name: Double The Gato
12470.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to enemy CVs by 20.0%. When this boat resurfaces and when it retreats: fires a special torpedo barrage Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level.) When sortied with Albacore: increases the DMG of this barrage's torpedoes by 15.0%.

12480.name: APsolute Ammunition
12480.desc: Changes the ammo type of this ship's Main Guns to Special AP Lv.10. The DMG bonus of this ammo is based on the skill's level.

12490.name: Adaptive Tactics
12490.desc: When sortied with Eagle Union CVs or CVLs: increases your fleet's AA by 7.0% and increases Eagle Union CVs and CVLs' AVI by 15.0%. If sortied without Eagle Union CVs or CVLs: increases this ship's FP by 12.0% and EVA by 15.0%.

12500.name: Hellcat's Roar
12500.desc: While this ship has an F6F Hellcat equipped: increases the gear efficiency of this ship's Fighters by 30.0% and, when this ship launches an Airstrike, this ship has a 75.0% chance to launch an additional F6F Hellcat airstrike.

12520.name: Tenacious Knight of the Sea
12520.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases Burn Duration by 3s for this ship and your Flagship. When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0% for 8s. Effect does not stack.

12530.name: Resolute Knight of the Sea
12530.desc: When this ship takes DMG: 10.0% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 40.0% for 5s. Has an 8s cooldown between activations. Once per battle, when this ship's HP has fallen below 30.0%: this ship evades all enemy attacks for 5s.

12540.name: I'll Handle This!
12540.desc: When this ship fires its Anti-Air Guns: 25.0% to increase AA by 30.0% for 5s for all Eagle Union ships in your fleet. Every 13 times this ship's Main Guns hit an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 8.0%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

12550.name: Longbow of Woodstock
12550.desc: When sortied with an Eagle Union ship: increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 40.0% and its FP and TRP by 20.0%.

12560.name: Bache In The Sky
12560.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from enemy aircraft by 30.0%. When any ship in the fleet fires their Anti-Air Guns: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's AA by 30.0% for 8s.

12570.name: Supporting Wings
12570.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. While this ship has a Albacore equipped: increases the gear efficiency of the slot it's equipped in by 15.0% and, when this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch a Fairey Albacore airstrike with an 80.0% chance to cause Flooding DMG for 9s to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat.)

12580.name: Don't Move An Inch!
12580.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 80% chance to set the Speed of all enemies to 0 for 1.5s. After that, this effect will fade for 2.5s before completely ending. This skill will always activate on the ship's first Airstrike launch of each battle.

12590.name: Armoured Hangar
12590.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken (excluding this ship) by 8.0% for 10s.

12600.name: Rosa Bombardamento
12600.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 65.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) While this ship has the Triple 381mm Main Gun (M1934) equipped: improves the barrage and increases its proc chance by 10.0%.

12610.name: Sardegnian Discipline
12610.desc: At the start of the battle, deploys 2 shields that can each block up to 2 enemy torpedoes around this ship and the ship in the frontmost position in your Vanguard. Additionally, increases this ship's FP by 20.0% for its first 3 battles of each sortie.

12620.name: Terni Shields
12620.desc: When this ship takes DMG: 18.0% chance to deploy 2 shields that can each block up to 10 shells (shields last for 12s.)

12630.name: Semi-Armor Piercing High-Explosive
12630.desc: While this ship has an HE or SAP Main Gun equipped: increases its Main Gun DMG dealt by 12.0% but loses the ability to ignite enemies. While this ship has an AP Main Gun equipped: 8.0% chance to cause enemies hit with the gun to take 15.0% more DMG from this ship for 10s.

12640.name: Sardegnian Coercion
12640.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 50% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

12650.name: Fading Memories of Glory
12650.desc: 10s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat.) 5s after this ship fires its first Volley: for the rest of the battle, increases this ship's FP by 15.0%, DMG dealt to enemy CLs by 20.0%, and sets this ship's TRP stat to 0.

12660.name: Ricarica!
12660.desc: Increases this ship's Torpedo DMG by 50.0% for its first 3 Torpedo launches.

12670.name: Fuoco di Copertura!
12670.desc: Every 20s, if this ship is in the backmost position of your Vanguard (there must be 2 or more ships alive in your Vanguard): 70.0% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and increase the DMG dealt by the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard by 15.0% for 10s.

12680.name: Rain and Snow
12680.desc: If Yukikaze is afloat in your fleet at the start of the battle, activates the following buffs: increases this ship's TRP by 15.0% and has a 70.0% chance to fire a powerful barrage every 20s; if Yukikaze is not in your fleet: as long as Shigure is afloat, decreases the DMG your ships (excluding this one) take by 5.0% and, once per battle when the HP of another ship in your fleet falls below 20.0%, restores 10.0% of said ship's max HP.

12690.name: Codebreaking Game
12690.desc: After entering the battle, applies a random Lv.10 buff to all your Iron Blood ships which lasts until the end of the battle.

12700.name: Spirited Guidance
12700.desc: Every 15s: changes this ship's Main Gun ammo type to  Purple for 8s.

12710.name: Passionate Tempo
12710.desc: When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's AA by 8.0% for 8s (can be stacked up to 4 times.)

12720.name: Armor-Penetrating Arrow
12720.desc: Once every third time this ship fires its Main Guns: the next shot fired will use  Blue ammo.

12730.name: Shining Steps
12730.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the backmost position in your Vanguard and there are at least 2 ships in your Vanguard: 32.0% chance to decrease any instance of DMG taken by 24.0% for all ships in your Vanguard.

12740.name: Airborne Dualism
12740.desc: At the start of the battle, if there are an odd number of  ships in your fleet: launches a Lv.10 Dive Bomber airstrike 10s after this ship launches its first Airstrike. If the number of  ships is even: launches a Lv.10 Torpedo Bomber airstrike 10s after this ship launches its first Airstrike.

12750.name: Crimson Overture
12750.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 40.0%. Increases this ship's AVI by 10.0% for each additional  ship in the same fleet as this ship (can be stacked up to 4 times.)

12760.name: High-Explosive Volley Fever
12760.desc: At the start of the battle and 70.0% chance every 20s after that: for 12s, changes this ship's Main Gun ammo type to  Red.

12770.name: Soothing Shield
12770.desc: Every 30s: deploys 2 rotating shields that can each block up to 10 shells. Shields last for 15s. At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position in your Vanguard: immediately deploys these shields.

12780.name: Cur Battant
12780.desc: Each Main Gun reload gives this ship 2 Salvoes that can be fired independently. This ship's Main Gun ammo type is changed to Lv.10  shells (shell DMG is based on the skill's level,) switching between  Red and  Blue when it fires a Salvo. Additionally, decreases the reload time of this ship's first Salvo by 25.0%.

12790.name: Polaris Protocol
12790.desc: At the start of the battle, if there are an odd number of  ships in your fleet: increases this ship's DMG by 12.0%. If their number is even: decreases the DMG this ship takes by 15.0%. For 10s after this ship fires a Salvo: increases the FP, TRP, and AVI of your  ships by 6.0% (can be stacked 2 times.)

12810.name: Unleashed Tactics
12810.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). While in an Exercise: improves the firing pattern of the barrage.

12820.name: Unyielding Shield
12820.desc: While this ship is afloat, when one of your Main Fleet ship takes DMG: 70.0% chance to decrease the DMG your Main Fleet takes for 15s. Has a 20s cooldown between activations. Once per battle, when this ship's HP drops below 20.0%: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

12830.name: Noshiro's Hoarfrost
12830.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 15.0% and decreases the torpedo DMG your Vanguard takes by 20.0%.

12840.name: Skyslayer's Edge
12840.desc: Increases the DMG this ship deals to enemy CVs and CVLs by 20.0%. While this ship is afloat: increases the TRP of your Vanguard by 20.0%, improve Crit Rate by 12.0%.

12850.name: Demonblade
12850.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP, AA, and ASW by 15.0%. While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG your SSs and SSVs take by 15.0%.

12860.name: Swirling Cherry Blossoms
12860.desc: The first 3 Airstrikes launched by this ship will heal 3 times over 3 seconds, each heal targeting the allied surface ship with lowest percentage of remaining HP. Each heal restores HP equal to 3.0% of Ryuuhou's maximum HP. If the fleet this ship is in enters battle with 3 ships afloat in the Main Fleet, the healing from this skill is increased by 100.0%.

12870.name: Dancing Waves
12870.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken from enemy SS torpedoes by 12.0%. When your Submarine Fleet enters the battle: heals 20.0% HP to each boat in your Submarine Fleet. Whenever a boat in your Submarine Fleet sinks an enemy ship: increases Ryuuhou's DMG by 3.5% (can be stacked up to 6 times).

12880.name: Demon's Wish
12880.desc: Increases the torpedo DMG this ship deals by 15.0%. When this ship fires its torpedoes: 30.0% chance to launch a second wave of torpedoes.

12890.name: Foo and Friends
12890.desc: At the start of the battle, if Kasumi is sortied with 2 or more friends in your Vanguard: increases the TRP of your Sakura Empire Vanguard ships by 15.0%.

12900.name: Phoenix's Plumage
12900.desc: When this ship fires its torpedoes: 30.0% chance to launch a second wave of torpedoes. Once per battle, when this ship's HP drops below 20.0%: restores 20.0% of this ship's max HP.

12910.name: Destroyer Division 6: Hibiki
12910.desc: When sortied with Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, or Inazuma: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0%. Effect does not stack.

12930.name: Dido's Aria
12930.desc: Increases the FP, TRP, and AA of all your Dido-class CLs by 15.0%. At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0% for 30s.

12940.name: For the Queen
12940.desc: Increases this ship's FP, AA, and RLD by 6.0% for every other Royal Navy ship in your fleet at the start of the battle (can be stacked up to 4 times.) When sortied with Queen Elizabeth: increases Queen Elizabeth's FP, RLD, EVA, and Accuracy by 7.0% and Main Gun Crit Rate by 20.0%.

12950.name: The Fighting G
12950.desc: Increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 5.0%. Every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 2.0% for the rest of the battle (can be stacked up to 5 times.)

12960.name: Protective Blaze
12960.desc: Once per battle, when the HP of any ship in your fleet falls below 50.0%: for 12s, increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases the DMG taken by the ship whose HP fell below the threshold by 15.0%.

12970.name: Practical Instruction
12970.desc: At the start of the battle: for 80s, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0%, increases its DMG dealt by 15.0%, and decreases the DMG taken by all DDs (excluding this ship) in your fleet by 12.0%.

12980.name: The Blue Cruiser
12980.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for 50s and lowers the Speed of enemies hit by it (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level.) Additionally, when this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 2.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times.)

12990.name: Trajectory Marking
12990.desc: At the start of the battle, increases Main Gun Efficiency by 10.0% and Accuracy by 15.0% for all your Northern Parliament DDs that have a Northern Parliament Main Gun equipped.

13000.name: Cavalier of the Ether
13000.desc: Every 15s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage and inflict Burn for 6s to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13010.name: Cavalier's Acumen
13010.desc: Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 15.0%, DMG dealt to enemy DDs by 20.0%, and Main Gun shell velocity by 15.0%. Additionally, decreases the Evasion Rate of enemy DDs by 10.0%.

13020.name: Lod Obstrel
13020.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13030.name: Warcry of Unity
13030.desc: For each Northern Parliament and/or Dragon Empery ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times.) This skill only works for the first 2 battles of each sortie this ship takes part in.

13040.name: Mercurial Memories
13040.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to BBs and CAs by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance for it to evade all enemy attacks for 10.0s (has a 20s cooldown when activated.)

13050.name: Long Live the Revolution!
13050.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: increases the FP, TRP, AA, and RLD of all your Northern Parliament ships by 18.0% for 10s. While this ship has the Triple 305mm Main Gun (M1907) equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by 80.0% and decreases its reload time by 35.0% for the first 4 reloads.

13060.name: Icebreaker
13060.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and decreases your DDs' DMG taken by 10.0% until the end of the battle.

13070.name: Soaring Silver Wings
13070.desc: After this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 SB2C Helldiver airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This airstrike inflicts Armor Break to all BBs, BCs, and BBVs hit by it. Armor Break debuff does not stack.

13080.name: Formation Shift
13080.desc: On the 1st, 3rd, and 5th battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. On the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0%.

13090.name: The Fearless Fighting I
13090.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%, activates the following buffs: 1) Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 25.0% for 20s. 2) This ship takes 0 Burn DMG for 30s.

13100.name: Blazing Burst Wings
13100.desc: 1) When this ship fires its Main Guns: 30.0% chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG to 130.0% for 3s (this buff has a 5s cooldown between activations.) 2) When this ship fires its Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a special HE barrage (this barrage has a 10s cooldown between activations.) Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13110.name: One for the Team
13110.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% for 30s; If not in this position, increases this ship's AA by 25.0% until the end of the battle.

13120.name: Vigilant Supporter
13120.desc: At the start of the battle, if there is a CV or CVL afloat in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Crit Rate by 35.0%. For each CV or CVL in the same fleet: increases this ship's DMG to enemy DDs and CLs by 10.0%, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. For the first four battles of each sortie that this ship takes part in: decreases DMG taken by 10.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet.

13130.name: Black Cat Cyclone
13130.desc: Every 20s: launches a Lv.10 seaplane airstrike, increasing this ship's FP by 15.0%, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for 10s, and increasing the damage they take by 10.0% for 10s. Once per battle, if this ship has the PBY-5A Catalina equipped when its HP falls below 40.0%: launches a special seaplane airstrike. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13140.name: Reno Reactor
13140.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and FP by 15.0%. Every second time another ship in your Main Fleet takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and FP by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 2 times) until the end of the battle.

13150.name: Blue Hunter
13150.desc: Increases this boat's DMG against enemy DDs and CLs by 15.0%.

13160.name: Accomplish Any Feat!
13160.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage; the barrage is unaffected by this ship's position in your Main Fleet. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13170.name: Crush Any Contender!
13170.desc: 1) When: a) this ship is afloat, b) the fleet this ship is NOT in has a BB as its Flagship, and c) said fleet is engaging in its 3rd, 4th, or 5th battle: launches a special barrage 20s after the other fleet's battle begins. 2) When this ship is in combat and takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a special Lv.10 barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and has a cooldown of 15s between activations.

13180.name: Legacy of Lunga Point
13180.desc: At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the center of it: increases TRP by 15.0% and Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0% for your DDs and CLs, and also increases the EVA of your DDs by 15.0%.

13190.name: I'm Not Afraid Anymore!
13190.desc: While this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped: decreases its DMG taken by 12.0%; while equipping a Main Gun from any other faction: decreases this ship's AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%, but increases its Main Gun efficiency by 20.0% and Torpedo efficiency by 50.0%, and also fires a special Lv.10 torpedo barrage at the same time as this ship's All Out Assault activates. Torpedo barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13200.name: Knight's Shooting Training
13200.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 3 Salvos by 40.0%, but DMG dealt will be changed to 40.0%, 80.0%, and 120.0% each. From the 4th Salvo onwards: this ship deals 120.0% DMG with its Salvoes.

13210.name: Knight's Formation Drill
13210.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP, RLD, and Accuracy by 5.0% for every Royal Navy ship in the same fleet. Can be stacked up to 4 times.

13230.name: Arbiter of Z
13230.desc: At the start of the battle, if there is an Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion CL or CA in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 15.0% and increases FP and AA by 8.0% for all your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion CLs and CAs.

13240.name: The Iris's Flagbearer
13240.desc: When sortied as the Flagship: increases FP, TRP, Accuracy, and RLD by 15.0% for your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion ships, and also increases DMG dealt by your Iris Libre ships by 6.0% and decreases DMG taken by your Vichya Dominion ships by 6.0%.

13250.name: The Iris's Holy Flame
13250.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This barrage has a 70.0% chance to inflict a special Burn to enemies, dealing 119 DMG per tick and decreasing their FP, TRP, and AVI by 5.0% for 30s.

13260.name: The Iris's Vindication
13260.desc: While this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped: increases its Main Gun DMG by 12.0%. This ship's first Salvo of each battle will always be a Critical Hit if aimed manually.

13270.name: Bellowing Gusts of Fire
13270.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against Burning enemies by 15.0%. 20s after the battle begins, and with a 70% chance whenever this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 barrage that has a chance to Burn enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 10s cooldown if activated by the Main Guns firing.

13280.name: Divine Aegis
13280.desc: At the start of the battle, and once every 30s after that: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 5 enemy torpedoes. While this shield is up: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and its DMG against DDs and BBs by 12.0%. 5s after entering Manual Mode: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and Speed by 8. Switching to Auto Mode removes this buff.

13290.name: La Pucelle
13290.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against Royal Navy ships by 10.0%. When this ship is Burned: increases its FP, TRP, AA, and EVA by 20.0% for as long as it is Burning. This ship will catch fire at the start of the battle, taking 8 DMG every 3s for 30s; all non-Burn DMG has a 10.0% chance to refresh this Burn duration.

13300.name: Holy Prayer
13300.desc: 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: deploys shields around your Vanguard that last for 8s and can absorb up to 6.0% of your Jeanne d'Arc's max HP. If these shields take too much DMG and break: the ship(s) whose shield broke gets 100% Evasion Rate for 2s; if the shield's duration simply runs out: restores 70 HP to the ship(s) with intact shields.

13310.name: Critical Component Protection
13310.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from enemy DD and CL gunfire by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard consists of only CLs and CAs: increases this ship's Speed by 4 and EVA by 15.0%.

13320.name: Shells of Judgment
13320.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 8.0%. Every 5 times this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a special barrage at the nearest enemy to this ship.

13330.name: Sonnez la Charge!
13330.desc: Increases the TRP and EVA of your Vauquelin-class DDs by 15.0% and increases this ship's FP, AA, and Accuracy by 12.0% for 30s after the battle starts.

13340.name: Sacrament: Holy Bombardment
13340.desc: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Auxiliary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by 45.0%, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 50%.

13350.name: Sacrament: Sacred Second Wing
13350.desc: 5s after this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: launches a torpedo barrage and a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) This skill can only activate up to 3 times per battle.

13360.name: Take Off!
13360.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70% chance to launch a special Lv.10 Swordfish airstrike. Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13370.name: Prayer for Love and Peace
13370.desc: 12s after the battle begins and 70% chance every 20s after that: summons an air wing that carries out a special Lv.10 airstrike which decreases Hit Rate against your ships by 30.0% for all enemies hit by it (this debuff will weaken over 4s until it is gone.) Special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

13380.name: The Wonder of Kula Gulf
13380.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and there is an Eagle Union ship in the backmost position (other than this ship): increases that ship's EVA by 12.0%.

13390.name: Lemme At 'Em!
13390.desc: Every 30s: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for 10.0% HP and fires this barrage.

13400.name: Radar Scan Plus
13400.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to apply a debuff to all onscreen enemies, increasing the DMG they take by 40.0% for 10s. When this ship has an SG Radar equipped: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%, and this skill attempts to activate 16s after the beginning of combat (instead of 20s).

13410.name: Mercury's Talaria
13410.desc: This ship starts the battle with 2 Airstrike(s) preloaded, but the loading time of its Airstrikes is increased by 90.0%. Additionally, when this ship launches an Airstrike: heals all ships in your Vanguard for 7.0% and your Main Fleet for 3.5% of their respective max HP.

13420.name: Athena's Catapult
13420.desc: Every 12s after the start of the battle: launches a randomly chosen Lv.10 special airstrike consisting of either Sea Hornets, TBF Avengers, or Fireflies.

13430.name: Waters of Styx
13430.desc: Increases this ship's max Airstrike capacity to 3 and restores 1.0% HP to all ships in the same fleet as this ship once every 20s. 20s after the fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: heals that fleet's Vanguard for 3.0% HP.

13440.name: Synchronized Strike
13440.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage at a randomly chosen enemy (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases Accuracy and RLD by 20.0% for 8s for all your BBs, BCs, and BBVs.

13450.name: Covenant of the Immortal Knights
13450.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 12.0%. When sortied together with any of the following: any King George V-class BB, Monarch, or any 3 (or more) Royal Navy ships: increases this ship's FP and AA by 12.0%.

13460.name: Bombarda Geminio
13460.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; if there are no enemies within 30 units of this ship when this barrage procs: fires a separate Lv.10 special barrage.

13470.name: Supporting Role
13470.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position of the Vanguard: increases this ship's FP, TRP, AA, and RLD by 20.0%. Furthermore, if there are other Royal Navy ships in the same fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0%.

13480.name: All Out Assault, Open Fire!
13480.desc: 5s after the start of the battle, and with a 70% chance every 30s: launches a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13490.name: Torpedo Mode? ...Sure!
13490.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: for 10s, decreases the DMG this ship takes from torpedoes by 20.0% and changes this ship's torpedo barrage.

13500.name: Leading the Way
13500.desc: 10s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit by it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13510.name: Forward!
13510.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50% chance to fire a frontal special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13520.name: Royal Arts: Knight's Arsenal
13520.desc: When equipping a CL Gun in this ship's Secondary Weapon slot: increases that slot's efficiency by 45.0%, sets the gun's Range and Detection Range to 80, and fires a special barrage every 24s; if instead equipping a Dive Bomber: shortens the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 50%.

13530.name: Royal Arts: Swordbearing Eagle
13530.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 Swordfish torpedo bomber airstrike.

13550.name: The Smiling Sawfish
13550.desc: Increases this boat's Torpedo Crit Rate by 20.0%. At the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13560.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-96
13560.desc: Increases Accuracy by 10.0% and Crit DMG by 15.0% for all your Iron Blood SSs. Additionally, for each Iron Blood SS in your fleet: increases this boat's Accuracy, RLD, and EVA by 6.0%.

13570.name: Torpedo-Deflecting Field
13570.desc: 10s after the start of the battle: deploys a shield that lasts 20s and can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes. If this shield is destroyed: fires a retaliatory Lv.10 special torpedo barrage and redeploys this shield 30s later.

13580.name: Hope's Tempest
13580.desc: 3s after the battle starts: launches a Saiun recon flight. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 Shiden Kai 2, Ryuusei, or Saiun airstrike. Saiuns do not attack, but decrease the FP, TRP, and AA of one random enemy (humanoids prioritized) by 3.0% and increase the DMG they take by 3.0% until the battle ends. This debuff can stack up to 3 times.

13590.name: Dreamwaker's Bow
13590.desc: Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage. During the 1st and 2nd battles this ship fights in during a sortie: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When the fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 3rd, 4th, and 5th battles of a sortie: launches a Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) 15s after the battle starts.

13600.name: Protector of the New Moon
13600.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases the FP, EVA, and ASW of your DDs by 15.0%. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: decreases the DMG this ship takes from Main Guns and Aircraft by 20.0% and increases AVI and Accuracy by 15.0% for all your Sakura Empire CVs.

13610.name: Kii Fleet Strategy
13610.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13620.name: Stalwart Advance
13620.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases AA by 15.0% for your Sakura Empire Main Fleet ships. If the fleet this ship is in contains 3 (or more) Sakura Empire ships: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and increases your Vanguard's TRP by 10.0%.

13630.name: Suzutsuki, Breaking Through!
13630.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% for each Sakura Empire ship in the same fleet as this ship; when an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: adds 1 stack of this buff. Can stack up to 6 times.

13640.name: Suzutsuki, Causing Confusion!
13640.desc: 3s after the battle starts and every 15s after that: fires a special barrage and has a 30.0% chance to deploy a smokescreen for 5s that increases EVA rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level and the first smokescreen is guaranteed to deploy.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: heals this ship for 15.0% HP.

13650.name: Robust Ballasts
13650.desc: For the first 3 battles of a sortie this ship fights in: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by 10.0%. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's Speed by 10.

13660.name: Cargo Fire Precautions
13660.desc: While this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases the Burn DMG it takes by 15.0% and shortens the duration of Burn effects by 6s.

13670.name: Veil of Night
13670.desc: After this ship takes DMG 3 times in battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0% until the battle ends. During the 2nd, 4th, and 6th battles of a sortie this ship fights in: heals this ship for 10.0% HP 60s after the battle starts. If there are 2 (or more) Sakura Empire ships in the same fleet as this ship: improves this ship's All Out Assault.

13680.name: Strike Team, Attack!
13680.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: 70% chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.

13690.name: Chiyoda's Domain?
13690.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches its first Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 seaplane airstrike; when it launches its second Airstrike and onwards: 70% chance to launch an additional torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If there is a Sakura Empire CVL in the same fleet as this ship: improves these airstrikes.

13710.name: Evasive Scramble
13710.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike (airstrikes launched via skills do not count): decreases this ship's aviation DMG taken by 70% for 8s. When this buff wears off: 70% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 TBF Avenger airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

13720.name: Extinguishing Gale
13720.desc: When sortied with Birmingham or when there are at least 3 Eagle Union ships in the fleet: decreases your Vanguard's Burn DMG taken by 15.0% and Burn duration by 3s; if this ship is your Flagship: further decreases your Vanguard's Burn duration by 3s.

13730.name: Encore Flare
13730.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 Muse barrage that increases DMG taken by 10.0% for 6s to all enemies hit; if only 1 enemy is hit then their Speed is also set to 0 for 3s and this ship fires an additional torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13740.name: Bilateral Accompaniment
13740.desc: At the start of the battle and every 30s after that: deploys 2 shields that last for 15s; the blue shield can block up to 8 enemy shells, the red shield causes DMG upon contact with an enemy up to 8 times.

13750.name: Scarlet Waltz
13750.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's HP is above 45.0% when launching this airstrike: the airstrike becomes more powerful, but this ship takes 200 DMG.

13760.name: Soaring Opening
13760.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AVI by 6.0% for each additional Muse ship in the same fleet (can be stacked up to 4 times.) Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% from being attacked: fires a Lv.10 barrage that heals this ship for 8.0% of the DMG dealt (which is based on the skill's level). After this barrage is fired: decreases the load time of this ship's next Airstrike by 20.0%.

13770.name: Heavenly Hymn
13770.desc: Every 20s after the start of the battle: this ship stops moving for 3s and summons a Lv.10 Iris Angels Airwing to attack (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level). Additionally, this skill has a 50.0% chance to heal this ship for 3.0% HP when activated.

13780.name: Moment of Slackery
13780.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by 20.0%, and by another 3.0% whenever this ship sinks an enemy (can be stacked up to 3 times; resets between battles). Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 25s: heals all DDs in the same fleet for 3.0% of their max HP.

13790.name: Auspice of the Stars
13790.desc: When this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: decreases the Speed of all enemies by 30.0% for 4s and randomly activates one of the following effects: a) Decreases all enemies' EVA by 15.0% for 10s, b) For 10s, increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by 15.0% and decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken by 10.0%, c) For 10s, increases your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% and decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by 10.0%.

13800.name: Blue Spirit
13800.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13810.name: Lyrical Dedication
13810.desc: At the start of the battle, if your Vanguard is comprised of only this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage every 20s and increases the AA of your Flagship by 15.0%; if there are other ships present: fires a Lv.10 powerful barrage every 20s and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and AA and Accuracy by 15.0%. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13820.name: An Opener to Our Friends
13820.desc: For every 2 enemies this ship sinks: increases this ship's AA by 10.0% for the duration of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times). Additionally, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 60s after the start of the battle.

13830.name: Beckoning of Ice
13830.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a special barrage and spawns Snezhinka, a summon which fights for 50s and inflicts a 5.0% aircraft DMG taken debuff to all enemies it hits 10 times (its DMG dealt and active duration is based on the skill's level).

13840.name: Blue-Purple Tenacity
13840.desc: For the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP by 12.0%; from the 4th battle onwards: instead increases this ship's AA by 12.0%.

13850.name: Universal Surprise!
13850.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by 20. When this boat resurfaces: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to inflict Armor Break. When this boat retreats from the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage with a 70.0% chance to Burn enemies. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

13860.name: Armor-Piercing Hypercharge
13860.desc: At the start of the battle, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s after that: changes this ship's ammo type to Lv.10 special AP for 10s.

13870.name: Blazing Choreography
13870.desc: At the start of the battle: if there is a CV, CVL, or Muse ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and increases your Vanguard's AA by 15.0%.

13880.name: Iron Blood Falcon
13880.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13890.name: Paralyzing Advance
13890.desc: Decreases the Speed of all enemies by 8.0%. Once every second: 10.0% chance to set the Speed of all enemies to 0 for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).

13900.name: Iron Wings, Blood Pinions
13900.desc: For each Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 4 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: reduces the time needed for your Iron Blood CVs and CVLs to reload their first 3 Airstrikes by 10.0%.

13910.name: Sic 'em, Eisen!
13910.desc: If there is at least 1 other Iron Blood ship in the same fleet: increases this ship's RLD and EVA by 15.0%. When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50.0% chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG by 25.0% for 3s (7s cooldown between activations).

13920.name: Heinrich's Hunch Punch
13920.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys one of the following 2 types of shields, both lasting for 10s, chosen at random: 1) blocks 2 torpedoes, 2) blocks 10 shells.

13930.name: Westward Trident
13930.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by 20 and DMG against Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. When this boat resurfaces: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

13940.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-37
13940.desc: Increases this boat's Speed by 3 and RLD by 18.0%. For each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet: increases this boat's TRP, EVA, and Accuracy by 6.0%.

13950.name: The Lonesome Lookout
13950.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70.0% chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). At the start of the battle, if there are 3 or more Iron Blood ships in the same fleet: increases this ship's Crit DMG by 20.0%; if there are no other Iron Blood ships: instead increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% and AA by 15.0% and further increases the proc chance of this ship's special airstrike by 30.0%.

13960.name: Galvanizing Shield
13960.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: deploys a shield that lasts for 8s and can block 6 shells on a randomly chosen ship in your Vanguard; if the shield is deployed on an Iron Blood ship: also increases that ship's FP by 15.0% for 8s and heals Weser for 5.0% HP.

13970.name: Follow My Lead... Please!
13970.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases the EXP earned by SSs and SSVs that participated in the battle by 10.0%.

13980.name: No Strange Ideas, Please!
13980.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by 10.0% and the AA of your Iron Blood ships by 15.0%. Whenever 3 enemy aircraft are shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times).

13990.name: Boon of Crimson Darkness
13990.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against DDs and CLs by 15.0%. Once per battle, when the HP of one of your Z-class DDs (excluding this ship) falls below 30.0%: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 30.0% and increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0% until the end of the battle.

14000.name: Fiendish Rampage
14000.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Whenever this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 4.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 5 times).

14010.name: I Love My Sisters!
14010.desc: Increases FP and Accuracy by 10.0% and AA by 15.0% for your Z-class DDs; if there is another Z-class DD in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% and ASW by 15.0%.

14020.name: I'll Protect the Vanguard!
14020.desc: At the start of the battle: deploys a smokescreen and fires a special barrage; the smokescreen has a 30.0% chance to proc again every 15s after. When your Flagship takes DMG: 70% chance to fire the same special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 20s cooldown between barrage activations). Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it. Does not stack with other smokescreen skills.

14030.name: Ontological Rudder
14030.desc: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 3.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times). After reaching 5 stacks, this ship gains 5 Speed and fires a special barrage (30s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level).

14040.name: Protologia of Illumination
14040.desc: Every 15s: 50.0% chance to increase the Accuracy of your Vanguard by 20.0% for 10s.

14050.name: Viola Spear
14050.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a special barrage (10s cooldown when activated and DMG is based on the skill's level). When there are 2 or more Sardegnian ships in your fleet: increases this barrage's proc chance by 20.0%.

14060.name: Audacious Challenger
14060.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 45s. While this ship is afloat: increases FP by 10.0% and AA by 15.0% for your Sardegnian Vanguard ships and also decreases DMG taken by your Zara-class ships by 6.0%.

14070.name: Purge Evil
14070.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP and AA by 25.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

14080.name: Unfading Dyes
14080.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 20.0% and decreases its DMG taken by 20.0% until the end of the battle. When sortied with 1 or more other Dragon Empery ships: heals this ship for 8.0% HP at the start of the battle, increases its Speed by 5, and increases your fleet's AA by 20.0% for 50s.

14090.name: Cleanse Impurity
14090.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP and AA by 25.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

14100.name: Enrapturing Dance
14100.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 20.0% and decreases its DMG taken by 20.0% until the end of the battle. When sortied with 1 or more other Dragon Empery ships: heals this ship for 5.0% HP at the start of the battle, increases its Speed by 8, and increases your fleet's ASW by 20.0% for 50s.

14110.name: Heroes of Malta
14110.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs and CLs by 20.0%. When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's EVA and AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times.)

14120.name: Pepperpot
14120.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: decreases its DMG taken by 50.0% for 5s, then restores 15.0% of its max HP.

14130.name: Mysterious Huntress
14130.desc: Increases this boat's DMG dealt to CLs by 15.0%. When this boat resurfaces: fires a special Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14140.name: Scalawaggish Little Snowball
14140.desc: 10.0% chance to activate upon being attacked: fires a special Lv.10 barrage that slows enemies hit (DMG and barrage pattern are based on skill level, 10s CD between activations).

14150.name: Curtain of Rime
14150.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (Barrage DMG is based on this skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate, increases this ship's AA by 50.0% until the next Salvo is fired.
