14160.name: Ingenious Tactician
14160.desc: In battle, when this ship's HP is greater than 60.0%: increases FP by 20.0% and reduces Burn duration by 3s. Twice per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of taking DMG: restores 9.0% of its max HP over 8s. From the third battle of each sortie that this ship participates in: reduces the DMG your vanguard fleet takes by 8.0%.

14170.name: Kirov, Reporting!
14170.desc: Bombing bays ready! Every 15s, 100% chance to trigger a Lv.10 special barrage (Barrage DMG is based on this skill's level).

14180.name: Revolutionary Strike
14180.desc: Increases the Eff. Range and Shell Range of this ship's main gun to 75, and increases the damage this ship deals to Light-Armored enemies by 20.0%. During battle, if there are other Northern Parliament ships in the same fleet as this ship, increases the shelling DMG that all enemy light cruisers take from Northern Parliament ships by 12.0%.

14190.name: Bulwark of Rime
14190.desc: Every 18s: deploys a shield directly in front of this ship that can block up to 8 shells, lasting for up to 8s. If this shield is broken during its duration: immediately triggers a Lv.10 special barrage (Barrage DMG is based on this skill's level), and deploys another shield that can absorb up to 5.0% of this ship's max HP, lasting for up to 4s.

14200.name: Memorial of Ice and Iron
14200.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Northern Parliament or Iron Blood main gun: increases the DMG this ship deals by 12.0%; When equipped with an AP main gun: increases the travel speed of this ship's main gun shells by 10.0%. After this ship sinks 2 enemies in battle: additionally increases this ship's FP and AA by 8.0% (this effect can activate only once per battle and lasts until the end of that battle).

14210.name: Thunderous Guardian
14210.desc: For the first 30s of battle: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and FP by 30.0%; after that, instead increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.

14220.name: Silent Advance
14220.desc: Every 20s: 25.0% chance to launch a wave of torpedoes (these torpedoes are identical to manually fired torpedoes) and dodge all incoming attacks for 3s.

14230.name: Capricious Firing
14230.desc: For the first 45s of battle: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 12.0%; When this ship is equipped with an HE main gun, increases the DMG this ship deals to BBs and BCs by 10.0%.

14240.name: Laid-Back Defending
14240.desc: Reduces the AP DMG this ship takes by 15.0%; Every 20s, 60.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (Barrage DMG is based on this skill's level).

14250.name: Selfless Aid
14250.desc: At the beginning of battle, if there are other ships afloat in the vanguard fleet, increases this ship's Crit Rate by 20.0%. Once per battle, if another ship's HP falls below 20.0% as a result of damage: sacrifices 5.0% of this ship's HP to restore 10.0% HP to that ship; 5s afterward, this ship restores 8.0% Max HP.

14260.name: From Merkuria With Love!
14260.desc: At the beginning of battle, increases this ship's AA and ACC by 15.0%. Every 15s: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that slows the movement speed of enemies hit by 20.0% (Barrage DMG is based on this skill's level).

14270.name: Shooting Gun-Star
14270.desc: Decreases the Burn duration inflicted on this ship by 3s and increases DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increase your fleet's AA by 20.0% for 8s.

14280.name: Bang for Your Buck
14280.desc: When there is at least 1 more Eagle Union ship in the same fleet as this ship or when this ship has sunk 2 or more enemies: increases this ship's TRP and AA by 15.0% until the end of the battle. When this ship equips Eagle Union gear: in battle, this ship additionally equips a special Lv.10 AA gun (Special AA gun DMG is based on the skill's level).

14290.name: Whimsical Protector
14290.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0% for 60s. While there are 3 ships in your Vanguard and this ship is in the middle position: decreases DMG taken by your Vanguard's frontmost ship by 10.0% for 50s, and increases DMG dealt by your Vanguard's backmost ship by 10.0% for 50s.

14300.name: Dutiful Support
14300.desc: While this ship is afloat: reduces the torpedo DMG taken by the Vanguard fleet by 10.0% and the airstrike DMG taken by the Main fleet by 10.0%; During battle: increases this ship's TRP by 10.0%, and then by an additional 10.0% if Agano is in the same fleet.

14310.name: The Eternal Flagship
14310.desc: Every 15s: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate, instead targets 1 random enemy and increases its DMG taken by 10.0% for 8s.

14320.name: Eternal Light of Sardegna
14320.desc: At the start of the battle: increases FP, TRP, and EVA by 15.0% for all Sardegna ships in your Vanguard, and increases FP, AVI, and Accuracy by 12.0% for all Sardegna ships in your Main Fleet. For each additional Sardegna ship in the same fleet (up to 2 at most): decreases the loading time of this ship's first salvo by 40.0%.

14330.name: Banner of Splendor
14330.desc: At the start of the battle, if your fleet contains at least one other Sardegna ship, or if this ship has an AP Main Gun equipped: increases this ship's FP by 12.0%. Additionally, for the first 3 battles of a sortie: the fleet this ship is in takes 20.0% less DMG from torpedoes.

14340.name: Halo of Flames
14340.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's AA, EVA, and Accuracy by 15.0% for 60s. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: 70% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on this skill's level).

14350.name: Solemn Zealotry
14350.desc: Reduces the speed of torpedoes fired by this ship by 1, increases Torpedo Crit Rate by 40.0%, Torpedo Crit DMG by 40.0%, and decreases the loading time of the first Torpedo salvo by 50.0%.

14360.name: Just a Scratch
14360.desc: Reduces the AP DMG this ship takes by 20.0% and the Torp DMG taken by the frontmost ship in your Vanguard by 8.0%. Once per battle, when this ship falls under 30.0% HP as a result of DMG taken: creates a shield, and restores 3.0% max HP every 3s for the next 10s. The shield blocks up to 5 torpedoes and lasts for up to 10s.

14370.name: Freccia dell'Aquila
14370.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 75.0% chance to launch an additional airstrike (DMG and Airstrike pattern are based on this skill's level).

14380.name: Rain of Starlight
14380.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike while having a Fighter equipped in her second gear slot: restores 8.0% HP for the lowest HP percentage ship in your Vanguard and Main Fleet, and generates a shield around those 2 ships that negates DMG equal to 6.0% of their max HP, lasting up to 5s; When this ship instead has a Dive Bomber equipped in her second gear slot: gains 1 preloaded Airstrike, decreases her Airstrike loading time by 10.0%, and increases her DMG dealt by 8.0%.

14390.name: Disarming but Deadly
14390.desc: Reduces the DMG this ship takes by 12.0%; For every 3 enemy aircraft shot down by this ship's aircraft, increases your fleet's AA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

14400.name: The Northwesterly Wind
14400.desc: When any ship in your fleet (other than this one) takes DMG: 30.0% chance to increase EVA by 15.0% for 5s for your Sardegna ships and deploy a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for 5s for ships inside it. Smokescreen has a 15s cooldown and does not stack with other smokescreen skills.

14410.name: Northwesterly Ace Student
14410.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 5 and also increases her FP and TRP by 15.0% if there are any other Sardegna ships in the same fleet.

14420.name: The Southwesterly Wind
14420.desc: When any ship in your fleet (other than this one) takes DMG: 30.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (15s cooldown). DMG is based on the skill's level.

14430.name: Southwesterly Sailor
14430.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 5 and also increases her AA and EVA by 15.0% if there are any other Sardegna ships in the same fleet.

14440.name: The Exploration Sensation
14440.desc: For the first 3 battles of a sortie: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0% and Speed by 5. When the fleet this ship is in defeats an enemy fleet: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

14450.name: Navigator's Intrepidity
14450.desc: Increases DMG taken by enemy CLs by 8.0% while this ship is afloat, but also increases this ship's DMG taken by 1.0%.

14460.name: Turn the Tide
14460.desc: Increases this boat's DMG dealt to enemy DDs by 15.0%. When this boat resurfaces: decreases her DMG taken by 30.0% and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14470.name: Absolute Adaptability
14470.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns and your remaining Vanguard ships have 50.0% of their max HP left or more: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If even 1 ship is below this threshold: instead grants a shield that lasts for 6s and blocks up to 6 shells to the ship in the frontpost position of your Vanguard.

14480.name: Prescient Planning
14480.desc: When this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped: increases her Burn DMG dealt by 10.0%. If she has an AP Main Gun equipped instead: fires a Lv.10 Torpedo barrage every 20s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14490.name: Emergency Beardrop
14490.desc: Decreases the duration of Burns inflicted on this ship by 3s. When this ship sinks an enemy: until the end of the battle, increases this ship's AA by 6.0% and FP by 5.0%, and also increases the ASW of your fleet by 4.0%. This buff can be stacked up to 5 times.

14500.name: Lucky Little E
14500.desc:
100% chance to activate one of the following effects (chosen at random) when this ship launches an Airstrike:
1) Doubles this ship's DMG dealt to all enemies for 6s.
2)Grants this ship 100% Evasion Rate for 5s.
3)Decreases the Speed of all enemies by 30.0% for 4s.

14510.name: Dragon's Breath
14510.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that always deals Critical Hits (DMG is based on the skill's level). Additionally, 10s after the battle starts: fires this barrage.

14520.name: Freedom Through Firepower
14520.desc: Decreases the Spread Range of this ship's equipped Main Gun by 5. When a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle, and while this ship is still afloat: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage 20s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level); if the Flagship of said fleet is an Eagle Union ship: also increases AVI by 15.0% for your Eagle Union CVs and CVLs.

14530.name: Don'tcha Just Love It?
14530.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and RLD by 10.0%. When sortied in a fleet with other Eagle Union ships: increases AA by 15.0% and decreases DMG taken by 5.0% for all your Eagle Union ships, and also increases FP by 10.0% for your Eagle Union BBs and BCs.

14540.name: Wings of Soaring Flames
14540.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike that has a chance to Burn enemies hit by it (Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat).

14550.name: Shielded Advance
14550.desc: Decreases this ship's first 4 instances of DMG taken by 60.0% every battle. At the start of the battle and every 20s after that: targets the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and gives that ship a shield that blocks up to 6 shots, lasting for up to 8 seconds.

14560.name: Advanced Support Formation
14560.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 10.0%. When sortied in a fleet with at least 2 CVs/CVLs: decreases your Flagship's DMG taken by 15.0%.

14570.name: Get Starstruck!
14570.desc: Every 10s after the start of the battle: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate, instead increases this ship's AA and Accuracy by 10.0% for 5s.

14580.name: Right Place at the Right Time
14580.desc:
Increases this ship's EVA and AA by 10.0%. Activates one of the following effects based on this ship's position in your Vanguard during battle:
1) Front (and also when this ship is your last afloat Vanguard ship): increases this ship's EVA and AA by 5.0%, and decreases her DMG taken by 15.0%.
2) Middle: heals all ships in your Vanguard for 10.0% of their max HP 20s after the battle starts.
3) Rear: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and AA by 10.0%, and also increases your whole Vanguard's DMG dealt to enemies by 5.0%.

14590.name: Hottie Hunters
14590.desc: Increases this boat's DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%. When sortied with at least 1 other Eagle Union submarine: increases Crit DMG by 15.0% and increases TRP and Accuracy by 8.0% for all your Eagle Union submarines.

14600.name: Parting Gift
14600.desc: Increases this boat's OXY by 20. When this boat resurfaces, and again when she leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14610.name: The Bigger They Are...
14610.desc: Every 15s during battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Additionally, increases this ship's Crit Rate by 10.0%, and increases her DMG to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%.

14620.name: Breathe In, Breathe Out
14620.desc: While this ship has 45.0% or more HP remaining: increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. When this ship's HP falls below 45.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 15.0% while below this threshold. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0%: heals this ship for 10.0% of her max HP.

14630.name: Supporting Wings - Independence
14630.desc:
Improves the "Knight of the Sky" TBF Avenger airstrike. Additionally, the following buffs are active as long as this ship is afloat (does not stack with the "Supporting Wings" skill):
1) At the start of the battle, increases AVI by 12.0% and RLD by 10.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the same fleet this ship is in, and decreases the load time of this ship's first Airstrike by 25.0%.
2) At the start of the battle, increases RLD and AVI by 8.0% for all CVs and CVLs in the fleet this ship is NOT in.

14650.name: Strike Orders Received!
14650.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by 10.0%. While there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard: increases your Vanguard's FP and Accuracy by 10.0%.

14660.name: Torpedo Orders Received!
14660.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: 30.0% chance to launch a second wave of torpedoes.

14670.name: Gales and Thunder
14670.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by 5.0% and RLD by 15.0%. Whenever this ship's All-Out Assault skill activates: decreases the loading time of this ship's next Torpedo wave by 3.0s.

14680.name: Kazagumo's Air Raid Assistance
14680.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases DMG dealt by your CVs and CVLs by 15.0% (does not stack with "Air Raid Assistance"). When this ship fires her 4th wave of Torpedoes: restores 10.0% HP for the lowest HP percentage CV/CVL currently afloat in your fleet; if your Flagship is a CV: additionally restores 5.0% HP for that ship.

14700.name: Foo and Friends and Kasumi Too
14700.desc: At the start of the battle, if Kasumi is sortied with 2 or more friends in your Vanguard: increases the TRP of your Sakura Empire Vanguard ships by 15.0%. Additionally, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, every 20s after the start of the battle: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14710.name: Destruction Bolt
14710.desc: Every 20s after the start of battle: launches a Lv.10 special barrage with a special Swordfish airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) that reduces the AA of enemies hit by 8.0% for 5s, and increases the DMG dealt by destroyers and Royal Navy Vanguard ships by 10.0% for 8s.

14720.name: Support Robot Mk IV
14720.desc: 3s after the battle starts and every 20s: summons a support robot for 10s. When summoned, the robot: 1) fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and spawns 2 shields that can each block up to 10 enemy shells, lasting for up to 5s; 2) heals the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest % of HP left for 0.5% of her max HP 3 times over 10s; 3) increases your fleet's AA by 15.0% while it is deployed.

14730.name: Combat Mechanic
14730.desc: Increases this ship's AA by 50.0% of her total TRP stat (base stats plus gear) and decreases the Burn DMG she takes by 15.0%. This ship heals herself for 1.0% of her max HP every 15s in combat.

14740.name: The Intrepid Nautilus
14740.desc: At the start of the battle: this boat moves forward a set distance, then fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and briefly resurfaces. Afterwards, she submerges and moves back into attack position, then fires a stronger Lv.10 torpedo barrage. This boat takes 60.0% less DMG while resurfaced as part of this skill's effect.

14750.name: Lure
14750.desc: When this boat is hit by an enemy: increases that enemy's DMG taken by 8.0% for 3s. If the enemy is a DD: also decreases that enemy's Speed by 20.0% for 5s.

14760.name: Sunglint Phantasm
14760.desc: Increases this ship's FP, AA, and ASW by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if there is a Sakura Empire DD afloat in your Vanguard: every 18s, targets your Vanguard ship with the lowest % of HP left and heals her for 3.0% HP (can activate up to 4 times per battle); if no Sakura Empire DD is present, instead increases this ship's TRP by 15.0% and, with a 70.0% chance every 18s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

14770.name: Blessed Self
14770.desc: Increases your Sakura Empire DDs' TRP and RLD by 10.0% and AA by 20.0%.

14780.name: All-Seeing Eye
14780.desc: At the start of the battle and every 20s: decreases this ship's Speed by 5.0% for 3s and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat). Enemies hit by seaplanes launched from this barrage have their Speed decreased by 30.0% for 5s, and both the following effects activate: 1) if there is a Sakura Empire CV afloat in your Main Fleet when this barrage fires: 50.0% chance to inflict a 6.0% aircraft DMG taken debuff for 8s to enemies hit by the barrage; 2) 100% chance to inflict 1 of the following randomly chosen debuffs for 10s: a) decreases EVA by 10.0%; b) decreases Accuracy by 10.0%; c) decreases the enemy's DMG dealt by 10.0%.

14790.name: All-Obscuring Eye
14790.desc: When this ship's Speed decreases as a result of her skills activating: increases her Evasion Rate by 10.0% for the duration of the decrease. Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 70.0% chance to decrease her Speed by 10.0% and increase her RLD, FP, and EVA by 20.0% for 7s (10s cooldown between activations).

14800.name: Reverent and Graceful
14800.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases your DDs' and CLs' Accuracy and Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0%.

14810.name: Delicate but Devoted
14810.desc: When this ship launches her Torpedoes: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0% for 10s.

14820.name: Motivating Roooaaar
14820.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by 15.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Submarines by 20.0%, but increases her DMG taken from Submarines by 5.0%. If there are 3 ships in your Vanguard when the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by 10.0%.

14830.name: Late-Blooming Airstrike
14830.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy by 15.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 8s, decreases all enemies' Accuracy and RLD by 15.0%.

14840.name: Veil of Azaleas
14840.desc: Increases this ship's max Detection Gauge value by 15 and decreases her DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%. At the start of the battle, if there are 3 Sakura Empire ships in your Vanguard: decreases all your Sakura Empire ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%.

14850.name: Upon the Wind's Edge
14850.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage and executes a slashing attack. Enemies hit by this slashing attack take 8.0% increased DMG from this ship for 3s, and inflicts a unique Flooding ailment (lasts 6s) to enemies hit by her torpedoes (Flooding deals 179 DMG per tick; 1 tick occurs every 3s; barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

14860.name: Before the Lightning's Flash
14860.desc: At the start of the battle, and when this ship's Torpedoes finish reloading: for 10s, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%, increases her DMG dealt with Torpedoes by 12.0%, and increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 (these effects cannot be stacked; overlapping activations will simply refresh the effect timers if possible).

14870.name: Within the Thunder's Roar
14870.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy by 15.0% and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle, that fleet gains the following buffs: 1) 30s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 supporting torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) If the fleet Shimakaze is NOT in has 1 or more DDs: increases your DDs' TRP by 10.0% until the battle ends.

14890.name: Nightmare of Solomon+
14890.desc: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, RLD, and EVA by 20.0%, and increases her DMG dealt to Burning enemies by 15.0%. After the battle starts: for 30s, increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by 10.0% and Torpedo Crit DMG by 25.0%.

14900.name: Feral Claws
14900.desc: Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 5.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on this skill's level; inflicts a unique Burn ailment on hit).

14910.name: Crescent City Bonds
14910.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% and increases DMG dealt by 10.0% for the ship in the center position of your Vanguard.

14920.name: Nola Finale
14920.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys a barrier that can block 8.0% DMG and lasts up to 8s. If this barrier is destroyed: heals this ship for 6.0% HP; if the barrier expires: instead increases this ship's FP and RLD by 10.0%.

14930.name: Terrific Terror
14930.desc: Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship lands 5 consecutive Main Gun hits on the same enemy: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times; upon reaching 4 stacks: also increases this ship's TRP by 20.0% and fires her special barrage).

14940.name: I'll Give You A Head Start~
14940.desc: Increases this ship's SPD by 7. When the battle starts, if there is 1 or more other DDs in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by a further 7 and increases her EVA and AA by 20.0%; if this ship is the sole DD: increases this ship's RLD by 20.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 5.0%.

14950.name: Templar's Holy Advance
14950.desc: Increases this ship's AA and ASW by 10.0%; If sortied in the same fleet as Richelieu or either 3 or more Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ships: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 10.0%. When this ship is attacked: 15.0% chance to deploy a shield that lasts up to 12s and can block up to 10 shots, and decreases this ship's SPD by 3 (this effect can only activate once every 12s).

14960.name: The Flawless Knife-Thrower
14960.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. If the fleet this ship is in has the Out of Ammo debuff: reduces the DMG debuff effect on this ship by 15.0%.

14970.name: Circumspect Vigilance
14970.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to CAs and CBs by 20.0%. Every 20s: 70% chance to increase this ship's ACC and RLD by 20.0% for 10s.

14980.name: Get Hyped!
14980.desc: When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times). When this ship sinks an enemy in combat: increases this ship's ACC and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times).

14990.name: Scorching Combo
14990.desc: Increases this ship's AA by 15.0%. 3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% (can be stacked up to 2 times; when stacked twice: increases the barrage's proc chance to 100.0%). After the 2nd and 4th battles in a sortie: improves this barrage.

15000.name: Bad Girl's Surprise Strike
15000.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship finishes loading an Airstrike: 80.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15010.name: Good Girl at Heart
15010.desc: At the start of the battle, and when this ship launches an Airstrike: spawns a shield around the frontmost ship of your Vanguard (lasts 8s, can block up to 6 enemy shots; the shield's duration is refreshed if its spawn conditions are met while it is still active). If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% until her next Airstrike.

15020.name: Knockout Shot
15020.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between barrage activations).

15030.name: Taking One for the Team
15030.desc: Once every 20s, while this ship's HP is above 60.0%: spawns a shield around this ship (lasts 8s, can negate 4.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG); if there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard, and this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: doubles the amount of DMG this shield can negate, and this ship tanks 50.0% of the DMG your other Vanguard ships take for 8s. While this ship's HP is below 60.0%: the above effect will not activate; instead, this ship's TRP increases by 15.0%.

15040.name: Th-That Was an Accident!
15040.desc: Decreases this ship's OXY by 10. When this boat resurfaces, and when she retreats from battle: increases this boat's DMG dealt by 15.0%. While this boat is retreating: increases this boat's SPD by 50.0%.

15050.name: The Laurel of Prosody
15050.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts a minus 30.0% SPD debuff for 3s to enemies hit). When an enemy gets within close proximity of this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 15s cooldown between activations).

15060.name: In Ridicule of Fools
15060.desc: Increases this ship's FP and RLD by 15.0%. When this ship equips a Main Gun which uses HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light and Medium Armor enemies by 15.0%. At the start of the battle, if this ship is NOT the Flagship: decreases this ship's Main Gun reload time by 50.0%, but decreases her Main Gun DMG dealt by 45.0%.

15070.name: Revolutionary's Prosaic
15070.desc: Increases this ship's Crit DMG dealt by 20.0%. While this ship is afloat, for the first 5 battles of a sortie fought by a fleet this ship is NOT in, the following buffs apply to that fleet: 1) Decreases DMG taken by your Iron Blood ships by 5.0%; 2) Increases Crit DMG dealt by your Iron Blood ships by 10.0%; 3) When an enemy gets within close proximity of your ships: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; can only activate up to 6 times per battle; has a 5s cooldown between activations).

15090.name: Whirlpool Warning?
15090.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%. Every 20s: 75.0% chance to spawn a whirlpool that draws in and deals DMG to enemies for 1s (whirlpool DMG is based on the skill's level).

15100.name: Single-Minded
15100.desc: Every time 2 enemy aircraft are shot down within your Vanguard's AA range: increases this ship's AA by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 5 times). Once, 10s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 15s after the duration of the first activation: for 10s, increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0%, but increases her DMG taken by 5.0%.

15110.name: Scrollbearer of Turbulent Seas
15110.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 25.0%; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0%. Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases your Dragon Empery ships' FP and TRP by 12.0% for 8s.

15120.name: Wanderer of Azure Mists
15120.desc: While this ship is inside a smokescreen: decreases this ship's SPD by 8, and increases DMG dealt by 12.0%; While this ship is not inside a smokescreen, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0%.

15130.name: Wave-Breaking Speardancer
15130.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 25.0%; if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and TRP dealt by 12.0%. Every 3rd time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% increased DMG from this ship for 8s.

15140.name: A Journey from Heaven to Sea
15140.desc: Once, when the battle starts, and with a 40.0% chance every 15s after that: deploys a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: increases the proc chance of this smokescreen to 80.0% and decreases the DMG penalty of the debuff by 15.0%. Every 20s: 50.0% chance to restore 3.5% HP for the lowest HP percentage BB/BC in your fleet (this effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle.)

15150.name: Lights On!
15150.desc: Every 20s: this ship points her lantern forward, illuminating enemies. Illuminated enemies suffer 10.0% reduced Evasion Rate for 10s.

15160.name: Let's Go, Data 857!
15160.desc: Every 20s: summons Data 857. When summoned, Data 857: 1) fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) for 10s, increases this ship's ACC and Crit Rate by 15.0%. During battle, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal to enemies that have been Illuminated at least twice by 10.0%. After the first time this skill is activated, increases the DMG your Allen M. Sumner-class ships deal by 10.0% until the end of that battle.

15170.name: Star-Studded Formation
15170.desc: Every 8s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When 4 same-colored shots in a row from this barrage hit the same enemy, one of the following debuffs are inflicted: 1) if the shots were black, the enemy's SPD is decreased by 30.0% for 2s; 2) if the shots were white, the enemy's DMG dealt is decreased by 15.0% for 2s.

15180.name: Cunning Stratagem
15180.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). If your fleet consists entirely of Dragon Empery ships: improves this special airstrike, and once every 20s, 1 randomly chosen ship in your fleet deals 10.0% increased DMG for 5s.

15190.name: Azure Dragon's Dance
15190.desc: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts Armor Break for 6s to enemies (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

15200.name: White Tiger's Prance
15200.desc: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that increases Torpedo DMG taken by 8.0% for 6s to enemies hit.

15210.name: An Shan Name Ship+
15210.desc: Increases your An Shan-class ships' ACC, FP, and TRP by 25.0% and EVA by 10.0%.

15220.name: Mutual Assistance+
15220.desc: Increases FP, RLD, and ACC by 12.0% for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Vanguard ships, and increases FP, TRP, and AA by 12.0% for all your Northern Parliament and Dragon Empery Main Fleet ships.

15230.name: The Genius Mechanic
15230.desc: Every 15s: 30.0% chance to deploy a smokescreen that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (smokescreen lasts 5s; Evasion Rate buff does not stack with other smokescreen skills). While this ship is inside a smokescreen: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0% and, once per battle, increases her LCK by 8 until the battle ends.

15240.name: Can I Attack Now?
15240.desc: 5s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; every 10s after that: fires an upgraded version of this barrage and also increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; barrage upgrade effect and Crit-related effects can only activate up to 2 times per battle).

15250.name: Hang in There? Sure...
15250.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by 10.0%. When the battle starts: 1) if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard, or there is 1 other Northern Parliament ship in your Vanguard: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%; if this ship is your sole Vanguard ship: instead increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0%.

15260.name: Noble Strike
15260.desc: Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage and increases the ACC of your Main Fleet by 10.0% for 8s (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level).

15270.name: Revenge Served Cold
15270.desc: For each Northern Parliament or Royal Navy ship in the same fleet as this ship: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times); if there are 3 or more: also increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 10.0%.

15280.name: A Genius Keeps Things Simple!
15280.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage and, if there is at least 1 other DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet: restores 5.0% HP of a randomly chosen DD originating from the Northern Parliament in your fleet (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; healing effect can only activate up to 2 times per battle; if the healing recipient is Tashkent, the amount of HP restored is increased by 50.0%).

15290.name: Indomitable Ice
15290.desc: Increases this ship's FP and EVA by 8.0%. Every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this ship has a large-caliber Main Gun equipped: decreases the shot requirement to 4 and improves this barrage).

15300.name: Tempered Prudence
15300.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes from AP ammo by 8.0%. Every 4 times this ship fires her Secondary Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that decreases the FP of enemies hit by 5.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship equips Northern Parliament gear: increases this ship's Secondary Gun efficiency by 45.0% and, instead of reducing AP DMG taken, decreases all DMG taken by 8.0%.

15310.name: Strong-Willed Support
15310.desc: During a battle, when this ship's HP falls below 10.0% as a result of DMG taken:decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 50.0% and recovers 1.0% of her max HP every second for 10s. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 1) if that fleet's Flagship is a BB: decreases the Main Gun Spread of all your BBs by 2; 2) 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that decreases the SPD of enemies hit by 40.0% for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15320.name: Meteoric Hope
15320.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 75.0% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; inflicts the Flooding status for 12s to enemies hit by the special airstrike's torpedos). If this effect fails to activate: instead fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).

15330.name: Crystals of the Great River
15330.desc: Every 20s: selects the lowest HP percentage ship in your fleet, and afterwards 2 randomly chosen ships in your fleet, and recovers HP for the ship(s) equal to 5.0% of this ship's max HP (it is possible for a ship to receive multiple heals). After this effect activates: spawns a Lv.10 summon that explodes, dealing DMG to enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).

15340.name: Motherly Heart
15340.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% per each ship in your Vanguard (can be stacked up to 3 times). If your Flagship or Vanguard lead ship is a Northern Parliament ship: grants this ship the full stack of 3 regardless of the number of ships in your Vanguard.

15360.name: Marvels of History - Seydlitz
15360.desc: Every battle, the first time this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage. When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship and your Flagship has a "Marvels of History" skill: the higher percentage HP your Flagship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to 80.0%).

15370.name: Impero is Brilliant
15370.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. Every 20s: 75.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special airstrike based on the type of aircraft equipped in this ship's first gear slot (DMG is based on the skill's level.) If the aircraft is a Fighter: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 40.0%; if it's a Dive Bomber, when this ship finishes loading her 2nd Airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 60.0% for 5s.

15380.name: Impero is Charitable
15380.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0%. 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that, while a ship in your Main Fleet has between 20.0% and 90.0% HP remaining: 1) If this ship has the highest percentage HP of all ships in your Main Fleet, and there are at least 2 ships in your Main Fleet, deducts 5.0% HP from this ship and heals your Main Fleet ship with the lowest percentage HP (except this ship) for the amount of HP deducted from this ship; 2) If this ship does NOT have the highest percentage HP, deducts 5.0% HP from your Main Fleet ship with the highest percentage HP and heals this ship for the amount of HP deducted from the other ship. Whichever ship is healed as a result of this skill has her EVA increased by 15.0% for 5s. If the ship healed is from the Sardegna Empire, the amount healed is increased by 183.

15390.name: March on Towards Triumph!
15390.desc: 5s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: spawns a special summon (lasts 15s; inflicts a unique Burn ailment to enemies) and decreases the ACC of all enemies by 20.0% for 5s.

15400.name: Tough Love
15400.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if this ship is the frontmost ship of your Vanguard: restores 5.0% HP to this ship; if NOT in the frontmost position: decreases DMG taken by 10.0% for this ship and the frontmost ship of your Vanguard.

15410.name: With Victory Comes Glory!
15410.desc: During a sortie, for each enemy fleet sunk by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt with torpedoes based on her proximity to the enemy at the time of firing (the closer she is, the more DMG they deal, up to a maximum of 15.0% when within 10 units or less).

15420.name: Iron-Willed Leader
15420.desc: When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Iron Blood ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 18.0%. When the battle starts, the higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the shorter the reload time of her first Main Gun volley (at least 20.0%; up to 80.0%). During each battle, this ship will tank 60.0% of all DMG received by your Iron Blood Main Fleet ships, and the DMG tanked is reduced by 20.0% (this effect becomes inactive after the primary effect of the skill "Unsinkable Legend" activates).

15430.name: Unsinkable Legend
15430.desc: Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG that would sink her: this ship does not sink, she evades all attacks for 10s, and she recovers 22.0% of her max HP; after this effect activates, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% until the battle ends. The higher percentage HP this ship has remaining, the more DMG she deals, up to 20.0% more; the lower percentage HP she has remaining, the less DMG she takes, up to 20.0% less (this effect does not modify DMG tanked as a result of the skill "Iron-Willed Leader").

15440.name: Providential Starfall
15440.desc: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When an enemy is hit by this barrage's blue shells, for 10s: decreases that enemy's EVA by 8.0% and increases their DMG taken by your Iron Blood ships by 12.0%.

15450.name: Marvels of History - Thringen
15450.desc: If this ship has an Iron Blood Secondary Weapon equipped, when she fires her Secondary Weapon: 70.0% chance to fire a follow-up attack. 10s cooldown between activations.

15460.name: Bravery at Skagerrak
15460.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15470.name: The Hunt is On
15470.desc: Every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and ACC by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times; the final stack additionally increases RLD by 15.0%).

15480.name: Marvels of History - Ltzow
15480.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to BBs and BCs by 10.0%. When an enemy sinks within 5s of taking DMG from this ship, this ship is also treated as the one who sank that enemy. If this ship has an AP or SAP Main Gun equipped, when she hits an enemy: 1) That enemy's ACC and FP decreases by 10.0% for 3s; 2) After 3s, there's a 10.0% chance to inflict 3,000 DMG to that enemy.

15490.name: Devotion to Precision
15490.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship attacks an enemy DD, her ACC further increases by 10.0%.

15500.name: Marvels of History - Yorck
15500.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 20s, deploys a shield (can block up to 3 enemy torpedoes, lasts 20s).

15510.name: Duet of Alternation
15510.desc: If Emden has a CL Main Gun equipped in the Secondary Weapon slot: increases Emden's Main Gun and Secondary Weapon Efficiencies by 25.0% and, once every 20s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts a minus 30.0% SPD debuff to enemies hit for 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level); if a DD Main Gun is equipped in this slot instead: every 10s, deploys a shield that lasts 5s and can block up to 5 enemy shots. If this shield is destroyed rather than expiring: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that restores Emden's HP equal to 15.0% of the DMG dealt.

15520.name: Marvels of History - Emden(?)
15520.desc: When the battle starts, increases your Emden's EVA by 10.0% and: 1) If your Vanguard consists of only Emden, Emden is unaffected by the Out of Ammo debuff; 2) If there are other Iron Blood ships in your fleet, after 5s, lowers your Iron Blood ships' HP by 11 and increases their FP by 10.0%. Every battle, when Emden sinks an enemy: increases Emden's EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

15530.name: I Won't Hit Anyway...
15530.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Every 5 times this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times; if an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range, instantly gain the max stack).

15540.name: Shields! More Shields!
15540.desc: When the battle starts, and every 30s: deploys 3 types of shields that each last 10.0s: 1) A blue shield which can block up to 4 enemy shots; 2) A purple shield which can block up to 2 enemy torpedoes; 3) A red shield which inflicts DMG up to 6 times to an enemy it comes in contact with.

15560.name: Marvels of History - Elbing
15560.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if there are enemies within 30 units of this ship, the barrage uses the HE attribute; if there are none, the barrage uses the AP attribute).

15570.name: Please Take Care
15570.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ASW by 10.0%. 20s after the battle starts: restores 5.0% max HP to all ships in your Vanguard. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases your Royal Navy DDs' ASW, FP, and TRP by 10.0%.

15580.name: Lucky Jervis
15580.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if your Vanguard consists of only DDs and/or CLs: increases this ship's TRP by 10.0% and decreases her torpedo DMG taken by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Vanguard and this ship is in the frontmost position: when this ship takes DMG, 15.0% chance to increase this ship's Evasion Rate by 30.0% for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).

15590.name: Throwing Down the Gauntlet
15590.desc: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by 15.0% and increases your Royal Navy DDs' AA by 15.0%.

15600.name: A Surprise for Mew!
15600.desc: 3s after the battle starts, and every 15s after that: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; when this barrage fires, increases this ship's AA by 15.0% for 10s).

15610.name: Nine Lives
15610.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by 40.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15620.name: One Iota of Effort
15620.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat).

15630.name: Two Can Play at That Game
15630.desc: 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike that inflicts a special Burn to enemies hit by it (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level; Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). When this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: decreases your ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 15.0% for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).

15640.name: Together We Shine Brighter
15640.desc: Increases your Illustrious-class CVs' DMG dealt by 8.0%. When the battle starts: 1) Increases AVI and ACC by 15.0% for all your Illustrious-class CVs except this ship; 2) If sortied with Prince of Wales or Repulse: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0% and ACC by 12.0%; 3) If sortied with neither of the above ships, and if this ship is the only Illustrious-class CV in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%.

15650.name: Revengeful Strike
15650.desc: Every 15s: 50% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts a special Armor Break debuff to enemies hit for 8s (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15660.name: Trajectory Recalibration
15660.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0%. If this ship is not your Flagship, and your Flagship is a BB or BC: when this ship fires her Main Guns, this ship's volleys will fire from the Flagship position.

15670.name: Yuni's Aid
15670.desc: This ship starts the battle with 1 Airstrike loaded. When this ship launches an Airstrike: restores 8.0% max HP to every ship in your Vanguard; the first time this effect activates every battle, it also restores 5.0% max HP to every ship in your Main Fleet, and after that, restores 3.0% max HP to the lowest percentage HP ship in your Main Fleet.

15680.name: Glisten, Light of Glory!
15680.desc: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, for 6s, increase your BBs' and BCs' DMG dealt by 8.0%.

15690.name: Scatter, Minions of Darkness!
15690.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by 12.0% and RLD by 20.0%. During battle, 2s after an enemy spawns in: increases the enemy's DMG taken from your ships by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 1) Increases FP by 10.0% for all Royal Navy ships in that Vanguard Fleet; 2) 30s after the battle starts: fires a special barrage and, for 15s, increases AA by 10.0% for all ships in that fleet.

15700.name: Behold, My Royal Sabre!
15700.desc: This ship's Secondary Guns always deal Critical Hits. If this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's AA Gun Efficiency by 30.0% and decreases your Flagship's Main Gun Spread by 2. When the battle starts, if there is at least 1 other Royal Navy ship in your fleet: decreases all your Royal Navy ships' DMG taken from aircraft by 10.0%.

15720.name: Sacraments of Illusion
15720.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: if this ship is above your Flagship on the battle screen, launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with fighter planes; if this ship is below your Flagship, launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with torpedo bombers (special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level).

15730.name: Black Plumes of Judgment
15730.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When this ship attacks an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left: increases this ship's Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 25.0% against that enemy. When this ship launches an Airstrike, if there is an enemy with 25.0% or less max HP left on the screen: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15740.name: Vichya's Black Lance
15740.desc: Every 5s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's FP and TRP by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). When an enemy is hit by this attack: increases that enemy's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from L'Indomptable by 15.0% (does not stack). Every 4 times this attack is performed: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Once per battle, when this barrage is fired: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% until the end of the battle.

15750.name: I Will Not Yield!

15770.name: Time to Clean
15770.desc: Increases this ship's equipped torpedo DMG dealt by 15.0% and increases her DMG dealt to DDs and Torpedo Ships by 15.0%.

15780.name: Equipment Level-Upper!
15780.desc: Increases this boat's TRP and ACC by 10.0%, and DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. If this boat has Sardegna Empire gear equipped: further increases this boat's TRP and ACC by 10.0%.

15790.name: Get 'Em, Canguro!
15790.desc: 3s after entering the battle: this boat stops moving and summons Canguro. Canguro moves forward a set distance and deploys sea mines (sea mines inflict Flooding to enemies that touch them, continuously dealing DMG for 24s; Flooding DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat; Flooding cannot stack), then returns to this boat. After this boat retrieves Canguro, she resumes moving and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15800.name: Halo of Fervor
15800.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and RLD by 15.0% for 60s. 3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15810.name: Easygoing Composure
15810.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against DDs and CLs by 15.0%. 20s after the battle starts: decreases the loading time of this ship's mid-reload torpedoes by 20s, then increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 6.0%, but decreases her SPD by 8.

15820.name: Knock It Off...!
15820.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to deploy 2 shields that block 2 enemy torpedoes (shields last 10s; 20s cooldown between activations). Once per battle, when this ship falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15830.name: Fleet-Footed Firing
15830.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP ammo by 20.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 2s.

15840.name: Inheritor's Will
15840.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this barrage fails to activate, that salvo deals 20.0% increased DMG and slows enemies hit by 30.0% for 5s (does not stack).

15850.name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
15850.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When the battle starts, and every 20s: performs a sonar scan that reveals enemy SSs for 8s. Every 10s, and every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

15860.name: Exalted Light
15860.desc: Decreases the enemy's TRP by 8.0% while this ship is afloat. If there are 3 or more Sardegna Empire ships in your fleet: decreases the loading time of this ship's first Main Gun volley by 30.0%.

15870.name: Frontline Scoop
15870.desc: If this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0%. 10s after the battle starts, and with a 40.0% chance every 20s after that: throws a flare (lasts 10s; prioritizes throwing flare at the enemy closest to this ship) that decreases the Evasion Rate of all enemies in its range by 25.0%. This ship deals 15.0% increased DMG against enemies affected by this flare.

15880.name: Paparazza's Retreat
15880.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 5s. Once per battle, when this ship or a Sardegna Empire ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: deploys a smokescreen (lasts 5s) that increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills).

15890.name: Lookout's Courage
15890.desc: When this ship takes DMG: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Each sortie, for the first 3 battles fought by the fleet this ship is in: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

15900.name: Lookout's Support
15900.desc: Once per battle, when any other ship in your Vanguard falls below 20.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 50.0% for 8s. When any other ship in your fleet sinks: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

15910.name: Beavers, Assemble!
15910.desc: When sortied with Thatcher, Aulick, Foote, Spence, or a DD with the Beaver Squad Tag equipped: increases this ship's Crit Rate and DMG dealt by 15.0%; when the HP of one of the aforementioned ships in your fleet falls below 25.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 20.0% of that ship's HP (can only activate once per battle per eligible ship). Every 10s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

15920.name: The Best Mines Ever!
15920.desc: The first 4 times this ship fires her torpedoes every battle, this ship deploys Lv.10 sea mines at her present location (sea mine DMG is based on the skill's level). When sortied with Admiral Hipper, or if there is an enemy Royal Navy CL present: increases this ship's SPD by 3.

15930.name: Daredevil Sweetheart
15930.desc: Increases this ship's FP and Crit Rate by 15.0% and SPD by 8. 10s after the battle starts and every 20s after that: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level), and, for 8s, tanks 30.0% of the rest of your Vanguard's DMG taken while decreasing it by 20.0%. During battle, this ship gains a Lv.10 special Secondary Gun (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AA stat).

15940.name: Unstoppable Love
15940.desc: Every 30s after the battle starts: deploys 2 rotating shields (last 15s; can block up to 10 enemy shells). Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 10.0% and, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% (does not affect DMG tanked by this ship's "Daredevil Sweetheart" skill) and increases her DMG dealt by 10.0%.

15950.name: Urd's Fate-Piercer
15950.desc: When this ship's Main Guns finish loading: performs a Lv.10 special attack that inflicts a minus 40.0% SPD debuff for 6s to enemies hit, after which there is a 80.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (special attack and barrage DMG are based on the skill's level). If this ship has an HE Main Gun equipped, or if there is another Iron Blood ship in your fleet when the battle starts: increases the above barrage's activation chance by 20.0%.

15960.name: Pantheon of War
15960.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships afloat in your Main Fleet: increases the ACC of your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by 10.0%. If this ship has Iron Blood gear equipped: increases this ship's DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0%.

15970.name: Keeping You On Your Toes
15970.desc: Increases this ship's TRP by 20.0%. Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG totaling more than 5.0% of her max HP from one hit: deploys a shield around this ship that can negate up to 10.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG; if this shield is destroyed: increases this ship's EVA and DMG dealt by 15.0% until the battle ends.

15980.name: Adaptive Bladework
15980.desc: Decreases this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 20.0%. When the battle starts, and every 20s: 1) Once per battle, if this ship's HP is below 25.0%: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP; 2) If this ship's HP is above 25.0%: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's Crit Rate by 15.0% for 15s; 3) If this ship has sunk 3 or more enemy ships in the battle: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% for 15s.

15990.name: This Time... I'm Prepared
15990.desc: When a ship in your Vanguard rams into an enemy: decreases that ship's DMG taken by 25.0% and increases your Vanguard's FP and ACC by 10.0% for 10s (does not stack; repeat activations only refresh the buff's duration). When the battle starts, and every 10s: this ship and the Vanguard ship(s) adjacent to her take 6 DMG, and for 3s, their EVA is increased by 10.0%.

16000.name: Swallow's Sword-Dance
16000.desc: Every 10s: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% and fires a Lv.10 special barrage that penetrates enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; FP and AA buff can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemies hit by this barrage's slash attack by 10.0% and decreases this ship's cannon and torpedo DMG taken from those enemies by 10.0%.

16010.name: Imperturbable Heart
16010.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's ASW by 15.0% and grants this ship a special Lv.10 ASW weapon (DMG is based on the skill's level). Every 15s: performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s. When sortied with an Akizuki-class DD: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Once per battle, when a ship in your Vanguard falls below 30.0% HP as a result of DMG taken: that ship evades all attacks for 2s and gains a shield that can block up to 6.0% of Wakatsuki's max HP in DMG.

16020.name: Martyr+
16020.desc: Once when the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance when this ship takes DMG: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that restores 1.0% max HP to each ship in your Vanguard (DMG is based on the skill's level; 18s cooldown between activations). When this ship sinks: 1) Outside of an Exercise, restores 25.0% max HP to all other ships in your fleet; 2) During an Exercise: this ship instead will not sink, and restores 25.0% max HP to all ships in your fleet (can only activate once per battle; if the Eagle Union Elite Damage Control is also equipped, the effects from this skill take precedence).

16030.name: Violet Lightning Storm
16030.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship has a Sakura Empire Main Gun equipped, this barrage is improved. This special barrage has 50.0% increased Crit Rate, and the lightning bolts from this barrage inflict a special Armor Break ailment to enemies hit, increasing their DMG taken by 5.0% for 8s; if the enemy hit has Heavy Armor, the Armor Break ailment is increased to 10.0% instead.

16040.name: Tempestuous Blade
16040.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 20.0% and ACC by 5.0%. If this ship has Sakura Empire gear equipped: increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 15.0%.

16050.name: Musashi's Guardianship
16050.desc:
When the battle starts, if this ship is NOT your Flagship OR your Airspace Control status is not Air Incapability or Air Denial: reduces this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% in that battle.
If this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in enters a battle: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage 15s and 35s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level).
[Non-Exercise Only] While this ship is above 40.0% HP: grants the "Musashi's Guardianship" status to all your other Main Fleet ships. Ships with this status: 1) No longer take Ramming DMG; 2) Force Musashi to become Detected as well if they become Detected; 3) Cause Musashi to be prioritized by enemy attacks if they are both valid targets.

16070.name: Plumes of Darkest Night
16070.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to DDs and CLs by 15.0%. Every 15s: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if this effect fails to activate, this ship instead restores 3.0% of her max HP).

16080.name: Follow the Trends
16080.desc: When this ship hits an enemy with a torpedo: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0% for 10s. When your Vanguard ships take DMG a total of 10 times, decreases this ship's LCK by 5 and the DMG taken by your Vanguard by 10.0% until the battle ends.

16090.name: Metal Gauntlet Mash!
16090.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemy DDs and CLs hit by this barrage suffer the Armor Break debuff for 6s.

16100.name: For My Friends!
16100.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 5.0% for each afloat ship in your Vanguard. While at least 1 ship in your Vanguard has 50.0% or less max HP remaining: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0%.

16110.name: Pl-Please Take Care
16110.desc: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ASW by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet: deploys a barrier (lasts 20s; can negate DMG equal to up to 5.0% of the recipient's max HP) around your Royal Navy DD(s); if the barrier is destroyed or expires, decreases the barrier recipient's DMG taken by 10.0% for 20s. When sortied with another J-class DD: increases your J-class DDs' FP, TRP, and ACC by 10.0%.

16120.name: Charming Janus
16120.desc: Every 15s after the battle starts: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% increased DMG from your DDs and CLs for 5s (does not stack). If this barrage does not activate, instead performs a sonar scan that renders enemy SSs detected for 8s.

16130.name: Multitasking Maid
16130.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: 50.0% chance to inflict 15 DMG to this ship and fire an additional Main Gun volley.

16140.name: Premature Gift
16140.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's 1st wave of torpedoes by 70.0%, but decreases the DMG dealt by this wave by 30.0%. When this ship takes DMG from a torpedo: 75.0% chance to restore 1.0% of this ship's max HP once every second for 8s (this effect can only activate once per battle; this HP recovery effect will be interrupted if this ship's "Multitasking Maid" skill activates during it).

16150.name: Skyraiders, Advance!
16150.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) launches a recon squadron consisting of Skyraider AEW planes, detecting enemy SSs for 6s. Additionally, selects 1 enemy at random (humanoid enemies are prioritized) and increases this ship's DMG dealt to that enemy by 10.0% (does not stack); 2) launches a Lv.10 special airstrike that can hit enemy SSs (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16160.name: Unblemished White Cliffs
16160.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%; if there are 3 or more Royal Navy ships in your fleet, further increases this ship's AVI and AA by 10.0%.

16170.name: Guardian Faerie
16170.desc: Increases your Main Fleet's maximum Detection Gauge value by 10. As long as this ship is afloat: 1) decreases your Main Fleet's Burn DMG taken by 15.0%; 2) when a ship in your Vanguard recovers HP, 50.0% of any excess HP recovered beyond the maximum is converted into a barrier that can negate DMG equal to that amount, lasting up to 5s; 3) while this barrier is active, the barrier's recipient deals 5.0% increased DMG.

16180.name: Tempesta Pact
16180.desc: When this ship enters the battle, and every 20s after that: performs a Lv.10 special attack that slows enemies hit by 40.0% for 6s (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0% for 30s after entering the battle.

16190.name: Guardian of the Deep
16190.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% and increases her FP by 20.0%. When this ship enters the battle: restores 40.0% of this ship's max HP. 5s after this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken, or 60s after she enters the battle: this ship leaves the battle.

16210.name: The Fighting Lady
16210.desc: 3s after the battle starts: launches a recon squadron consisting of AD-1 Skyraiders, inflicting the Marked debuff to a random enemy (prioritizing humanoid enemies) for 12s and decreasing that enemy's AA by 6.0%. 12s after this effect activates, or after the Marked enemy is sunk: restores 3.0% of this ship's max HP and launches another AD-1 Skyraider squadron (this HP recovery effect can only activate up to 5 times per battle). When this ship launches an airstrike, if she has Eagle Union aircraft equipped: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16220.name: Waltzing Beyond Tragedy
16220.desc: When the battle starts, if there are 3 or more Eagle Union ships afloat in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. Every 18s after the battle starts: 100.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases this ship's Detection Gauge value by 2 once a second for 5s. While this ship is afloat, for the first 4 battles another fleet fights during a sortie: increases the FP of that fleet's Main Fleet Eagle Union ships by 6.0%; 20s after that fleet's battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16230.name: The Eagle Soars Free
16230.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Yorktown-class CVs' airstrike loading time by 10.0% and decreases it by 8.0% for your other Essex-class CVs (only affects the currently loading airstrike once; effect does not stack). Your Yorktown-class and Essex-class CVs gain the following effects during battle: 1) increases their DMG dealt by 10.0%; 2) when they launch an airstrike: also launches a Lv.10 interceptive airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16250.name: Hornet's Sting
16250.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike with aircraft torpedoes and rockets (DMG is based on the skill's level); inflicts a special Burn ailment to enemies hit by these rockets (Burn DMG is based on this ship's AVI stat). Increases this ship's DMG dealt to enemy CLs and CVLs by 10.0%.

16260.name: Flying Ace
16260.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0% and increases her Fighter aircraft gear slot efficiency by 15.0%. Every time this ship's aircraft shoot down an enemy aircraft: increases this ship's AVI by 4.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

16270.name: The Dancing Grey Ghost
16270.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 10.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's max HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship's Detection Gauge value is set to 0 and your Main Fleet takes no Ramming DMG for 8s.

16280.name: Ms. Langley's Guidance
16280.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% for each CV and CVL in your fleet. Increases this ship's DMG dealt with her first 2 airstrikes by 20.0% each battle.

16290.name: Ms. Langley's Strict Discipline
16290.desc: Increases the ACC of all your CVs and CVLs (excluding this ship) by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your CVs' and CVLs' DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s.

16300.name: Flagship Cover - Hammann
16300.desc: While this ship is afloat: increases your CVs' and CVLs' airstrike DMG by 15.0% and decreases your Flagship's DMG taken by 25.0% (this DMG increasing effect does not stack with the skill "Air Raid Assistance" and this DMG decreasing effect does not stack with Hammann's "Flagship Cover" skill).

16310.name: Cautious Caprice
16310.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%. For every 2 enemy aircraft shot down within your Vanguard's Anti-Air Gun range: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 2.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 4 times).

16320.name: Artillery Overload
16320.desc: Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When the battle starts, if there are any other Eagle Union ships in your fleet: when this barrage activates, performs a scan, marking 1 enemy and increasing that enemy's DMG taken by 10.0% from all types of Cruisers in your Vanguard for 10s.

16330.name: Pilotfish
16330.desc: Increases this ship's EVA and ACC by 15.0%. If your Flagship is a CV or a CVL, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 5.0% and, when your Flagship launches an airstrike: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that ignores enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level; if your Flagship is an Eagle Union ship, the barrage also inflicts a -50.0% SPD debuff for 8s to enemies hit).

16340.name: Unyielding Pathfinder
16340.desc: Once 3s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16350.name: Hope is Calamity's Handmaiden
16350.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0% and, if there are any other Northern Parliament ships in your fleet, decreases this ship's cannon DMG taken by 10.0%. Once per battle, when this ship has lost a total of 25.0% of her max HP in a battle: restores 8.0% of this ship's max HP. Increases your Northern Parliament Vanguard ships' Crit DMG dealt by 30.0%.

16360.name: Blessings Through Benevolence
16360.desc: When the battle starts, for each Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 4.0%. If there is any other Dragon Empery ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by 15.0% for 8s (does not stack with the skill "Air Cover").

16370.name: Brave Beauty
16370.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 5.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 3 times) and launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16380.name: All-Knowledgeable Appraiser
16380.desc: When the battle starts, if there are any other ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by 10. Every 20s: targets 2 random ships in your fleet and grants them a buff for 8s based on their hull classification; 1) DD: increases TRP by 8.0%; 2) CL, CA, or CB: increases FP by 8.0%; 3) BB, BC, or BBV: increases ACC by 8.0%; 4) CV or CVL: increases AVI by 8.0%; 5) any other hull classification: increases AA by 8.0%.

16390.name: Tricks of the Trade
16390.desc: If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's Burn duration by 3s and decreases her and your Dragon Empery CVs' and CVLs' Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. If this ship has the Cargo "Type-Wu Seaplane" equipped: increases this ship's AVI by 30.0% and Evasion Rate by 12.0% and, every 10s, launches a special Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16400.name: Ariadne's Conundrum
16400.desc: 3s after the battle starts, and when this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% against enemies that have been afloat for 10s or longer.

16410.name: Phaedra's Longing
16410.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. Every 12s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat).

16420.name: Athena's Aegis
16420.desc: Every 10s after the battle starts: restores 1.0% of this ship's max HP. When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: decreases the debuff's DMG reduction effect by 15.0%. When the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 3.5% for the rest of the sortie (can be stacked up to 3 times).

16430.name: Dragon Empery Bond+
16430.desc: When the battle starts, if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: decreases your Yat Sen's, Ning Hai's, and Ping Hai's DMG taken by 20.0%, increases their Evasion Rate by 30.0%, and increases your Dragon Empery ships' DMG dealt by 5.0%.

16440.name: Plum Flower in the Cold Night
16440.desc: Increases this ship's SPD by 8. Every 12s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the "Plum-Petal Poetry" gear equipped: improves this barrage, decreases all your other Dragon Empery Vanguard ships' DMG taken by 5.0%, and decreases your Dragon Empery Main Fleet ships' DMG taken by 10.0%.

16450.name: You Can't Escape
16450.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 100% chance to lower the SPD of all enemies to 0 over 2s, keep it at 0 for 2s, then gradually restore their SPD to normal over 2s; when this effect activates: targets 1 random enemy (prioritizing humanoid enemies) and lowers their EVA by 20.0% for 6s. Each sortie, for the first 3 battles fought by a fleet this ship is NOT in: when that fleet's Flagship fires her first Main Gun volley or launches an airstrike: expends all stacks of No Mercy and, after 2s, activates one of the following effects based on the number of No Mercy stacks expended: 1) 3 to 5: decreases the SPD of all enemies by 20.0% for 2s; 2) 6 to 8: decreases the SPD of all enemies by 60.0% for 2s; 3) 9: decreases the SPD of all enemies by 100.0% for 2s.

16460.name: May God Forgive You, For I Shall Not
16460.desc: While this ship is afloat, when the fleet this ship is in starts a battle, and for the first 3 battles of a sortie a fleet this ship is NOT in: when a ship in your fleet takes DMG, she gains a stack of No Mercy (can be stacked up to 9 times). When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level) and expends all stacks of No Mercy. Activates the following effects based on the number of No Mercy stacks expended: 1) 3 or more: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 5s; 2) 6 or more: negates the Detection Gauge value gained from launching this airstrike; 3) 9: this airstrike is guaranteed to deal Critical Damage.

16470.name: Who Will Answer Your Prayers?
16470.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 10.0%. If this ship has a Dive Bomber equipped: increases this ship's RLD by 10.0%. While this ship is afloat and your Airspace Control rating is higher than Air Denial: increases your Royal Navy Vanguard ships' AA and EVA by 15.0% and decreases your Royal Navy Main Fleet ships' aircraft DMG taken by 6.0%.

16490.name: The Pride of a Senior Knight...
16490.desc: When the battle starts, if there is a DD or CL in your Vanguard: increases this ship's SPD by 3 and FP by 10.0%. When this ship takes DMG: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations; if this barrage hasn't fired once in the past 20s: fires this barrage).

16500.name: The Steadfast Mighty Oak
16500.desc: Once per battle, when a Royal Navy ship in your fleet takes DMG that would sink her: that DMG is negated, that ship recovers 3.0% of her max HP, and she evades all attacks for 3s. When this ship's max HP falls below 18.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 18.0% and, once every 5s, recovers 3.0% of this ship's max HP; when this ship's max HP is above 18.0%: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 18.0% and tanks 50.0% of the DMG your Royal Navy Main Fleet ships would take while decreasing that DMG by 30.0%.

16510.name: Supporting Wings - Argus
16510.desc: When the HP of a CV or CVL in your fleet falls below 20.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of that ship's max HP (can only activate once per ship). While this ship is afloat: 1) When the fleet this ship is in starts a battle, increases your CVs' and CVLs' AVI by 12.0% and RLD by 10.0%, and decreases the loading time of this ship's first airstrike by 25.0%; 2) When the battle starts for the fleet this ship is NOT in, increases your CVs' and CVLs' AVI and RLD by 8.0%. Does not stack with the skill "Supporting Wings."

16520.name: Glory's Trailblazer
16520.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 50.0% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 special torpedo bomber airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; if there is any other CV or CVL in your fleet, this activation chance increases by 20.0%). Increases the EXP your CVs and CVLs gain after the battle by 10.0%.

16540.name: How Pathetic~
16540.desc: Every time this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 6 times). When this buff reaches the maximum stack: increases AA by 25.0% for your Vanguard ships with a lower AA stat than this ship until the battle ends.

16550.name: Scylla's Embrace
16550.desc: When the battle starts, if there are any other ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's TRP and EVA by 20.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by this barrage take 6.0% increased aircraft DMG for 6s. When 6 enemy aircraft have been shot down within your Vanguard's Anti-Air Gun range: while this ship is afloat, your CVs and CVLs take 15.0% less DMG (does not stack with the skill "Carrier Escort").

16560.name: Your Hero is Here~
16560.desc: When the battle starts, and every 20s: performs a Lv.10 Hero Knockout or Hero Slash attack and increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ASW by 30.0% (special attack DMG is based on the skill's level; the stat buffs gradually decrease to 0 over 20s).

16570.name: Lookin' Out For My Sidekicks~
16570.desc: Every 20s: performs a sonar scan, revealing enemy SSs for 10.0s and deploys a shield (lasts 10s). When this skill activates: decreases your Vanguard's torpedo DMG taken by 10.0% for 10.0s.

16580.name: Lone Wolf of the Snowstorm
