16580.desc: When the battle starts, if this ship is the only ship in your Vanguard: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ACC by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 25.0%; if there are other ships in your Vanguard, every time this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP, TRP, and ACC by 15.0% for 12s (can only activate once a second; effect does not stack; repeat activations only refresh the buff's duration).

16590.name: Hunter's Stealth  Seaplanes
16590.desc: 3s after the battle starts, and every 15s: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike using two seaplanes (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat). Each seaplane applies a debuff to one enemy that increases their DMG taken from Kursk by 10.0% for 10s (the debuffs can target the same enemy and can be stacked up to 2 times).

16600.name: Hunter's Stealth  Submersibles
16600.desc: Every 15s: summons 2 Lv.10 Flea mini-submarines that fire torpedoes; the Fleas remain active for 10s and have a 70.0% chance to inflict a special Flooding ailment (lasts 10s) to enemies hit (the Fleas' DMG dealt is based on the skill's level and Kursk's TRP stat).

16610.name: Revolutionary Standard-Bearer
16610.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increase the DMG of your BBs by 8.0% for 10s.

16620.name: Fortitude of Ice
16620.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: a random ship in your fleet recovers 8.0% of her max HP; if that ship is a Northern Parliament ship, also increases her EVA by 15.0% for 10s.

16630.name: Voroshilov's Icebind
16630.desc: This ship gains a special Lv.10 Secondary Gun during battle (DMG is based on the skill's level) which inflicts the Icebind debuff to enemies hit, decreasing their SPD by 2.0% for 4s (can be stacked up to 10 times; repeat activations while the debuff is active also refresh its duration). Every 18s: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); when this barrage hits an enemy with the Icebind debuff, removes the debuff and instead increases that enemy's cannon DMG taken by 5.0% for 8s.

16640.name: Revolutionary Composure
16640.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 8.0% but decreases her SPD by 3. When this ship's Anti-Air Guns fire: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases her aircraft DMG taken by 15.0% for 8s (this effect can only activate once every 20s).

16650.name: Lumbersome Lessons
16650.desc:
When this ship launches an airstrike: targets a random enemy and decreases its SPD by a set value (based on the grade of the lesson: A: 60.0%; B: 40.0%; C: 20.0%) for 5s.
"To become a proper lady, etiquette lessons are quintessential!"

16660.name: Light Snacktime
16660.desc:
Every 20s: this ship recovers 5.0% of her max HP and launches a Lv.10 Albacore airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this skill activates while this ship is at 90.0% HP or above, every ship in your fleet is instead healed for 1.0% of their respective max HP.
"It's time for snacks!"

16670.name: Making a Splash!
16670.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship hits the same enemy with her Main Guns 10 times: increases this ship's DMG dealt to that enemy by 10.0% (does not stack).

16680.name: Slip and Slide!
16680.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 12.0% and SPD by 3. When this ship's "All Out Assault" skill activates: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 8.0% for 5s. When this ship takes DMG as a result of an attack: 15.0% chance to decrease this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% for 10s (20s cooldown between activations).

16690.name: Big Seven - Nelson
16690.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage depending on the number of enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16700.name: Close Engagement
16700.desc: In battle, each time this ship takes DMG: increases her FP and ACC by 5.0% (Can stack up to 3 times; At 3 stacks, the probability of activating "Big Seven: Nelson" is increased by 30.0%). Additionally, if "Nelson's Pennant of Victory" is equipped, creates a barrier for 6s that can absorb up to 5.0% of this ship's Max HP.

16710.name: Regina, the Iron Empress
16710.desc: When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Iron Blood ships afloat in the fleet: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. Every 15s after the battle starts: locks onto a random enemy (prioritizes humanoid enemies), increases the DMG dealt by Iron Blood ships to that target by 8.0% for 5s, and performs a Lv.10 special attack; If that target is sunk, performs an additional Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on this ship's TRP and the skill's level).

16720.name: Scarlet Supernova Fortress
16720.desc: When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Iron Blood ships afloat in the fleet: increases this ship's AA by 18.0%. Every time this ship takes 10 instances of DMG: creates a shield for 8s that can block up to 6 enemy bullets (the count restarts after the shield expires). When this effect activates while an enemy is locked on by "Regina, the Iron Empress", the duration is extended by an additional 8s, and additionally creates a barrier that can absorb up to 5.0% of this ship's Max HP in DMG.

16730.name: A Good Girl's Caprice
16730.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: subtracts 50 HP from a random ship in your fleet and, with a 70.0% chance, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). The ship who lost HP because of this skill's effect deals 8.0% more DMG for 8s; after 8s has passed, that ship recovers 5.0% of her max HP.

16740.name: Naughty, Naughty
16740.desc: When the battle starts, for any other ship afloat in your fleet: increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). If this ship is your Flagship: increases this ship's RLD by 15.0% and her DMG dealt by 10.0% until the battle ends.

16750.name: Calamitous Voidflame
16750.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and RLD by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 1) The first volley of the salvo is guaranteed to critically hit, and 2) fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that creates zones on the battlefield that enemies are drawn to.

16760.name: Geryon, the Ruin-Eater
16760.desc:
During battle, the autonomous rigging Geryon will switch between two modes to provide support. The support mode toggles each time Bismarck Zwei fires her Main Guns:
1) Synchron-Link: Reduces DMG received by Bismarck Zwei by 20.0%, and increases the power of the next "Calamitous Voidflame" special barrage. Geryon starts battle in Synchron-Link mode.
2) Synchron-Release: Geryon will separate from Bismarck Zwei, move to a different location, and begin attacking with special weapons (Geryon's stats are based on the skill's level as well as Bismarck Zwei's stats). After Geryon completes deployment as a result of this skill, it will perform another special attack Lv.10.

16770.name: Reborn Temple of Iron
16770.desc: Increases the FP, TRP, and AA of Iron Blood ships in the same fleet as this ship by 15.0%. When a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle, and while this ship is still afloat: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage 18s after the battle starts (DMG is based on the skill's level); if the Flagship of that fleet is an Iron Blood ship: also increases the AVI of that fleet's Iron Blood CVs and CVLs by 15.0%.

16790.name: Taihou-chan's Talisman of Hardening
16790.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0%. Whenever your Flagship takes DMG: increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 3 times).

16800.name: Taihou-chan's Mischief
16800.desc: Every 20s: launches a recon squadron consisting of Saiun aircraft which increase your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s; after this, every 1s: launches 1 additional random Reppuu, Suisei, or Ryusei aircraft that launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (this effect ends when either 6 total planes have been launched, or a Ryusei has been launched; special airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level).

16810.name: Role Model Torchbearer
16810.desc: Increases your Sardegna Empire BBs' FP and EVA by 10.0%. When this ship's Main Guns hit an enemy: increases all your Sardegna Empire ships' DMG dealt to that enemy by 6.0% for 6s.

16820.name: To Uphold Expectations
16820.desc: When the battle starts, if there is another Sardegna Empire BB in your fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0%; if there is none, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16830.name: Porpora Strike
16830.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has Sardegna Empire gear equipped: increases this ship's AA by 10.0% and increases this skill's barrage activation chance by 30.0%.

16840.name: In Arduis Intrepida
16840.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 10.0% and increases your Zara-class ships' DMG dealt by 6.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 90.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 4.0% and increases your Sardegna Empire Vanguard ships' ACC by 10.0%.

16850.name: Help Me! Duke Monochrome Rabbit!
16850.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: summons either Black Rabbit or White Rabbit and performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level). Every 16 times this special attack is performed: summons Duke Monochrome Rabbit and performs a Lv.10 wide-range special attack.

16860.name: Princess of the Fairytale Kingdom
16860.desc: Increases this ship's FP and EVA by 10.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: 80.0% chance to restore 1.5% of this ship's max HP. When the battle starts, if there is another Sardegna Empire ship in your fleet: increases this skill's health restoring effect's activation chance by 20.0% and, 5s after it activates, increases this ship's EVA by 5.0% for 5s.

16870.name: The Day of Glory Arrives
16870.desc: Increases this ship's SPD by 4 and EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship is attacked: 15.0% chance to deploy a barrier (lasts 8s; can negate up to 3.0% of this ship's HP in DMG; 20s cooldown between activations); when this barrier is destroyed or when it expires: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

16880.name: Anthem of Beloved Freedom
16880.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. While this ship is afloat: increases your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion ships' FP, TRP, AVI, and RLD by 8.0% and, every 20s, restores 1.0% of those ships' max HP.

16890.name: Admiral Satan
16890.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. When the battle starts and when this ship fires her Main Guns 6 times: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 30s (does not stack; repeat activations only refresh the effect's duration).

16900.name: The Guardian Lady-Knight
16900.desc: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by 10.0%. If this ship has Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion gear equipped: decreases your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion ships' DMG taken during battle by 10.0%.

16910.name: Liturgia Horarum
16910.desc: Increases this ship's AA and ASW by 10.0%. Every 20s, activates one of the following effects, chosen at random: 1) Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 20.0% for 10s; 2) Increases this ship's Crit Rate and Crit DMG by 20.0% for 10s; 3) Restores 5.0% max HP to the Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ship in your fleet with the lowest max HP remaining.

16920.name: Shells or Sorcery?
16920.desc: Increases this ship's SPD by 3, EVA by 15.0%, and Evasion Rate by 8.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns 6 times, activates one of the following randomly chosen effects: 1) Fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); 2) Uses this ship's Main Guns to fire 2 times.

16930.name: Prophetic Witch
16930.desc:
Increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0%; further increases this ship's AA by 5.0% when an enemy aircraft is shot down within your AA Gun Range (can be stacked up to 5 times).
When the battle starts: randomly chooses one of this ship's stats between FP, TRP, or ACC and increases it by 5.0% when this ship fires her torpedoes (can be stacked up to 3 times). When the battle starts, if there is another Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ship in your fleet, when this effect activates: also sets the SPD of a random enemy to 0 for 2s.

16940.name: Big Seven - West Virginia
16940.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage in a straight line forwards (DMG is based on the skill's level). Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% as a result of DMG taken: fires this special barrage.

16950.name: Leyte Gulf's Witness
16950.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 12.0%. When the battle starts, if there is another BB or BC in your fleet: increases this ship's ACC and AA by 12.0%, improves the special barrage fired by the skill "Big Seven - West Virginia," and applies the following two effects: 1) Enemies hit by the special barrage have their SPD reduced by 30.0% for 5s; 2) Increases your BBs' and BCs' DMG dealt to enemies slowed by this skill by 8.0%.

16960.name: Will of the Tribunal
16960.desc: Increases this ship's ACC by 12.0%. When the battle starts, for each Vichya Dominion ship in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and AA by 5.0%; when the battle starts, if there is a Vichya Dominion ship in your Vanguard: increases this ship's RLD by 10.0%.

16970.name: Guiding Flames of Intrigue
16970.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this barrage have their FP, TRP, and AVI decreased by 5.0% for 5s. When the battle starts, if there are 5 Iris Libre and/or Vichya Dominion ships in your fleet, or if this ship has Iris Orthodoxy gear equipped: increases this barrage's activation chance by 25.0%.

16980.name: Holy See's Judgment
16980.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 12.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 15.0%. This ship's first Salvo always deals Critical DMG if aimed manually.

16990.name: Morningstar's Guidance
16990.desc: Every 18s, activates one of the following effects, chosen at random: 1) Increases this ship's and your Flagship's DMG dealt by 8.0% for 8s (if this ship is your Flagship, the effect does not stack); 2) Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0% and decreases your frontmost Vanguard ship's DMG taken by 8.0% for 10s.

17000.name: Holy Iris's Wishes
17000.desc: Increases this ship's RLD by 15.0%. 5s after this ship launches an airstrike: restores 7.0% of this ship's and all your Vanguard ships' respective max HP; if a recipient of this effect has less than 25.0% HP, an additional 100 HP is restored.

17010.name: Absolving Light
17010.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage using Main Gun shells and torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17020.name: Sanctification
17020.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 10.0%. Decreases this ship's shelling and torpedo DMG taken by 10.0%.

17030.name: Exorcism for the Mortal Realm
17030.desc: Increases this ship's FP, TRP, and EVA by 20.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; enemies hit by this barrage deal 10.0% less DMG to Unzen). While this ship is afloat, when a fleet this ship is NOT in starts a battle: 20s after that battle starts, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and, if there is a CA in that fleet, increases that fleet's CAs' DMG dealt with HE ammunition by 7.0%.

17040.name: Coalescence of Cloudshade and Etherlight
17040.desc: Increases this ship's torpedo Crit Rate by 50.0% and her Crit DMG by 75.0%. When the battle starts, and when this ship finishes loading her torpedoes: increases this ship's SPD by 5 for 8s and deploys a shield (lasts 8s) that can negate up to 6 enemy shells (does not stack if multiple reloads complete at the same time).

17060.name: Power o' Friendship

17070.name: Don't Mess With My Best Buds!

17080.name: As Evening Weaves, the Moon Sunders
17080.desc: When the battle starts, for each Sakura Empire ship in your fleet: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 10.0% and Evasion Rate by 5.0% and, every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17090.name: As Leaves Fall, Geese Take Flight
17090.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 10.0% and decreases her DMG taken from cruisers by 15.0%. While this ship is afloat: decreases all your other ships' DMG taken by 5.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship recovers 10.0% of her max HP.

17100.name: Fists of Fury!
17100.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations) that momentarily stops enemies hit.

17110.name: Ol' Reliable
17110.desc: Every 20s: for 10s, increases this ship's EVA, AA, and TRP by 15.0% and decreases your Vanguard's DMG taken by 10.0%.

17120.name: Hiranuma's Protection
17120.desc: When the battle starts: deploys a barrier (lasts 20s) that can negate up to 10.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG. For the first 30s of battle, when this ship fires her Main Guns: fires an additional Lv.10 supporting barrage from battleship Hiranuma (DMG is based on the skill's level). While this ship is afloat: decreases your CLs' DMG taken by 12.0%.

17130.name: Secret Cheat Code Powers!
17130.desc: Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0%. When this ship's All Out Assault skill activates: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17140.name: Space City Strike
17140.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AA by 12.0%. Every 12s: executes a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level). For every 2 enemy aircraft shot down within your fleet's AA Range: increases your Eagle Union ships' AA by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

17150.name: Fortitude in Chaos
17150.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 15.0% as a result of DMG taken: for 3s, this ship recovers 2.0% of her max HP every second, but her SPD is decreased by 60.0%. When this effect ends: increases this ship's EVA by 5.0% and restores 12.0% of her max HP.

17160.name: Unseen Phantom
17160.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 20.0%. When this ship is attacked: 50.0% chance for this ship to enter the Phantom state. This state increases her Evasion Rate by 10.0% and lasts for 5s. When this state ends: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). There is a 15s cooldown between Phantom state activations.

17170.name: Ghost Ship of the Deep
17170.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and restores 25.0% of her max HP. When this ship's Evasion Rate increases as a result of her skills activating: restores 5.0% of this ship's max HP. Once per battle, 5s after this ship's HP falls below 40.0% as a result of DMG taken, or 60s after she has entered the battle: summons a Ghost Ship which copies some of this ship's stats, then this ship leaves the battle. The Ghost Ship lasts for 5s, does not attack, and the percentages of stats it copies increases based on the skill's level.

17190.name: Untarnishable Brilliance of Gold
17190.desc: When the battle starts: deploys a barrier (lasts 30s) that can negate up to 10.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG, and increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 20.0% until the battle ends. While this ship is afloat: increases your Tempesta ships' FP and DMG dealt by 10.0%.

17200.name: Peerless Cannons of Destruction
17200.desc: When the battle starts, if there are 2 or more Tempesta ships in your fleet: decreases the loading time of this ship's first volley by 80.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17210.name: For a Good Night's Sleep
17210.desc: When the battle starts, and every 10s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17220.name: What a Pain...
17220.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 15.0%. When the battle starts: restores 8.0% of her max HP once per second for 5s. 5s after this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken, or 45s after she has entered the battle: this ship leaves the battle.

17240.name: Pierce the Mistveil
17240.desc: Increases this ship's FP and RLD by 12.0%. Creates a Deep Domain area around this ship that decreases the enemy's SPD by 20.0% and inflicts 30 DMG every second to enemies within it; when the battle starts, if there is another Tempesta ship in your fleet, this DMG is increased to 60.

17250.name: Hindhorn's Grace
17250.desc:
Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and, every 18s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 40.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship evades all attacks for 3s and recovers 15.0% of her max HP.

17260.name: Claws of Mistrust
17260.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%. When this ship fires the weapon in her Main Gun slot: additionally fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

17270.name: Treasure of the Loyal Protector
17270.desc: Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 7.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 8.0% of this ship's max HP.

17280.name: Lady Lou
17280.desc: When the battle starts, and the first time each battle when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: deploys a barrier that can negate up to 8.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG (only 1 barrier can be active at a time). While this ship is afloat: decreases the DMG taken of your Northampton-class ships, CVs, and CVLs by 10.0%.

17290.name: The Lady's Advance
17290.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage does not activate: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 10s.

17300.name: Ready, Raring, and Motivated
17300.desc:
Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0%.
When the battle starts, and every 20s: summons 2 Bunbun Strikers. The Bunbun Strikers fight for 15s, attacking enemies with their weapons, and gain stats based on Laffey II's stats (the amount of stats gained is based on the skill's level).
Every 12s: 70.0% chance to perform a radar scan, marking 3 enemies and decreasing their AA and AVI by 6.0%, and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this effect activates: this ship gains stacks of Motivation based on the number of active Bunbun Strikers.
Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 2.0% and increases the radar scan's activation chance by 6.0% for each stack of Motivation (can stack up to 5 times).

17310.name: Bunbun Scout
17310.desc:
When the battle starts, if this ship has Eagle Union gear or weapons equipped: gains a Lv.10 special AA gun and decreases this ship's DMG taken from aircraft by 20.0%.
For every 2 enemy aircraft shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Range: increases this ship's AA by 10.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times) and this ship gains 1 stack of Motivation.
When a total of 9 enemy aircraft have been shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Range: increases the recovery speed of your Main Fleet Eagle Union ships' Detection Gauge by 1 until the battle ends; once per battle, if your Flagship is an Eagle Union ship, also sets that ship's Detection Gauge value to 0 after 10s.

17320.name: Fiercer When Cornered
17320.desc:
Decreases this ship's Burn DMG taken by 15.0%.
During battle, if this ship loses more than 10.0% of her current HP in a single hit: decreases that DMG to 10.0% of this ship's current HP and gains 1 stack of Motivation. When this effect reduces incoming DMG, that DMG will not fall below 2.5% of this ship's max HP.
Once per battle, when this ship takes DMG that would sink her: negates that DMG and deploys a barrier that can negate up to 15.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG. While this barrier is active, when a ship in your fleet launches an airstrike: restores 2.0% of this ship's max HP (the 5th time this healing effect activates, the barrier vanishes).

17330.name: Battle Star Fireworks
17330.desc:
Increases this ship's AA and ACC by 15.0%.
After every 2 attacks with this ship's Secondary Guns: increases this ship's AA by 5.0% (can stack up to 5 times); when this buff achieves its max stacks, all your ships with a lower AA stat than Guam gain 15.0% increased AA until the battle ends.

17340.name: Guest Incoming!

17350.name: On-Air Broadcast Assistance
17350.desc:
Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
When the battle starts, if the ship above your Flagship is a BB, BC, or BBV, when that ship fires her Main Guns: scans 1 enemy and inflicts Armor Break to them.
For the first 5 battles fought by a fleet this ship is NOT in, while this ship is afloat, increases that fleet's Eagle Union ships' AA and ACC by 10.0%. Additionally, when an enemy comes within 65 units of your Flagship: fires a Lv.10 special supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 5s cooldown between activations; can only activate up to 5 times per battle).

17370.name: Scaling Spiral
17370.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 80% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has Eagle Union gear or weaponry equipped: increases this barrage's activation chance by 20.0%.

17380.name: Soaring Star-Chaser
17380.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 20.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0% to enemies with less SPD than this ship.

17390.name: Young Eagles' Roost
17390.desc: Increases this ship's ACC and AVI by 15.0%. If this ship has at least 1 Eagle Union aircraft equipped: increases all of this ship's aircraft efficiencies by 15.0%. 5s after this ship's airstrike finishes loading: performs a sonar scan, revealing enemy SSs for 5s, and launches a Lv.10 TBM Avenger ASW attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's ASW stat).

17400.name: Playful Avengers
17400.desc: When this ship takes DMG: launches a Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level), inflicts 30 DMG to your Flagship, and 3s later, restores 3.0% of that ship's max HP (10s cooldown between activations; can only activate up to 5 times per battle).

17410.name: Teary-Eyed Huntress
17410.desc:
When this boat's equipped torpedoes hit an enemy (skill effects can only affect the same enemy once every 10s):
1) Decreases that enemy's SPD by 30.0% for 4s. When this boat's torpedoes hit an enemy affected by this skill's SPD debuff: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations).
2) With a 50.0% chance, increases this boat's DMG dealt to the enemy hit by 30.0% for 10s.

17420.name: Fish Are Friends
17420.desc: Increases this boat's ASR by 1. Increases this boat's torpedo Crit Rate by 15.0% and DMG dealt against Light Armor enemies by 10.0%. If this boat is your Submarine Fleet's Flagship or if there is another Gato-class SS in your fleet: increases your Gato-class SSs' TRP and ACC by 10.0%.

17450.name: For All Things, Benefits Bestowed
17450.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are other Dragon Empery ships in your fleet: increases all your ships' DMG dealt by 5.0% and increases your Dragon Empery ships' DMG dealt by a further 5.0%.

17460.name: For Safe Returns, Schemes Shaped
17460.desc: Every 8s: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage; if this barrage does not activate, instead increases this ship's FP and TRP by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; buff can stack up to 3 times). Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP and deploys a barrier (lasts 15s) equal to 10.0% of this ship's max HP.

17470.name: Lady Yuen's Grand "Adventure"
17470.desc: 10s after the battle starts and every 15s after that: goes on an Adventure for 5s. Depending on the result of the Adventure, applies 1 buff to a random ship in your fleet for 8s and a debuff to 1 random enemy for 8s. Once per battle, if the Adventure fails, or if this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's SPD by 5 and Evasion Rate by 5.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 10.0% until the battle ends.

17480.name: Inkscape of Dancing Clouds
17480.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by 20.0% and, if there is another Dragon Empery ship in your fleet, increases this ship's DMG dealt by 10.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if there is any non-DD Dragon Empery ship in your fleet, this barrage is improved).

17500.name: Unfettered Freedom
17500.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike with aircraft and monochrome shells. Hits scored by these monochrome shells count as hits toward this ship's Star-Studded Formation skill.

17510.name: Dragon's Dance
17510.desc: Every 3s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat). Every 5 times this attack hits an enemy: restores 3.0% HP for the ship in your fleet with the lowest percentage HP remaining (can activate up to 3 times per battle).

17520.name: Delectable Delicacies
17520.desc: 1s after this ship fires her torpedoes: fires another wave of torpedoes (the torpedoes fired are the same as this ship's equipped torpedoes). Increases this ship's TRP and EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 30.0%.

17530.name: Tiger Thrasher!
17530.desc: Every 1s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat). Every 5 times this attack hits an enemy: increases this ship's FP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

17540.name: Gourmet Delivery!
17540.desc: 1s after this ship fires her torpedoes: fires another wave of torpedoes (the torpedoes fired are the same as this ship's equipped torpedoes). Increases this ship's SPD and EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 30.0%.

17550.name: Xuanwu's Tenacity
17550.desc: Provides 1 Missile Strike charge. Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases her Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and deploys a shield (lasts 6s) around the frontmost ship in your Vanguard that can negate up to 6 enemy shells.

17560.name: United As One+
17560.desc: When sortied in a full fleet with 6 ships: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 25.0% and TRP and EVA by 10.0%.

17570.name: From Information Into Insight
17570.desc: When the battle starts: performs Strategic Divination and applies a buff to either your Vanguard or Main Fleet: If your Vanguard is chosen, applies one of the following buffs at random: 1) Increases FP, TRP, and RLD by 8.0%; 2) Decreases DMG taken from enemies by 10.0%. If your Main Fleet is chosen, applies one of the following buffs at random: 1) Increases FP, AVI, and ACC by 8.0%; 2) Increases AA by 10.0% and decreases DMG taken from enemies by 8.0%.

17580.name: Always Prepared, Always Vigiliant
17580.desc: Increases this ship's RLD by 10.0%. This ship ignores the penalties of the Out of Ammo debuff. Every 15s: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level; if when the battle starts there is another Dragon Empery ship in your fleet, sets this barrage's activation chance to 100%).

17590.name: Sublimation, to Sunder All Storms
17590.desc: When this ship finishes loading her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Inflicts the following effects for 6s to enemies hit by this barrage: 1) Decreases SPD by 40.0%; 2) Increases DMG taken by 8.0%; 3) When Sovetsky Soyuz attacks the enemy, increases her Crit Rate by 10.0%.

17600.name: Irradiance, to Extol Solidarity's Glory
17600.desc: When the battle starts: increases your Northern Parliament ships' FP, TRP, and AVI by 15.0%. While this ship is afloat and there are 2 CVs/CVLs in your Main Fleet: increases your Main Fleet's ACC by 10.0% and your CVs' and CVLs' DMG dealt by 10.0%; if there are 2 or more BBs, BCs, or BBVs in your Main Fleet: increases this ship's Crit Rate, RLD, and DMG dealt by 10.0%.

17610.name: Adamantine, the Walls of Forts Impregnable
17610.desc: When there are other Northern Parliament ships in your fleet: decreases your Northern Parliament ships' Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. During a sortie, when another fleet is battling and this ship is afloat: 18s after that fleet's battle starts, fires a Lv.10 special supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Decreases the Crit Rate of torpedoes hitting this ship by 20.0% and decreases their DMG by 10.0%.

17620.name: The Strength of Gentle Sunlight
17620.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 15.0%. While this ship is afloat: every 10s, every ship in your Vanguard recovers 1.0% of their max HP. The first time this recovery effect activates: also increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0% until the battle ends.

17630.name: Firepower Overload!
17630.desc: When the battle starts, if there is another Northern Parliament ship in your fleet: gains the buff Max Firepower; every 20s, 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 40.0% for 10s. Every 10s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level), if this barrage sinks an enemy ship, fires this barrage again (up to 2 activations possible within 5s).

17650.name: Oathbound Chains
17650.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP by 15.0%. When this ship's Main Guns hit an enemy: 70% chance to, for 8s, decrease that enemy's SPD by 15.0% and increase your Gangut-class BBs' and your Northern Parliament Vanguard ships' DMG dealt by 12.0%.

17660.name: Protecting Links
17660.desc: During battle, while this ship is afloat: increases your Northern Parliament ships' EVA by 10.0% and decreases all your other Northern Parliament ships' Burn DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship takes DMG: fires a Lv.10 special barrage and, for 10s, decreases your Northern Parliament ships' DMG taken by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; 20s cooldown between activations).

17670.name: Creative Burst
17670.desc: Every 18s: 60.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this barrage hits an enemy: for 8s, decreases that enemy's ACC by 15.0% and increases their DMG taken from this ship by 10.0%.

17680.name: Undeniable Rip-Roaring Spirit
17680.desc: Increases this ship's AA by 15.0%. After this ship has fired her Main Guns 15 times: for 5s, decreases this ship's SPD by 3; once this effect ends, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% until the battle ends.

18010.name: MKV-Class AP Shells 194/160+
18010.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with AP by 40.0%.

18040.name: Against the Current+
18040.desc: When this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores 15.0% of its max HP over 10s. This effect can only activate once per battle. Additionally, for every 1.0% of max HP lost since the start of the battle: increases this ship's RLD by 1.

18050.name: Body and Soul+
18050.desc: Increases this ship's Torpedo Crit Rate by 40.0% and Torpedo Crit DMG by 65.0%. Additionally, when this ship fires its Torpedoes: increases this ship's EVA by 12.0% for 6s.

18070.name: A Legend's Inheritance+
18070.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: 70% chance to fire an improved special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

18100.name: Well-Rounded Armor+
18100.desc: After the battle begins and every 30s after that: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for 15s.

18120.name: Engine Boost+
18120.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 8. At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 35.0% for 50s.

18130.name: No-Fly Zone!+
18130.desc: When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0% for 8s; if your Airspace Control of the map is at Parity or higher: this buff's duration extends until the end of the battle, but does not stack. Additionally, when your fleet has shot down 15 or more aircraft in one battle: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 20.0% until the end of the battle.

18150.name: Iron Sight Caliber+
18150.desc: Decreases this ship's Main Gun Spread Range by 3 and increases its DMG dealt to CAs, CBs, BCs, BBs, and BBVs by 20.0%, and also increases its DMG dealt to CVs and CVLs by 10.0%.

18180.name: Kitakaze Style - Lotus Torpedoes+
18180.desc: 10s after the start of the battle: fires a special torpedo barrage (Lv.10) and decreases this ship's DMG taken by 6.0% for 50s. After every 8 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.

18200.name: Mizuho's Intuition+
18200.desc: Every 20s: 100% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 25.0%, Accuracy by 50.0%, and decrease this ship's torpedo DMG taken by 15.0% for 12s.

18210.name: Special Gunnery Training+
18210.desc: Fires a special barrage that Burns enemies once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping a Large-Caliber Main Gun: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 12.0%, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.

18220.name: Symphony of Destruction+
18220.desc: When this ship takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of her: fires a Lv.10 special barrage - Eins (DMG is based on the skill's level; 15s cooldown between activations). When this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage - Zwei (DMG is based on the skill's level). Both these barrages always fire from your Flagship position.

18240.name: Rhapsody of Darkness+
18240.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 20.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 20.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's Secondary Gun Shell Velocity by 15.0% and increases her Secondary Gun efficiency by 30.0%.

18250.name: Emotion Inhibition Module+
18250.desc: At the start of battle, if this ship's HP is greater than 50.0%: increases this ship's AA by 12.0% and improves this ship's Precision Salvo Protocol barrage. Additionally, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by 30.0% and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP (this effect can only be triggered twice per battle).

18270.name: Bounce Right Back+
18270.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 waves of torpedoes by 70.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times. While this ship's HP is at 80.0% or higher: increases this ship's DMG dealt with torpedoes by 10.0%.

18290.name: The Fearless Privateer+
18290.desc: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun's Crit Rate by 50.0% and improves its ammo type. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to Lv.10 special HE+ that has a chance to inflict a special Burn to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level). Decreases the shot requirement of this ship's All Out Assault skill to 6.

18300.name: Flintlock Burst+
18300.desc: Every 20s: fires a special barrage that penetrates enemy shields and heals this ship for 20.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Increases this ship's FP and EVA by 15.0% and RLD by 21.0%.

18320.name: Ausgewogen+
18320.desc: At the start of the battle: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by 12.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 15.0% for 60s; increases this ship's Crit DMG by 25.0% and, every 15s: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

18340.name: Herteitr's Rolling Thunder+
18340.desc: Every 18s: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage that ignores enemy shields (improved pattern; DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.

18350.name: Augmenting Mechanism: Setzer Principle+
18350.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by 40.0% and fires an additional Lv.10 barrage along with this ship's primary Salvoes (improved pattern; barrage is unaffected by this ship's position). Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

18380.name: Sky-Rending Retribution+
18380.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional Lv.10 special airstrike+ (DMG increased; DMG is based on the skill's level).

18400.name: The Great One's Shadow+
18400.desc: Increases this ship's AVI, AA, and ACC by 20.0%. When the battle starts, if this ship has Sakura Empire aircraft equipped, or if there is another Sakura Empire ship in your fleet: increases all of this ship's weapon efficiencies by 10.0%.

18440.name: Riddle Me This+
18440.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%; when this ship fires her Torpedoes: 75.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 improved special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of Torpedoes by 3s.

18460.name: Hex-Principle of Insight+
18460.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to inflict 234 DMG to all enemies and gradually reduce their SPD to 0 over 2.5s, then returning to normal instantly after 1.5s.

18500.name: Il Milione+
18500.desc: If there is at least 1 other ship in your Main Fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0% and increases her Main Gun Efficiency by 15.0% and AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%. When the battle starts, deploys 2 shields that can block 3 enemy torpedoes around the frontmost ship of your Vanguard. Improves the barrage fired by this ship's "Legendary Voyage" skill; if this ship is your Flagship, also increases the barrage's activation chance by 10.0%; if this ship is NOT your Flagship, instead increases the amount of max HP healed by "Legendary Voyage" to 8.0%.

18550.name: Lindwurm - Devouring Fang+
18550.desc: During battle, this ship gains a Lv.10 special Secondary Gun; every 5 times she fires this Secondary Gun: launches a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and restores 2.0% HP to the ship with the lowest HP percentage in the fleet; the 4th time she fires this Secondary Gun: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

18590.name: Blazing Battledance+
18590.desc: Every 20s: 100.0% chance to launch an enhanced special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship takes DMG: 20.0% chance to increase this ship's FP and AA by 5.0% and TRP by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

18610.name: Contingency Experiment - Suppressive Fire+
18610.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Medium and Heavy Armor enemies by 10.0%. When this ship's airstrike finishes loading: fires a special barrage that decreases the AA of enemies hit by 10.0% and decreases their SPD by 50.0% for 3s (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; barrage debuffs cannot be stacked). Further improves the effect of the barrage triggered by the skill "Aviation Experiment - Coordinated Bombardment."

19000.name: Siren Killer
19000.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 5.0%.

19001.name: Siren Killer
19001.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 10.0%.

19002.name: Siren Killer
19002.desc: Increases this ship's DMG to Sirens by 15.0%.

19010.name: MKV-Class AP Shells
19010.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with AP by 35.0%.

19020.name: Goddess of the Sea
19020.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores 25.0% of its max HP and increases this ship's RLD by 30.0% for the rest of the battle.

19030.name: Monarch's Coercion
19030.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Decreases the Speed of enemies hit by the barrage by 40.0% for 6s. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

19040.name: Against the Current
19040.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 20.0%: restores 12.0% of its max HP over 8s. Additionally, for every 1.0% of max HP lost since the start of the battle: increases this ship's RLD by 1.

19050.name: Body and Soul
19050.desc: Increases this ship's Torpedo Crit Rate by 40.0% and Torpedo Crit DMG by 65.0%.

19060.name: Flash of Lightning
19060.desc: When this ship fires its Torpedoes: 30.0% chance to launch a special torpedo barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

19070.name: A Legend's Inheritance
19070.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 70% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.

19080.name: Specialized Armor
19080.desc: Decreases the AP DMG this ship takes by 30.0% but slightly increases this ship's chance of catching fire (depends on the enemy's weapon caliber; maximum of 6.0%) and increases its Burn Duration by 3s.

19090.name: Expert Loader
19090.desc: Changes the ammo type of this ship's Main Guns to HE. Every time this ship fires its Main Guns: increases this ship's RLD by 3.5% (can be stacked up to 12 times.) The ammo type of this ship's Main Guns will alternate between HE and AP every 2 shots.

19100.name: Well-Rounded Armor
19100.desc: Every 30s: deploys 4 rotating shields that can each block up to 8 hits. Shields last for 15s.

19110.name: Augmented HE Ammo
19110.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with HE by 35.0% but decreases its chance to ignite enemies by 3.0%.

19120.name: Engine Boost
19120.desc: Increases this ship's Speed by 8. At the start of the battle: increases this ship's EVA by 35.0% for 40s.

19130.name: No-Fly Zone!
19130.desc: When an enemy aircraft is shot down within your fleet's Anti-Air Gun range: increases this ship's FP and AA by 15.0% for 8s. When your fleet has shot down 15 or more aircraft in one battle: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and RLD by 20.0% until the end of the battle.

19140.name: Dual Nock
19140.desc: While equipping a Main Gun in this ship's Secondary Weapon slot: increases this ship's Anti-Air Gun efficiency by 15.0%. If instead equipping an Anti-Air Gun in this slot: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 15.0%. While placed in the rearmost position of your Vanguard: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%.

19150.name: Iron Sight Caliber
19150.desc: Decreases this ship's Main Gun Spread Range by 3 and increases its DMG dealt to CAs, CBs, BCs, BBs, and BBVs by 20.0%.

19160.name: Heavy Barrel Blaster
19160.desc: When this ship fires a Salvo: 80.0% chance to fire a special barrage.

19170.name: Kitakaze Style - Horizon Splitter
19170.desc: This ship's Main Guns ignore the enemy's Armor Type and its Main Gun DMG increases based on the skill's level (Lv.10.) While equipping a Sakura Empire Main Gun: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 15.0%.

19180.name: Kitakaze Style - Lotus Torpedoes
19180.desc: 10s after the start of battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: fires a special torpedo barrage (Lv.10.) After every 10 hits with this ship's Torpedoes (barrage torpedoes do not count): fires this same barrage.

19190.name: Blazing Peaks
19190.desc: When this ship equips a Main Gun with a caliber of 280mm or higher: increases its Main Gun DMG based on the distance its shells travel to reach the enemy, up to a maximum of 25.0%. Increases this ship's Burn DMG dealt by 50.0%.

19200.name: Mizuho's Intuition
19200.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 20.0% and Accuracy by 50.0% for 12s.

19210.name: Special Gunnery Training
19210.desc: Fires a special barrage once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns. While equipping the Prototype Triple 310mm Main Gun (Type 0): increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 12.0%, lowers the number of shots needed to fire the barrage to 4, and improves the barrage.

19220.name: Symphony of Destruction
19220.desc: When this ship takes DMG or when an enemy comes within close range of this ship: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that ignores the enemy's Armor Type (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) Has a 15s cooldown between activations.

19230.name: Sonata of Chaos
19230.desc: When this ship fires an odd-numbered Salvo: increases its RLD by 50.0% and DMG dealt by 20.0% until its next reloaded Salvo. When this ship fires an even-numbered Salvo: increases its Crit Rate by 20.0% and Crit DMG by 50.0% until its next reloaded Salvo.

19240.name: Rhapsody of Darkness
19240.desc: Applies a buff to this ship based on its HP remaining. When between 100% and 70%: increases FP by 20.0%; when between 70% and 30%: increases FP by 10.0% and decreases DMG taken by 10.0%; when less than 30%: decreases DMG taken by 20.0%.

19250.name: Emotion Inhibition Module
19250.desc: Up to twice per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0%: for 8s, increases this ship's EVA by 30.0% and restores a total of 8.0% of its max HP.

19260.name: Precision Salvo Protocol
19260.desc: Each Main Gun reload gives this ship 2 Salvoes that can be fired independently. This ship's DMG bonus with manually aimed Salvoes becomes 40.0%. Every 20s: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19270.name: Bounce Right Back
19270.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first wave of torpedoes by 70.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 15.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, EVA, and AA by 5.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

19280.name: Grin and Fire!
19280.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%. Every 12s after the start of the battle: 100% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19290.name: The Fearless Privateer
19290.desc: Increases this ship's built-in Secondary Gun Crit Rate by 50.0% and improves its ammo. When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires Normal or HE ammo: this ship's Main Gun ammo type changes to Lv.10 special HE with a chance to cause a special Burn to enemies (special HE DMG increase is based on the skill's level.)

19300.name: Flintlock Burst
19300.desc: Every 20s: fires a special barrage that ignores enemy shields and heals this ship for 15.0% of the DMG dealt (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level.) When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and EVA by 5.0% and RLD by 7.0% until the end of the battle. Can be stacked up to 3 times; if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard at the start of the battle: immediately gives all 3 stacks of this buff.

19310.name: Retaliatory Shield
19310.desc: Every 15s: deploys a shield in front of this ship that lasts 8s and can block up to 6 enemy shells; if this shield is destroyed within the allotted time: fires a barrage and increases this ship's FP and Accuracy by 8.0% until the end of the battle. This buff can be stacked twice.

19320.name: Ausgewogen
19320.desc: At the start of the battle, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's Speed by 5 and EVA by 12.0% until the end of the battle, and decreases its DMG taken by 15.0% for 30s; if NOT in the frontmost position: increases this ship's Crit DMG by 25.0% and, every 15s: has a 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19330.name: Mmir's Keen Eyes
19330.desc: Changes this ship's position and decreases its DMG taken by 20.0%. Every 15s: commences a sonar scan, revealing the location of all enemy SSs for 10s, reducing their accuracy by 25.0%, and decreasing your Vanguard's DMG taken from torpedoes by 15.0% for 10s.

19340.name: Herteitr's Rolling Thunder
19340.desc: Every 18s: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage with thunderbolts that ignore enemy shields (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Changes the Spread Angle of this ship's torpedoes.

19350.name: Augmenting Mechanism: Setzer Principle
19350.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's Main Guns by 40.0% and fires an additional Lv.10 barrage along with its primary Salvoes. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

19360.name: Substitute Mechanism: Holy Thurible
19360.desc: When this ship uses a Main Gun that fires HE ammo: increases its FP by 5.0%, AA by 15.0%, and increases its HE DMG modifier against enemies with Heavy armor by 15.0%; when using one that fires AP: increases this ship's FP by 5.0%, RLD by 15.0%, and increases its Crit Rate by 20.0%. While this ship is above 75.0% HP: absorbs 50.0% of the DMG your Flagship takes (does nothing if this ship is the Flagship); when this ship's HP falls below 75.0%: increases this ship's EVA and Accuracy by 15.0%.

19380.name: Sky-Rending Retribution
19380.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to launch an additional special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

19390.name: Flame-Anointed Conquest
19390.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Fighter: fires a Lv.10 special barrage every 12s; when this ship has no Fighters equipped: instead follows up her every Airstrike with a Lv.10 slashing attack (barrage and slash attack DMG are based on the skill's level).

19400.name: The Great One's Shadow
19400.desc: When this ship is equipped with Sakura Empire aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and Accuracy by 15.0%; when none are equipped: instead increases this ship's AA and Accuracy by 15.0%.

19410.name: Engulfer of the Golden Vortex
19410.desc: When this ship's Torpedoes hit an enemy: decreases the target's Speed by 60.0% for 5s. As long as this ship is not Out of Ammo, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.

19420.name: Abyssal Banquet
19420.desc: When this ship is equipped with a Main Gun that fires Normal or AP ammo: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and increases Crit Rate by 12.0%; when equipping one that fires HE ammo: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 12.0%, but makes her unable to Burn enemies. If the equipped Main Gun is high-caliber: also increases this ship's Main Gun Efficiency by 12.0%.

19430.name: Jttun's Jaws
19430.desc: If there are no enemies near this ship when she fires her Main Guns: inflicts Armor Break to all enemies hit; once every 8 times her Main Guns are fired: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship's Main Gun is high-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4.

19440.name: Riddle Me This
19440.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%; when this ship fires her Torpedoes: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: instead decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of Torpedoes by 3s.

19450.name: Hide and Seek
19450.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: deploys a smokescreen and a barrier. Smokescreen lasts 5s and increases Evasion Rate by 40.0% for all your ships in it (does not stack with other smokescreen skills). The barrier lasts 5s and can absorb DMG up to 6.0% of this ship's max HP. If this barrier is destroyed before it expires: this ship gains 100% Evasion Rate for 2s.

19460.name: Hex-Principle of Insight
19460.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 75.0% chance to inflict 234 DMG to all enemies and gradually reduce their SPD to 0 over 2.5s, then returning to normal instantly after 1s.

19470.name: Hex-Principle of Shattering
19470.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Inflicts Armor Break to all Light and Medium armor enemies hit by this airstrike.

19480.name: Hex-Principle of Dominance
19480.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to CLs and CAs by 20.0%. When this ship is equipped with Iron Blood aircraft: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by 12.0% and Fighter efficiency by 10.0%.

19490.name: Legendary Voyage
19490.desc: When this ship has the Out of Ammo debuff: decreases the DMG penalty's effect by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a frontal barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this barrage fails to activate: heals this ship for 5.0% of her max HP.

19500.name: Il Milione
19500.desc: If there is at least 1 other Sardegnian ship in your fleet: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 20.0%. At the start of the battle, if the frontmost ship in your Vanguard is a Sardegnian ship: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0% and her AA Gun efficiency by 50.0%; if said ship is not Sardegnian, instead spawns 2 shields around that ship that can block 3 enemy torpedoes.

19510.name: Untold Tales
19510.desc: During a sortie, whenever the fleet this ship is in sinks an enemy fleet: increases this ship's AA and EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). While this ship is afloat: launches a Lv.10 supporting barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) 20s after a fleet this ship is NOT in starts its 1st and 2nd battles that sortie; for said fleet's 3rd and 4th battles: decreases DMG taken by 8.0% for your Sardegnian ships.

19530.name: Rejoice in Radiance
19530.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's FP and ACC by 12.0%. If sortied with another Royal Navy ship, or if this ship has Royal Navy gear equipped: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.

19540.name: Pathfinder's Shroud
19540.desc: Every 10s: fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and becomes Shrouded for 5s (while Shrouded, this ship takes 10.0% less DMG; upon becoming Shrouded for the 3rd time, she also restores 10.0% of her max HP). Enemies hit by this barrage become Exposed for 10s; Exposed enemies take 18.0% increased DMG from your Flagship if she is a BB, BC, or BBV.

19550.name: Lindwurm - Devouring Fang
19550.desc: During battle, this ship gains a Lv.10 special Secondary Gun; every 5 times she fires this Secondary Gun: launches a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level); the 8th time she fires this Secondary Gun: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

19560.name: Lindwurm - Protector's Oculus
19560.desc: When the battle starts, if this ship is your Flagship: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%; if NOT your Flagship, decreases DMG taken by the ship above your Flagship by 8.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 80% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

19580.name: Impactful Torpedoes
19580.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from torpedoes by 10.0%; Increases DMG dealt against Heavy Armor enemies with this ship's equipped torpedoes by 20.0%, and increases the torpedo DMG dealt by Dragon Empery DDs by 12.0%. When this ship fires her torpedoes: creates a smokescreen for 3s that increases Evasion Rate by 35.0% and decreases DMG taken from enemy aircraft by 35.0% for all your ships inside it (this effect does not stack with "Smokescreen: Light Cruisers"); After 3s, 100.0% chance to launch an additional wave of torpedoes and trigger this smokescreen effect again.

19590.name: Blazing Battledance
19590.desc: Every 20s: 100.0% chance to launch a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship takes DMG: 20.0% chance to increase this ship's FP and AA by 4.0% and TRP by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

19600.name: Aviation Experiment - Coordinated Bombardment
19600.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's AVI and RLD by 15.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level; 80% chance on launch to improve this special airstrike).

19610.name: Contingency Experiment - Suppressive Fire
19610.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Medium and Heavy Armor enemies by 10.0%. When this ship's airstrike finishes loading: fires a special barrage that decreases the AA of enemies hit by 10.0% (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; AA debuff cannot be stacked).

19630.name: Ensemble of Exultation
19630.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 10.0%. When the battle starts, if there are 3 ships in your Vanguard: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 12.0%.

19640.name: Aria of Alacrity
19640.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's SPD by 3 and EVA by 10.0%. If this ship has Iris Libre gear equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun Crit DMG and AA by 15.0%.

19650.name: Panacea's Paean
19650.desc: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores 8.0% max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores 6.0% of this ship's max HP.

19659.desc: Once every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if this ship's Main Gun is large-caliber: decreases the number of shots required to 4 and changes the properties of this barrage. The 1st time this barrage fires every battle: restores 8.0% max HP to the ship with the lowest percentage HP left in your fleet; the 2nd time this barrage fires: restores 6.0% of this ship's max HP.

19660.name: Multi-Linked Locking System
19660.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and FP by 10.0%. When this ship's aircraft hits an enemy: 100.0% chance to inflict a special Burn ailment to that target for 10s, increasing that target's shelling DMG taken from your Main Fleet by 8.0%. When this ship's Main Guns hit an enemy: 100.0% chance to increase the target's airstrike DMG taken from your Main Fleet by 4.0%; if the target is already affected by an AA stat debuff, further increases that target's airstrike DMG taken from your Main Fleet by 8.0%. This effect lasts until the next time this ship fires her Main Guns.

19670.name: Functional Amplification Mechanism
19670.desc: If this ship has an Eagle Union or Northern Parliament Main Gun equipped: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by 20.0%. If this ship has an Eagle Union or Northern Parliament aircraft equipped: increases this ship's AVI by 10.0% and decreases the loading time of her 1st airstrike by 30.0%. When the battle starts, if there is another Eagle Union ship in your Main Fleet: while this ship is afloat, your CVs and CVLs deal 15.0% more airstrike DMG (does not stack with the skill "Air Raid Assistance").

19680.name: Combat Adaptation Module
19680.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Burning enemies by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage with properties that change based on whether or not there are Burning enemies on the battlefield (inflicts a special Burn for 10s to enemies hit by the Oceanic Blaze special barrage; DMG is based on the skill's level).

19690.name: Tormentor of the Weak
19690.desc:
Increases this ship's Crit Rate by 10.0% and Crit DMG by 20.0% when attacking enemies below 50.0% HP.
Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% to enemies hit by this barrage (effect does not stack); if this ship has a CL Main Gun equipped: increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0% and reduces the activation interval of this special barrage to 10s.

19700.name: Drown in the Abyss of Desire
19700.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 18.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 18.0%. Decreases the speed of this ship's torpedoes by 1 and increases their DMG dealt by 20.0%. When the battle starts, and every 10: deploys a shield (lasts 5s; can block up to 5 shells); if this shield expires or is destroyed, increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 8.0% until this shield is deployed again. If this ship has an AP Main Gun equipped: increases this ship's DMG dealt to CLs and CAs by 15.0%.

19710.name: The Most Dangerous Game
19710.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 5.0% and EVA and ACC by 15.0%. One of the following two effects apply based on what type of weapon this ship has equipped in her third weapon slot: 1): Main Gun: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and DMG dealt by 5.0%. Shells fired from this ship's Main Guns ignore enemy shields. 2): AA Gun: increases this ship's EVA by 10.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 8.0%. When the battle starts, and every 30s: deploys 2 shields (last 15s; can each block up to 8 shells).

19720.name: Doombringer's Euphoria
19720.desc: 3s after the battle starts, and every 15s after that: fires a Lv.10 special barrage that inflicts the Hunted debuff to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level). Every 5s, if there are enemies with the Hunted debuff on the battlefield: performs a special attack.

19730.name: Apotheosis: Flourishing Assault
19730.desc: Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship fires her 2nd Main Gun volley, if she has at least 60.0% HP remaining: randomly marks 1 enemy target, prioritizing Humanoid enemies. This ship deals 12.0% increased DMG to the marked enemy. The mark lasts until Flandre falls below 60.0% HP as a result of DMG taken.

19740.name: Apotheosis: Lightplume Vestments
19740.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and FP by 20.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 3.0% of this ship's max HP once per second for 5s, then sets this ship's Secondary Gun Eff. Range and Shell Range to 95 and increases her Secondary Gun efficiency by 30.0%.

19750.name: Torrential Wrath
19750.desc:
With every 2nd wave of torpedoes this ship fires: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that inflicts a special Flooding ailment to enemies hit for 6s; when this barrage activates: extinguishes all Burning ships in your fleet (does not affect special Burn ailments) and, for 3s, reduces the Burn DMG taken by your fleet by 50.0%.
When the barrage from this skill is activated for the second time: improves this barrage until the end of battle, and fires it again after 5s.

19760.name: Divine Presence
19760.desc: When the battle starts: this ship gains a Lv.10 special AA Gun (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Prototype 150mm Type 5 High-Angle Gun Mount equipped: increases this ship's 3rd weapon slot efficiency by 30.0%. Every 10s, or when a ship in your fleet fires her AA Gun: increases your Vanguard's AA by 6.0% (maximum of 3 activations; can be stacked). When this effect activates 3 times: restores 4.0% of your Vanguard's max HP and, until the battle ends, decreases Shimanto's DMG taken by 18.0%.
