30202.name: All Out Assault II
30202.desc: Activates All Out Assault II: Ognevoy once every 10 times the Main Guns are fired, and with a 50.0% chance, increases this ship's FP by 20.0% for 10s.

101010.name: Protagonist Aura
101010.desc: If deployed with any other Neptunia ship, increases own damage by 10.0% and decreases own damage taken by 6.0%. For every other Neptunia ship deployed, further increases own damage by 2.0%,and decreases own damage taken by 1.0%

101020.name: Medistation S
101020.desc: Upon taking damage, 8.0% chance to increase own damage dealt by 25.0% for 8 seconds.

101030.name: Power Break
101030.desc: If in the same fleet as Vert or Green Heart, increases own damage dealt by 25.0% and damage taken by 15.0%. Otherwise, decreases own damage taken by 25.0% and damage dealt by 15.0%.

101040.name: Assam Link
101040.desc: For each Destroyer in the fleet, increases own reload by 5.0% and reduces damage taken from shelling by 5.0%.

101050.name: Cross Combination
101050.desc: Every 6 times the main gun is fired, the next main gun salvo will critically strike.

101060.name: Victory Slash
101060.desc: After 115 seconds in combat, unleashes a devastating barrage (Lv.10). Can only activate once per combat.

101070.name: Blaze Break
101070.desc: 40.0% chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage (Lv.10) that has a chance to set enemies on fire for 12 seconds.

101080.name: Tricolor Order
101080.desc: Main gun shots will ignore enemies' armor type. Further increases main gun damage based upon skill level.

101090.name: Lacy Dance
101090.desc: 40.0% chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage (Lv.10).

101100.name: Tnzerin Trombe
101100.desc: Each main gun hit increases own torpedo critical chance by 1.5%, stacking up to 20 times. All stacks are consumed after firing torpedoes.

101110.name: Getter Ravine
101110.desc: 40.0% chance to activate every 20 seconds, fires a strong barrage (Lv.10) that has a chance to slow enemies for 8 seconds.

101120.name: Darjeeling Rotation
101120.desc: Every 15 seconds, switches between the following effects: 1) Reduces damage taken by 20.0%, 2) Increases damage dealt by 20.0%, 3) Restores 15 HP every 3 seconds.

101130.name: Rainy Ratnapura
101130.desc: 40.0% chance to activate every 20 seconds, launch a special airstrike (Lv.10).

104010.name: Kizuna Beam
104010.desc: Every 20s: this ship performs super A.I. hacking to decrease the FP, TRP, and AVI of all enemies by a large amount (up to 8.0%) for 8s... Also has a small chance to accidentally increase the stats of all enemies instead.

104020.name: Crisis Prevention!
104020.desc: When this ship takes DMG: 12.0% chance to fire a special torpedo barrage and avoid all enemy attacks for 3s. Once the effect ends: increases this ship's EVA by 40.0% for 3s.

104030.name: Connected
104030.desc: For each Kizuna AI in your fleet (excluding this ship) at the start of the battle: increases this ship's FP by 6.0% (can be stacked up to 4 times.) If there are no other Kizuna AIs in your fleet: decreases the DMG this ship takes by 15.0% for 30s after the battle starts.

104040.name: Everything Is In Order
104040.desc: Decreases the duration this ship Burns by 3s and decreases the HE DMG it takes by 15.0%.

104050.name: Future Base
104050.desc: 30s, 45s, and 60s after the start of the battle: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike. Airstrike damage is based on the skill's level.

104060.name: Melty World
104060.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike while sortied with Kizuna AI: 25.0% chance for the Airstrike to deal double DMG.

104070.name: Super AIming Adjustments
104070.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 30.0% but increases its Spread Range by 1. Every 16s after the start of the battle: 70.0% chance to fire a special barrage. Barrage damage is based on the skill's level.

104080.name: Coercion Assistance Mode
104080.desc: Increases this ship's Accuracy and EVA by 25.0% through the use of advanced super A.I. tracking.

105010.name: Mach 2.42 Blossom
105010.desc: Dive Bombers can be equipped in this ship's third gear slot, and will use the "Mach 2.42 Bermbew Sprawt" gear skin, but Airstrike load time increases by 100.0%. Every 20s: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat.)

105020.name: Two-Faced Fox
105020.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 15.0% at the start of the battle. If the fleet this ship is in has sunk 3 enemy fleets on the map: also increases this ship's TRP by 12.0%.

105030.name: DreamStory
105030.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that Burns enemies. DMG is based on the skill's level.

105040.name: Beneath the Deep Blue Sky
105040.desc: Decreases DMG taken by Hololive ships by 7.0%. Every 20s: for 8s, decreases the Speed of all onscreen enemies by 10.0%, increases the Accuracy of all your ships by 10.0%, and increases the Speed of all your Hololive ships by 10.0%.

105050.name: Shut-in Maid
105050.desc: Decreases this boat's OXY by 60. For 20s after entering battle: increases this boat's DMG by 30.0%. When this boat retreats from battle: increases its Speed by 100.0%.

105060.name: Failen Angel
105060.desc: When entering battle: applies 1 randomly chosen buff to your fleet. The buff's effect is increased to 150% for Hololive ships.

105070.name: Promise to the Sunflower
105070.desc: When entering battle: fires a special guaranteed Lv.10 Critical Hit barrage. When there are 3 or more Hololive ships in the same fleet: improves the barrage.

105080.name: The Summer Flower We Watch
105080.desc: Every 25s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage.

105090.name: The Third Day of Flirting
105090.desc: At the start of the battle: if there are an odd number of Hololive ships in your fleet: increases this ship's Main Gun DMG by 12.0%. If their number is even: decreases the Main Gun DMG this ship takes by 5.0%. 20s after the start of the battle: randomly chooses 1 of your ships and decreases the DMG they take by 5.0% for 10s.

105100.name: Oni GoddessNakiri
105100.desc: Every 20s: 70.0% chance for this ship to buff itself using its spirits. When successfully procced: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0%. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

105110.name: Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa
105110.desc: Every 15s: activates Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa Lv.10 and gives this ship an 50.0% chance to inflict Armor Break (affected targets take more Main Gun DMG) to hit enemies for 6s. Slash DMG is based on the skill's level.

105120.name: The Wave of a Pleasant Dream
105120.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: 100% chance to create a wave of light for 8s which decreases the DMG enemies deal by 5.0%.

105130.name: MP Burst - Explosion
105130.desc: Every 8s: gain 1 MP. When this ship has accumulated 3 MP: fires a Lv.10 special barrage, and resets MP to 0.

105140.name: Wild Dualism
105140.desc: When this ship launches an odd-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Torpedo Bomber airstrike Lv.10. When launching an even-numbered Airstrike: launches an additional Dive Bomber airstrike Lv.10. Airstrike DMG is based on the skill's level.

105150.name: Tarot Card Divination
105150.desc: At the start of the battle: makes a divination that applies a randomly chosen Lv.10 buff to this ship.

106010.name: Rose's Thorns
106010.desc: After the battle starts: for 60s, increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. When this ship takes DMG: 10.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that always crits (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations.)

106020.name: Vibrant Minuet
106020.desc: Increases the DMG of this ship's first 3 torpedo launches of each battle by 50.0%. When this ship fires its Torpedoes: for 8s, increases your Vanguard's Speed by 3 and EVA by 15.0% for the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard.

106030.name: Rock-Paper-Cannon Salvo
106030.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and damage against Light Armor enemies by 12.0%. 5s after this ship fires its Main Guns: fires a randomly chosen Lv.10 barrage using special ammo.

106040.name: Super Mega Explosion
106040.desc: When this ship fires its Main Guns: heals 2 random ships in your fleet for 5.0% of their max HP and, with a 75.0% chance, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

106050.name: Sakura Petal Dance
106050.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle, and every time this ship lands 6 hits with its Torpedoes: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

106060.name: Misty Mirror Flower
106060.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times.) Additionally, after this ship sinks 3 enemies: increases this ship's Accuracy by 15.0% for the rest of the battle.

106070.name: Humble Part-Timer
106070.desc: After the battle starts: for 60s, increases this ship's FP and its DMG against Light Armor enemies by 15.0%. If there are other Venus Vacation characters in the same fleet: increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases its Main Gun DMG taken by 12.0%.

106080.name: Venus Friends
106080.desc: Every 20s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more DMG from Venus Vacation characters for 8s.

106090.name: Not-So-Gentle Sister
106090.desc: Every 18s after the start of the battle: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by this barrage take 12.0% more DMG from Misaki and Nagisa for 8s.

106100.name: Venus' Unpredictability
106100.desc: Decreases the DMG this ship takes by 15.0%. When this ship fires its Main Guns: decreases the Speed of a random enemy by 30.0% for 8s.

106110.name: Joker Card
106110.desc: Every 15s after the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 barrage using special ammo and poker ammo (DMG is based on the skill's level.) Enemies hit by the special ammo take 10.0% increased DMG for 6s.

106120.name: Royal Flush
106120.desc: Increases the Shell Velocity of this ship's equipped Main Gun by 10.0%. When 5 enemy aircraft are shot down within the fleet's AA range: increases this ship's TRP and AA by 12.0%.

106130.name: Dance of the Heavens
106130.desc: 5s after this ship finishes loading its Airstrike: launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level.)

106140.name: Hanakagura
106140.desc: Increases this ship's DMG against BBs by 10.0%. When this ship launches an Airstrike: 70.0% chance to decrease DMG taken for 8s by a random ship in your Vanguard.

106150.name: Scholar's Ocean Investigation
106150.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this special airstrike suffer a minus 3.0% AA debuff and take 10.0% increased DMG from this ship for 6s.

106160.name: Hunger After Work
106160.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's AVI by 10.0%. Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 airstrikes by 50.0%, but increases the loading time by 50.0% for the 3rd airstrike and onwards.

106170.name: Rose's Thorns+
106170.desc: When this ship is attacked: 10.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage that always deals Critical DMG (DMG is based on the skill's level; 10s cooldown between activations). Enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more cannon and torpedo DMG from this ship for 5s (cannot be stacked). 60s after the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

106190.name: Hunger After Work+
106190.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 10.0%. Decreases the loading time of this ship's first 2 airstrikes by 50.0%.

106210.name: Super Mega Explosion+
106210.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 2 random ships in your fleet recover 5.0% of their max HP and, with a 100% chance, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

106240.name: Misty Mirror Flower+
106240.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's FP and RLD by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times); once per battle, when she has sunk 3 enemies: increases this ship's ACC by 15.0% until the battle ends. When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: applies the above-mentioned ACC buff and increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0% until the battle ends.

106260.name: Venus' Unpredictability+
106260.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: targets a random enemy and reduces its SPD by 30.0% and EVA by 10.0% for 8s.

106280.name: Hanakagura+
106280.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt against BBs by 10.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: 100% chance to decrease the frontmost ship in your Vanguard's DMG taken by 12.0% for 8s.

106290.name: Royal Flush+
106290.desc: Increases the Shell Velocity of this ship's equipped Main Gun by 10.0%. When 5 enemy aircraft are shot down in your fleet's AA Range: increases your Vanguard's TRP and AA by 12.0%.

106320.name: Fitting Time
106320.desc: While this ship is afloat: decreases all enemies' FP and TRP by 8.0%. Every 16s: spawns a barrier (lasts 8s; can negate up to 3.0% of the recipient's max HP in DMG) around 2 random Venus Vacation collab characters. Sets this ship's Secondary Gun Range to 80 and, when she fires her Secondary Guns: decreases a random enemy's SPD by 40.0% for 3s (8s cooldown between activations).

106330.name: lisianthus Halation
106330.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0% and increases her FP and ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 80% chance to fire a Lv.10 barrage that inflicts Armor Break to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).

106340.name: lisianthus Halation +
106340.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0% and increases her FP and ACC by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 barrage that inflicts Armor Break to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level). The first time each battle that this ship fires her Secondary Guns: also fires the above special barrage.

106360.name: Humble Part-Timer+
106360.desc: 60s after the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and DMG dealt to Light Armor enemies by 15.0% and increases her cannon DMG dealt by 12.0%. When the battle starts, if there is another Venus Vacation collab character in your fleet: increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by 12.0%.

107010.name: Cutesy Clumsy?
107010.desc: Each second in combat, this ship has a 10.0% chance of dealing 43 DMG to herself; if this effect activates: after 3s, heals this ship and the lowest HP% ship in the fleet for 5.0% HP (this effect can only activate 2 times per battle).

107020.name: An Idol's Ambitions
107020.desc: When this ship fires her #2 wave of Torpedoes in a battle: increases all enemies' DMG taken by 15.0% for 5s. After this effect activates, when this ship fires her Torpedoes: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked 2 times).

107030.name: Positivity Burst!
107030.desc: Every 15s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

107040.name: Cerulean Song
107040.desc: When this ship launches her first Airstrike in a battle: 80% chance (100.0% on subsequent Airstrikes) to launch a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level). At the start of the battle, if there is another The Idolmaster collab ship in your fleet: increases the first activation chance to 100.0%.

107050.name: The Fruits of Labor
107050.desc: When this ship sinks an enemy: increases this ship's AVI and RLD by 5.0% until the end of the battle (can be stacked up to 3 times). At the start of the battle, if there is another The Idolmaster collab ship in your fleet: adds 3 stacks of this buff.

107060.name: Alongside the Ocean's Wings
107060.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first Airstrike by 30.0%. Decreases DMG taken by 10.0% for all The Idolmaster collab ships in your fleet.

107070.name: Iori Strike!
107070.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

107080.name: Iori Defense!
107080.desc: At the start of the battle: randomly chooses 1 other ship in your fleet and decreases her DMG taken by 10.0% for 30s. Once this effect wears off: heals that ship for 10.0% HP.

107090.name: Feigned Innocence?
107090.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 30.0% chance to increase this ship's Main Gun DMG by 50.0% for 3s and AA by 15.0% for 5s. This effect may only activate once every 5s.

107100.name: Healing Augury
107100.desc: As long as this ship is afloat: decreases your Main Fleet's DMG taken by 5.0%. At the start of the battle: tells a fortune and receives one of the following effects: 1) Increases this ship's EVA by 12.0%; 2) Increases this ship's Accuracy by 12.0%; 3) Increases this ship's FP by 12.0%; 4) Heals this ship for 15.0% HP.

107110.name: Directionally Challenged
107110.desc: Every 20s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If your Vanguard consists of only this ship when this barrage activates: this ship becomes lost and stops in place (Speed drops to 0) for 2s.

107120.name: Fleet Course Management
107120.desc: 5s after the battle starts, as well as every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more DMG from The Idolmaster collab ships for 5s. At the start of the battle, if there are no more than 3 The Idolmaster collab ships in your fleet: increases this ship's FP by 100.0% and improves this barrage.

107130.name: Logistics Buddy
107130.desc: When this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases the time this ship Burns by 3s and decreases your Flagship's Burn DMG taken by 15.0%, but also decreases this ship's Speed by 3.

107140.name: Prankster's Cheer - Ami
107140.desc: When this boat enters the battle: decreases the Speed of a random ship in your Vanguard by 1 for 1s, then heals said ship for 100 HP and increases her EVA by 8.0% for 20s.

107150.name: Double Trouble - Ami
107150.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

107160.name: Prankster's Cheer - Mami
107160.desc: When this boat enters the battle: decreases the Speed of a random ship in your Main Fleet by 1 for 1s, then heals said ship for 100 HP and increases her Accuracy by 8.0% for 20s.

107170.name: Double Trouble - Mami
107170.desc: At the start of the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108010.name: Grid Beam
108010.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's FP by 15.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 Grid Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Battle Tracto Max or Buster Borr equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances this skill.

108020.name: Slash & Circus
108020.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's AA by 15.0% and decreases her cannon DMG taken by 8.0%. 5s after the battle starts, and every 30s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Gridman Calibur or Sky Vitter equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances this skill.

108030.name: Grid Fixer Beam
108030.desc: 40s after the battle starts: fires a Lv.10 Grid Fixer Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level) and heals your fleet 3 times for 1.0% max HP per tick. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: heals your fleet.

108040.name: Energy Pulse
108040.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108050.name: Instance Abreaction
108050.desc: Every 20s: activates "Instance Abreaction" and launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on this ship's FP stat and the skill's level; airstrike deals cannon-type DMG).

108060.name: Ever-Burning Flame
108060.desc: Increases this ship's FP by 8.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's FP by 10.0% and heals this ship 4 times for 2.0% max HP per tick.

108070.name: Calibur End
108070.desc: Every 20s: executes a Lv.10 Gridman Calibur slashing attack and spawns a shield that lasts 8s and can block up to 10 shots (slashing attack DMG is based on the skill's level).

108080.name: Tanker Cannon
108080.desc: Enhances this ship's Secondary Guns using the Battle Tracto Max. Every 15s: 70.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108090.name: Coordinated Volley
108090.desc: Every 10 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special missile barrage using the Buster Borr, and deploys a smokescreen that lasts 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level). When your ship(s) enters the smokescreen: puts out any normal Burn status ailment for that ship(s).

108100.name: Amp Laser Circus
108100.desc: 5s after the battle starts, and with a 70.0% chance every 20s after that: fires a Lv.10 laser barrage using the Sky Vittor, and increases this ship's AA by 8.0% (AA buff can be stacked up to 2 times per battle).

108110.name: Blazing Inferno Rex Roar
108110.desc: Every 20 times this ship fires her Secondary Guns: fires a Lv.10 Blazing Inferno Rex Roar (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108120.name: Something Beam
108120.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Every 18s: fires a Lv.10 beam using the Penetrator Gun which inflicts Armor Break to Heavy Armor enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108130.name: Dynazenon Full Burst
108130.desc: Every 10 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108140.name: Ride the Wind
108140.desc: This ship starts the battle with 1 Airstrike ready. Every battle, when this ship launches her 2nd Airstrike and onwards: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108150.name: Take to the Skies
108150.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches her 1st and 3rd Airstrikes: launches a Lv.10 bombing raid using the Goldburn, and spawns a shield around your Vanguard that lasts 10s, reduces your Vanguard's DMG taken by 8.0%, and can block up to 15 shots (Goldburn DMG is based on the skill's level).

108160.name: Instance Domination: Wings
108160.desc: Every 20s: uses Lv.10 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren aircraft and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level; aircraft deal cannon-type DMG).

108170.name: Instance Domination: Flames
108170.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: uses Lv.10 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren weaponry and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108210.name: Grid Beam+
108210.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's FP by 15.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 Grid Beam (DMG is based on the skill's level). If this ship has the Battle Tracto Max or Buster Borr equipped, or if this ship is sortied with Namiko or Hass: enhances the Grid Beam.

108220.name: Energy Pulse+
108220.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108230.name: Tanker Cannon+
108230.desc: Enhances this ship's Secondary Guns using the Battle Tracto Max. Every 15s: 100.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108240.name: Coordinated Volley+
108240.desc: Every 6 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special missile barrage using the Buster Borr, and deploys a smokescreen that lasts 5s (DMG is based on the skill's level). When your ship(s) enters the smokescreen: puts out any normal Burn status ailment for that ship(s).

108250.name: Something Beam+
108250.desc: When the battle starts: for 90s, increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and decreases the DMG taken by 8.0%. Every 18s: fires a Lv.10 beam using the Penetrator Gun which inflicts Armor Break to Heavy Armor enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108260.name: Take to the Skies+
108260.desc: Every battle, when this ship launches her 1st and 3rd Airstrikes: launches a Lv.10 bombing raid using the Big Goldburn, and spawns a shield around your Vanguard that lasts 10s, reduces your Vanguard's DMG taken by 8.0%, and can block up to 15 shots (Big Goldburn DMG is based on the skill's level).

108270.name: Instance Domination: Flames+
108270.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: uses Lv.10 Instance Domination to seize control of Siren weaponry and make them attack enemies (DMG is based on the skill's level).

108280.name: Sounderous Full Blast+
108280.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100.0% chance to perform a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat).

108290.name: Hang in There!+
108290.desc: When the battle starts, and every 20s: increases this ship's and your frontmost Vanguard ship's FP and ACC by 10.0% for 10s (if the recipient is an SSSS collab character, instead increases FP and ACC by 12.0%; effect does not stack if this ship is the frontmost ship). If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%, but decreases her SPD by 1.

108300.name: Sounderous Full Blast
108300.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 70.0% chance to perform a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP stat).

108310.name: Melodic Blaster
108310.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. Every 20s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's AVI stat) and restores 8.0% HP of one random ship in your Vanguard.

108320.name: Hang in There!
108320.desc: When the battle starts, and every 20s: increases this ship's and your frontmost Vanguard ship's FP and ACC by 10.0% for 10s (effect does not stack if this ship is the frontmost ship). If this ship has Cargo equipped: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%, but decreases her SPD by 1.

108330.name: Promises, Love, and Expiration Dates
108330.desc: Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); enemies hit by the barrage take 10.0% increased DMG from your SSSS collab characters.

109010.name: Shining Blast
109010.desc: When this ship's Item attack hits an enemy, if your fleet has 6 or more AP: consumes 6 AP and activates "Shining Blast" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level; 3s cooldown between activations).

109020.name: Alchemy Teacher
109020.desc: When sortied with one or more "Atelier Ryza" collab characters, makes their Item attacks stronger and increases their Crit Rate by 20.0%; enemies who have been Item Marked take 10.0% more DMG from "Atelier Ryza" collab characters.

109030.name: Grand Chariot
109030.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 8 AP. Increases this ship's FP, AA, and EVA by 12.0%.

109040.name: Grand Chariot+
109040.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 10 AP. Increases this ship's FP, AA, and EVA by 12.0%. The second time this ship's "Shining Blast" skill activates, activates "Fatal Drive - Grand Chariot" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Grand Chariot" skill).

109050.name: Frozen Lily
109050.desc: Every 10s, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Frozen Lily" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this skill are slowed by 15.0% for 5s.

109060.name: Blessed Melody
109060.desc: When the battle starts: your fleet gains 10 AP, all ships in your fleet recover 5.0% of their max HP, and all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters recover an additional 2.0% of their max HP. When this ship launches an Airstrike: your Vanguard recovers 5.0% of their max HP and all your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters recover an additional 2.0% of their max HP. Once per battle, when a ship in your fleet falls below 30.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: that ship recovers 5.0% of her max HP and your fleet gains 10 AP.

109070.name: White Requiem
109070.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. Every 8s: your fleet gains 8 AP.

109080.name: White Requiem+
109080.desc: Increases this ship's AVI and ACC by 15.0%. Every 8s: your fleet gains 8 AP. The second time this ship's "Frozen Lily" skill activates, activates "Fatal Drive - White Requiem" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "White Requiem" skill).

109090.name: Red Flame Slash
109090.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Red Flame Slash" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level). The slashing part of this attack always deals Critical DMG; this ship recovers HP equal to 5.0% of the DMG dealt to the enemy.

109100.name: Arms Enchantment
109100.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt (by up to 20.0%) the lower her current HP is. Increases "Atelier Ryza" collab characters' Crit Rate by 15.0% against enemies who have been Item Marked. The first time one of your Main Fleet "Atelier Ryza" collab characters uses an AP-consuming skill: increases that skill's power.

109110.name: Flawless Desire
109110.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. Every 9s: your fleet gains 5 AP.

109120.name: Flawless Desire+
109120.desc: Increases this ship's FP and ACC by 15.0%. Every 9s: your fleet gains 10 AP. The second time this ship's "Red Flame Slash" skill activates, activates "Fatal Drive - Flawless Desire" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Flawless Desire" skill).

109130.name: Wild Growth
109130.desc: When this ship gains a stack of Wood Element: activates "Wild Growth" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the skill's level; 5s cooldown between activations).

109140.name: Spirit Gift
109140.desc: Your "Atelier Ryza" collab characters take 10.0% less cannon and torpedo DMG from enemies who have been Item Marked. When an AP-consuming skill activates, or when this ship launches an Airstrike: this ship gains 1 stack of Wood Element (only 1 Wood Element can be gained per second; up to 5 stacks can be stored). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 2.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 1.0% for each stack of Wood Element.

109150.name: Eternity Bloom
109150.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: your fleet gains 5 AP. Increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% and AA by 15.0%.

109160.name: Eternity Bloom+
109160.desc: When this ship launches an Airstrike: your fleet gains 5 AP. Increases this ship's AVI by 5.0% and AA by 15.0%. Once per battle, when this ship has gained 5 stacks of Wood Element: resets all stacks and activates "Fatal Drive - Eternity Bloom" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Eternity Bloom" skill).

109170.name: Elemental Link
109170.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns, if your fleet has 5 or more AP: consumes 5 AP and this ship gains a fire, ice, lightning, or wind Elemental Spirit (chosen randomly from one of the unobtained Elemental Spirits) and performs a Lv.10 elemental attack of the corresponding element (5s cooldown between activations).

109180.name: Elemental Power
109180.desc: Every 10s: increases this ship's EVA by 5.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 3.0% for each Elemental Spirit she possesses.

109190.name: Einzelkampf
109190.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: your fleet gains 8 AP. Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%.

109200.name: Einzelkampf+
109200.desc: When this ship fires her Torpedoes: your fleet gains 10 AP. Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. The fourth time this ship's "Elemental Link" skill activates: removes all Elemental Spirits obtained from the "Elemental Link" skill and activates "Fatal Drive - Einzelkampf" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Einzelkampf" skill).

109210.name: Dark Spirit
109210.desc: Every 6 times this ship fires her Secondary Gun, if your fleet has 10 or more AP: consumes 10 AP and activates "Dark Spirit" Lv.10. When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard when "Dark Spirit" activates: adds a Dark Element to the ship in the rearmost position; if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position when "Dark Spirit" activates: adds a Dark Element to the ship in the frontmost position. A ship with a Dark Element takes 50 DMG and deals 8.0% more DMG for 5s.

109220.name: Holy Trail
109220.desc: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0%. When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard and there are other ships afloat in your Vanguard: adds a Light Element to the ship in the rearmost position of your Vanguard whenever an Item attack hits an enemy; if this ship is NOT in the frontmost position: adds a Light Element to the ship in the frontmost position whenever an Item attack hits an enemy. A ship with a Light Element recovers 5.0% of her max HP. This skill has a 12s cooldown between activations.

109230.name: Luna Judgment
109230.desc: Every 4 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 10 AP. Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Sirens by 10.0%.

109240.name: Luna Judgment+
109240.desc: Every 2 times this ship fires her Main Guns: your fleet gains 10 AP. Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Sirens by 10.0%. The third time this ship's "Dark Spirit" skill activates: activates "Fatal Drive - Luna Judgment" Lv.10 (DMG is based on the level of this ship's "Luna Judgment" skill) and adds a Luna Element to all "Atelier Ryza" collab characters excluding this one. Within 3s of gaining a Luna Element, if that character takes DMG that would sink her: that character does not sink, recovers 3.0% of her max HP, and evades all attacks for 3s.

110010.name: Twin Blades - Followup Slash
110010.desc:
When the battle starts: increases this ship's Crit DMG by 15.0% for every Senran Kagura collab character in your fleet(can be stacked up to 3 times).
Every 12s: applies a debuff to the enemy with the lowest HP remaining, increasing their DMG taken from Senran Kagura collab characters by 10.0%, and performs a Lv.10 special attack - Twin Blades - Followup Slash (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP and TRP stats). When this attack activates, if there is only 1 enemy on the battlefield: this attack deals guaranteed Crit DMG. ,If this special attack sinks an enemy: performs Twin Blades - Followup Slash again (10s cooldown between activations).

110020.name: Twin Blades Combo Strike
110020.desc:
Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 10.0% and performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP and TRP stats). Restores this ship's HP equal to 12.0% of the DMG dealt by this attack.
When this attack activates, if there is only 1 enemy on the battlefield: this attack deals guaranteed Crit DMG.

110030.name: Twin Blades Combo Strike+
110030.desc:
Increases this ship's FP and TRP by 15.0%. When the battle starts, if there is another Senran Kagura collab character in your fleet: increases this ship's EVA by 15.0%.
Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 10.0% and performs a Lv.10 Secret Ninja Art: Hanz-Style Full Bloom (DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's FP and TRP stats). Restores this ship's HP equal to 15.0% of the DMG dealt by this Secret Ninja Art.
When this Secret Ninja Art activates, if there is only 1 enemy on the battlefield: this attack deals guaranteed Crit DMG. ,If Hanz-Style Full Bloom sinks an enemy: additionally performs Twin Blades - Followup Slash 3 times.

110040.name: Fierce Sky Phoenix Flash
110040.desc: Every 25s: this ship stops in place for 3s and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship stops in place as a result of this skill: deploys a barrier (lasts 3s) capable of blocking up to 2.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG; if this shield expires: performs a Lv.10 special slash attack (DMG is based on the skill's level).

110050.name: Phoenix's Superb Fire Dance
110050.desc:
Every 10s: increases this ship's ACC and RLD by 10.0% for 5s and, with an 80.0% chance, fires a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 60.0%: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% and increases her EVA by 15.0% and FP and TRP by 10.0% until the battle ends.

110060.name: Fierce Sky Phoenix Flash+
110060.desc: Every 25s: this ship stops in place for 3s and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and performs a Lv.10 Secret Ninja Art: Superb Phoenix Flash (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship stops in place as a result of this skill: deploys a barrier (lasts 3s) capable of blocking up to 3.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG; if this shield expires: performs a Lv.10 special slash barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

110070.name: Blaze of Sacrifice
110070.desc: When this boat surfaces: fires a Lv.10 special barrage I that inflicts a special Burn ailment for 6s to enemies hit (barrage DMG is based on the skill's level; special Burn DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat).

110080.name: Flaming Crimson
110080.desc: Increases this boat's TRP stat by 10.0%. When this boat leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage II (DMG is based on the skill's level) and removes your fleet's non-special Burn ailments.

110090.name: Blaze of Sacrifice+
110090.desc:
5s after the battle starts: this boat surfaces and performs a Lv.10 Secret Ninja Art: Charge, inflicting a special Burn ailment to enemies hit for 20s (Secret Ninja Art DMG is based on the skill's level; special Burn DMG is based on the boat's TRP stat).
While this boat performs this Secret Ninja Art: this boat recovers 10 OXY every second and the first 3 attacks that hit her have their DMG set to 1. This boat submerges after she has finished attacking, and will surface a second time when her OXY runs out.
While an enemy afflicted with the special Burn caused by this skill is afloat: increases this boat's Crit DMG by 20.0%.

110100.name: Fan Dance of Ice and Snow
110100.desc: Increases this ship's AVI by 15.0%. When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

110110.name: Frozen Trees in Heavenly Storm
110110.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 20.0% of this ship's max HP. When this ship's Detection Gauge value reaches 0: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

110120.name: Fan Dance of Ice and Snow+

When this Secret Ninja Art hits an enemy: inflicts the Snow Dance ailment, reducing their SPD by 30.0% for 5s; if hitting an enemy already inflicted with Snow Dance: saves 1 stack (maximum of 5 stacks); 20.0% chance to set the enemy's SPD to 0 for 2s for each stack.

Increases the DMG of this ship's first volley by 60.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Heavy Armor enemies by 15.0%. Enemies hit by this ship's Main Guns suffer 8.0% decreased FP, TRP, and AVI for 8s.

Every 8 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a special barrage. If this ship has the Glory of the Past buff: improves this barrage. When fighting humanoid Siren fleets or Boss fleets: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 5.0%.

801130.name: My Phantoms
801130.desc: When the battle starts: summons Lv.10 Phantoms of Rodney on the battlefield that attack enemies (the Phantoms inherit some of this ship's stats; the amount of stats inherited is based on the skill's level). Every 12s: all present Rodneys fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

801140.name: Rodney's Prayer
801140.desc: When the battle starts: increases this ship's FP, AA, and RLD by 15.0%. When one of this ship's Phantoms is sunk: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0% until the battle ends (can be stacked up to 2 times).

801150.name: Demise's Arrival
801150.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 80.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When one of this ship's Phantoms is sunk: recovers 5.0% of this ship's max HP.

801161.name: Framework of Logic - Rodney
801161.desc:
[Operation Siren]
When fighting humanoid Siren fleets or Boss fleets: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 5.0%.

801162.name: Framework of Logic - Rodney
801162.desc:
[Operation Siren]
When fighting humanoid Siren fleets or Boss fleets: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0%.

801165.name: Framework of Logic - Rodney
801165.desc:
[Operation Siren]
When fighting humanoid Siren fleets or Boss fleets: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 5.0%.

801167.name: Framework of Logic - Rodney
801167.desc:
[Operation Siren]
When fighting humanoid Siren fleets or Boss fleets: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 8.0%.

902220.name: Lightweight Armor
902220.desc: When the battle starts: deploys a shield (lasts until the battle ends; can block up to 6 shells). If this shield is destroyed: increases this ship's EVA by 5.0% until the battle ends.

1010100.name: Ghost of Java Coast+
1010100.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 20.0% chance to increase this ship's EVA by 100.0% for 15s. If this effect does not activate 4 times: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1010140.name: Eagle's Tears+
1010140.desc: Once per battle, when one of your ships (excluding this ship) falls below 20.0% max HP as a result of DMG taken: restores 15.0% max HP to that ship and fires a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). When this ship fires her Main Guns: 50.0% chance to restore 10.0% max HP to each ship in your Vanguard.

1010160.name: The Strongest Shield+
1010160.desc: 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: for 10s, this ship tanks 50.0% of the DMG taken by your Main Fleet and reduces said DMG by 10.0%. Afterwards, she recovers HP equal to 50.0% of the DMG tanked and her FP and ACC increases by 10.0% (this buff can be stacked up to 3 times).

1010250.name: Javelin Raid+
1010250.desc: Every 5s: fires a Lv.10 special shell and, with a 20.0% chance, increases this ship's EVA by 60% for 8s (special shell DMG is based on the skill's level and this ship's TRP stat; EVA buff does not stack). Every 4 times this skill activates in the same battle: improves the special shell. If the special shell deals DMG to an enemy: increases its DMG by 10.0%.

1010290.name: Royal Navy's Glory+
1010290.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 100% chance to fire an improved forward-facing special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increase your Main Fleet's RLD by 40.0% for 8s.

1010340.name: Armored Carrier+
1010340.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: deploys protective barriers around all ships in your Vanguard and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). The barriers can absorb up to 10.0% of this ship's max HP and last for 8s. When a barrier is destroyed rather than expiring: the ship whose barrier was destroyed recovers 3.0% of her max HP.

1010380.name: Z Vanguard+
1010380.desc: Increases this ship's RLD and ACC by 40.0% and increases your Z-class DDs' FP, EVA, and AA by 40.0%. Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 10.0%. If there is another Z-class DD in your fleet: improves this ship's All Out Assault skill.

1010390.name: Unbreakable Shield+
1010390.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance to deploy a shield (lasts 10s; can block up to 12 enemy shells). When the battle starts, if this ship is in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: deploys this same shield. Every time this shield is deployed as a result of this skill: increases this ship's FP by 20.0% for 10s.

1010410.name: Wargod of Solomon+
1010410.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's FP, RLD, and EVA by 40.0% for 8s. When the battle starts: restores 10.0% of this ship's max HP, but decreases her SPD by 5 for 8s; 8s after the battle starts: increases this ship's FP and TRP by 12.0%.

1010480.name: Sisterly Bond+
1010480.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 35.0%. Upgrades this ship's All Out Assault skill to level III and decreases its shot requirement to 4. When sortied with Ping Hai: increases this ship's FP by 35.0%. When sortied with Yat Sen and while this ship is not in the rearmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and upgrades her All Out Assault skill to level IV, but decreases her Evasion Rate by 10.0%

1010490.name: Sisterly Bond+
1010490.desc: Increases this ship's Main Gun efficiency by 35.0%. Upgrades this ship's All Out Assault skill to level III and decreases its shot requirement to 4. When sortied with Ning Hai: increases this ship's FP by 35.0%. When sortied with Yat Sen and while this ship is not in the frontmost position of your Vanguard: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and upgrades her All Out Assault skill to level IV, but decreases her Evasion Rate by 10.0%

1010510.name: Revolyutsiya+
1010510.desc: Increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by 35.0%. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and increases this ship's FP and TRP by 20.0% for 10s.

1010530.name: Iron Blood Vanguard+
1010530.desc: During battle, increases this ship's Main Gun gear slot efficiency by 10.0% and decreases her DMG taken by 8.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 60.0% for 8s.

1010540.name: Royal Alliance+
1010540.desc: When the battle starts, for each Eagle Union or Royal Navy ship in your fleet other than this ship: increases this ship's FP, AA, RLD, and EVA by 12.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times). If there are 3 or more Eagle Union or Royal Navy ships in your fleet: also decreases the loading time of this ship's first Main Gun volley by 85.0%, increases your Eagle Union and Royal Navy Vanguard ships' FP and AA by 12.0%, and increases your Eagle Union and Royal Navy Main Fleet ships' AVI and AA by 12.0%.

1010580.name: Vampire's Kiss+
1010580.desc: Every 25s: fires 3 special torpedoes that heal this ship for 20.0% of the DMG dealt and all other ships in your Vanguard for 8.0% of the DMG dealt.

1010600.name: Myriad Nights: Trayastrimsa+
1010600.desc: Increases this ship's AA by 100.0% and RLD by 35.0%. Changes this ship's Torpedo Spread Angle and, 10s after the battle starts, when this ship fires her torpedoes: 100.0% chance to fire another wave of torpedoes and increase this ship's EVA by 15.0% for 6s (10s cooldown between activations).

1010610.name: Burn Order+
1010610.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt with HE ammo by 25.0% and increases her Burn Rate against enemies by 3.0%. Increases this ship's DMG dealt against Burning enemies by 16.0%; while there is a Burning enemy float, increases this ship's EVA by 16.0%.

1010670.name: Lonely Queen of the North+
1010670.desc: When there are no non-Iron Blood BBs or BCs in your Main Fleet: increases this ship's DMG dealt by 30.0%.

1010690.name: Iron Blood Hawk+
1010690.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: launches an additional Lv.10 airstrike. If this ship has at least 1 Iron Blood aircraft equipped: increases the efficiency of all of this ship's aircraft gear slots by 30.0%.

1010730.name: The Demon+
1010730.desc: Increases this ship's torpedo DMG dealt by 10.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 5.0% chance to increase this ship's TRP by 60.0% for 12s (5s cooldown between activations). When the battle starts: increases this ship's TRP by 100.0% for 8s; after this buff expires, decreases this ship's DMG taken by 8.0% until the battle ends.

1011120.name: Victorious Song+
1011120.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to BBs by 20.0% and decreases her volley DMG received by 20.0%. Increases your CVs' and CVLs' DMG dealt to BBs by 10.0% and increases your Flagship's DMG dealt to BBs by 5.0%. When this ship's airstrike finishes loading: increases this ship's AVI by 10.0% (can be stacked up to 2 times).

1011360.name: Lunga Point's Strike+
1011360.desc: Increases your Sakura Empire DDs' DMG dealt against CLs, CAs, and CBs by 15.0%. Every 5 times this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases this ship's DMG taken by 30.0% for 3s.

1011380.name: Departing Strike+
1011380.desc: When this boat arrives at her attack position: increases TRP and ACC by 10.0% for your Sakura Empire SSs and SSVs and increases DMG dealt against enemy CAs and CBs by 15.0%. When this boat retreats from battle: fires a special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1011440.name: The Bull of Scapa Flow+
1011440.desc: When this boat's torpedoes hit an enemy: for 5s, if that enemy takes DMG from this boat's torpedoes again, the enemy's DMG taken increases by 40.0%; when this boat resurfaces, fires a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) and decreases this boat's DMG taken by 15.0% until the battle ends.

1011500.name: Radiant Iris+
1011500.desc: When this ship's Main Gun damages the same target consecutively (if an attack hits multiple targets at once, they are all designated for this effect): increases this ship's RLD by 40.0% and FP by 5.0% (effect can only activate once every second; buff can be stacked up to 4 times); when this ship hits a different target, the RLD buff is reset. The first time each battle the max number of stacks is reached: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 12.0% and improves this ship's "All Out Assault" skill until the battle ends.

1011520.name: Heart of Iris+
1011520.desc: When the battle starts, increases this ship's and your Iris Libre and Vichya Dominion DDs' FP, TRP, and ACC by 15.0% and deploys a shield around each of them (including this ship). These shields last until the end of the battle and can block up to 4.0% of the recipient's max HP in DMG; for each DD in your Vanguard, the shield's max blockable DMG is further increased by 4.0% of the recipient's max HP.

1011540.name: Final Shot+
1011540.desc: Every 20s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). While this ship is equipping the Quadruple 380mm Main Gun (Mle 1935): increases this ship's Main Gun Crit Rate by 30.0% and Main Gun Crit DMG by 50.0%.

1011620.name: Predestined Launch+
1011620.desc: When this ship's airstrike has finished loading: launches 2 additional randomly chosen airstrikes consisting of Ryusei, Suisei, or Saiun squadrons, with a 25.0% chance to launch the remaining squadron not chosen. (Saiuns do not attack, instead increasing your Main Fleet's DMG dealt by 10.0% for 8s when launched.)

1011670.name: Surpriiiiiiiise!+
1011670.desc: 5s after this boat enters the battle, when she resurfaces, and when she leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that Burns enemies hit (Burn DMG is based on this boat's TRP stat).

1011700.name: Bold But Reckless+
1011700.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 12.0%, FP by 25.0%, and SPD by 3. Every 20s: 70.0% chance to launch a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level); if there is another Iris Libre or Vichya Dominion ship in your Vanguard: fires this barrage 3s after the battle starts.

1011710.name: Dullahan+
1011710.desc: Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 30.0% as a result of DMG taken: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% until the battle ends and, for 16s, decreases this ship's SPD by 2 while restoring 4.0% of this ship's and 1.0% of all your Vanguard ships' max HP, respectively, once every 3s. If this skill does not activate within 40s of the battle starting: restores 5.0% of this ship's max HP.

1011900.name: Protector of the North Passage+
1011900.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: 1) performs a scan, revealing the location of enemy SSs, decreasing their SPD by 40.0%, and increasing their DMG taken by 10.0% for 10s; 2) launches an additional airstrike consisting of Swordfishes armed with anti-sub and anti-surface torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1011940.name: Observer of the Sky and Sea+
1011940.desc: 10s after the battle starts: deploys an F6F recon plane and, every 6s, increases this ship's ACC by 7.0% and DMG dealt by 15.0% (can stack up to 3 times). If this recon plane is shot down: fires a special airstrike (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1011970.name: Morale Boost+
1011970.desc: Every 5 times this ship fires her Main Guns: increases this ship's RLD by 10.0% and her DMG dealt by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times).

1012160.name: The Glory of the Never-Setting Sun+
1012160.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Sakura Empire, Iron Blood, Sardegna Empire, and Siren ships by 10.0%. If there is another Royal Navy ship in your fleet: increases this ship's FP, RLD, EVA, and AA by 20.0%; if there is no other Royal Navy ship, this ship's "Armament Optimization" skill does not need her to equip the Quadruple 356mm Main Gun for the effect to work.

1012350.name: Unyielding Magician+
1012350.desc: Increases this ship's AA and EVA by 15.0%. When this ship is below 80.0% Max HP: increases her FP and TRP by up to 60, based on the percentage of missing HP. Every 20s: 70% chance to fire a Lv.10 torpedo barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1012600.name: Rosa Bombardamento+
1012600.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire a special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1012620.name: Terni Shields+
1012620.desc: When this ship takes DMG: 18.0% chance to spawn 2 shields (last 12s; can negate up to 10 enemy shells) and restores 1.5% of this ship's max HP. Increases this ship's EVA by 15.0% and increases your Zara-class ships' DMG dealt by 5.0%.

1012670.name: Fuoco di Copertura!+
1012670.desc: Every 20s, if this ship is in the backmost position of your Vanguard (there must be 2 or more ships afloat in your Vanguard): 100% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by 15.0% and increase the DMG dealt by the ship in the frontmost position of your Vanguard by 15.0% for 10s. Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage.

1013270.name: Bellowing Gusts of Fire+
1013270.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt to Burning enemies by 15.0%. Every 20s as well as with a 70% chance when this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barriage that inflicts a special Burn ailment to enemies hit (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1017160.name: Unseen Phantom+
1017160.desc: Increases this ship's DMG dealt by 20.0%. When this ship is attacked: 50.0% chance for this ship to enter the Phantom state. This state increases her Evasion Rate by 10.0% and lasts for 5s. When this state ends, one random enemy is chosen; for 5s, Mary Celeste deals 15.0% increased DMG to this enemy and she fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level) that always deals Critical DMG. There is a 15s cooldown between Phantom state activations.

1017200.name: Peerless Cannons of Destruction+
1017200.desc: Decreases the loading time of this ship's first volley by 80.0% and changes her Armor Type to Medium Armor. When this ship fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage with a 10.0% chance to inflict a special Flooding ailment to enemies hit for 18s (barrage and Flooding DMG are based on this ship's FP stat and the skill's level; Flooding DMG procs once every 3s).

1017210.name: For a Good Night's Sleep+
1017210.desc: When the battle starts, and every 10s: performs a Lv.10 special attack (DMG is based on the skill's level). As long as at least 1 enemy hit by this attack is afloat: decreases Whydah's DMG taken by 25.0%.

1017250.name: Hindhorn's Grace+
1017250.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0% and, every 18s, fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level). Enemies hit by this barrage take 8.0% more DMG from your Tempesta ships for 6s. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: this ship evades all attacks for 3s and recovers 15.0% of her max HP.

1017270.name: Treasure of the Loyal Protector+
1017270.desc: Increases this ship's Evasion Rate by 7.0%. Once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 50.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 8.0% of this ship's max HP; also once per battle, when this ship's HP falls below 35.0% as a result of DMG taken: restores 8.0% of this ship's max HP.

1090010.name: Fleet Carrier - Glorious
1090010.desc: When this ship launches an airstrike: increases your Vanguard's DMG dealt by 15.0% for 8s (effect does not stack with the skill "Fleet Carrier"). When the battle starts, increases the efficiency of this ship's aircraft by 20.0%.

1090020.name: Full Firepower - Karlsruhe
1090020.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 40.0% for 10s; when this effect activates, performs a special slash attack.

1090030.name: Anti-Air Mode - Montpelier
1090030.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken by 15.0%. When this ship fires her AA guns: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's AA by 40.0%, but decrease her FP by 20.0%, for 3s; if this ship has Eagle Union gear equipped, this AA buff is doubled and the FP debuff does not apply. Every 20s: 25.0% chance to increase this ship's DMG dealt by 25.0% for 8s.

1090040.name: Wolf Pack Formation - U-557
1090040.desc: Increases this boat's TRP, ACC, and RLD by 6.0% for each Iron Blood SS in the same fleet. When this boat leaves the battle: fires a Lv.10 special barrage based on the number of hits this boat scored with her torpedoes (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090050.name: Full Firepower - Nagara
1090050.desc: Every 20s: 60.0% chance to increase this ship's FP by 40.0% for 10s. When this effect successfully activates: the ship in your Vanguard with the lowest percentage HP remaining recovers 1.5% of her max HP; if the recipient of this effect is any Sakura Empire ship other than Nagara: increases that ship's and Nagara's AA by 10.0% for 5s (if Nagara herself is the recipient, the AA buff only stacks once).

1090060.name: Double Gun - Wichita
1090060.desc: Increases this ship's EVA by 20.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 25.0% chance to fire an additional attack, followed by a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090070.name: Artillery Command - Sims
1090070.desc: Increases your DDs' FP by 15.0% (does not stack with other "Artillery Command" skills.) Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage; enemies hit by this barrage take 15.0% more cannon DMG from your DDs for 5s.

1090080.name: Torpedo Command - Kagerou
1090080.desc: Increases your Vanguard's TRP by 15.0% (does not stack with other "Torpedo Command" skills). While this ship is afloat, when the fleet this ship is in starts a battle: further increases this ship's TRP by 15.0% and increases your Vanguard's Torpedo Crit Rate by 15.0%.

1090090.name: Fading Memories of Glory - Cavour
1090090.desc: 10s after the battle starts: launches a Lv.10 special torpedo barrage (DMG is based on this ship's TRP stat and the skill's level); every 15s after that: increases this ship's ACC by 8.0% (can be stacked up to 3 times) and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on this ship's FP stat and the skill level). 5s after this ship fires her first Main Gun volley: increases this ship's FP by 15.0% and increases her DMG dealt to CLs by 20.0% until the battle ends, but sets her TRP stat to 0.

1090100.name: Piercing Shells - Edinburgh
1090100.desc: Increases this ship's AP Ammo DMG dealt by 25.0%. When this ship hits an enemy with an AP Ammo Main Gun: 10.0% chance to inflict Armor Break for 6s.

1090110.name: Torpedo Launch - Gneisenau
1090110.desc: Every 20s: fires 12 acoustic torpedoes forwards (DMG is based on the skill's level). Increases this ship's and your Iron Blood CLs' and DDs' DMG dealt against CVs by 10.0%.

1090120.name: Piercing Shells  Z46
1090120.desc: Increases this ship's AP DMG by 25.0%. If this ship has an AP Main Gun equipped: 1) increases this ship's Crit Rate by 10.0%; 2) increases the Main Gun DMG this ship deals to enemies of any armor type by 15.0%; 3) improves this ship's All Out Assault.

1090130.name: Quick Reload - Mutsuki
1090130.desc: Every 20s: 70% chance to increase this ship's RLD by 40.0% for 10s and restore 5.0% max HP to a random ship in your Vanguard. 3s after the first time this effect activates in battle: decreases the loading time of this ship's next wave of torpedoes by 20s.

1090140.name: Artillery Cover - Saratoga
1090140.desc: Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 supporting barrage using CA-caliber guns, and launches a Lv.10 special airstrike (barrage and airstrike DMG are both based on the skill's level).

1090150.name: Surface Combat - Surcouf
1090150.desc: Increases this boat's surface combat duration by 12.0s. When this boat fires her Main Guns: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090160.name: Double Gun - Suffolk
1090160.desc: When this ship fires her Main Guns: 75.0% chance to fire again and restore 2.0% of this ship's max HP.

1090170.name: AP Protection - Mogami
1090170.desc: Decreases this ship's DMG taken from AP shells by 20.0%. 10s after the battle starts, and every 20s after that: deploys a barrier (lasts 10s) that can negate up to 3.0% of this ship's max HP in DMG; when this barrier breaks or expires: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090180.name: Cover Fire  Fusou
1090180.desc: Increases this ship's FP and AVI by 20.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns or launches an airstrike: 50.0% chance to fire a Lv.10 special barrage forwards (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090190.name: Focused Assault - Takao
1090190.desc: Increases FP by 15.0%. When this ship fires her Main Guns: 30.0% chance to double the DMG dealt by that attack. Every 10s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level)

1090200.name: Double Torpedo - McCall
1090200.desc: When this ship fires her torpedoes: 50.0% chance to fire a second wave of torpedoes and reduces the reload time of currently reloading torpedoes by 3s.

1090210.name: Emergency Maneuvers - Fortune
1090210.desc: Every 15s: 30.0% chance for this ship to evade all attacks for 8s. If this effect does not activate: decreases this ship's DMG taken by 10.0% for 8s.

1090220.name: Reload Command - Knigsberg
1090220.desc: Increases your Vanguard's RLD by 15.0% (does not stack with the same skill). Every 20s: fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).

1090230.name: Piercing Shells - Z18
1090230.desc: Increases this ship's DMG with AP ammo by 25.0% and increases her Main Gun efficiency by 10.0%. Every 20s: increases this ship's FP by 30.0% for 10s and fires a Lv.10 special barrage (DMG is based on the skill's level).
